title: BENU AstroGem Fountain Pen - Apollo
description:
This BENU AstroGem fountain pen features a vibrant blue base with red glitter patches throughout. It has a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, a translucent red resin grip and centerband, a silver clip, and pushes to post.

It comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge. You can also fill the whole barrel with ink to use as an eyedropper pen with a massive ink capacity.

From BENU:

BENU introduces its new collection of fountain pens – AstroGem. This collection was inspired by the shape of the interstellar asteroid, Oumuamua, and the numerous social media comments suggesting that the asteroid has a “BENU-like vibe”. Featuring 7 unique designs, each named after a famous asteroid with edgy shapes and uneven facets, these pens are own interpretation of asteroids- proving that even interstellar objects can be flamboyant and colorful if designed by BENU!

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: BENU Briolette Fountain Pen - Amethyst Tide
description:
A beautiful gemstone deserves a beautiful cut! To highlight the visual appeal of the material, the BENU Briolette has its entire body covered with long facets. Each cut gives the pens specific shapes that prevent them from rolling and enables the true color and brilliance of the material to emerge.

The Amethyst Tide resin features a beautiful blend of blue and purple with multi-colored sparkles throughout. It has a gold-plated #5 Schmidt stainless steel nib, a translucent purple resin grip and accents, is clipless, and does not post. This fountain pen comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge.

title: BENU Euphoria Fountain Pen - Blackberry Mint (Special Edition)
description:
This BENU Euphoria fountain pen is part of our Goulet Pens-exclusive, special edition Refreshment collection, all featuring fountain pens designed after fun drinks.

Inspired by a delicious Blackberry Mint cocktail, this faceted resin fountain pen has a light pink to dark red ombre design, with sparkling green glitter flecks throughout the barrel and cap. The grip section is a translucent, beautiful dark purple.

The Euphoria pen model is ergonomically designed for long periods of comfortable writing. The pen is complemented by a silver clip, and completed with a silver #6 stainless steel nib. The cap pushes to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

This fountain pen comes with a standard international converter and one blue standard international long cartridge. You can also fill the whole barrel with ink to use as an eyedropper pen with a massive ink capacity.

Please note: the Fine, Medium, and Broad steel nibs offered on this pen are a #6 Schmidt nib and housing. The 1.1mm Stub and Flex steel nibs are a #6 JoWo nib and housing. These two nib units are not swappable with each other.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

description:

The Bloody Mary pen is rendered in a vibrant tomato-red hue, enhanced with subtle green sparkles to mirror the traditional celery stick often garnished in the drink.

The Euphoria features facets and an ergonomic design for long periods of comfortable writing. It has a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, a silver resin grip and silver accents, a silver clip, and pushes to post.

title: BENU Euphoria Fountain Pen - Glasóg Dragon (Limited Edition)
description:
Prepare to embark on a legendary writing journey. These Luxury Brands of America exclusive limited-edition pens harness the mystique and power of two mighty dragons: Dubhánach and Glasóg. These pens are more than just writing instruments—they’re a tribute to the ancient tales of mythical beasts and the forces of nature.

The Euphoria fountain pen features facets and an ergonomic design for long periods of comfortable writing. It has a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, silver clip, and pushes to post.

This fountain pen comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge. You can also fill the whole barrel with ink to use as an eyedropper pen with a massive ink capacity.

These limited-edition dragon pens won’t last long—be sure to claim yours before they soar away! Each pen is numbered out of 93.

The Legend of Dubhánach and Glasóg:

Long ago, in the forgotten lands of mist-shrouded mountains and enchanted forests, two mighty dragons ruled over the realm—Dubhánach, the Black Dragon of the Night, and Glasóg, the Green Dragon of the Verdant Isles. For centuries, they lived in harmony, each guarding a sacred element of the natural world.

Dubhánach (doo-VAH-nahk): The Black Dragon. Guardian of the night, Dubhánach was born from the shadows of the moonless sky. Cloaked in obsidian scales, every breath brought the stillness of the night. His eyes blazed like embers in the dark, and he was said to control the mysteries of the unknown—whispers carried by the wind, secrets hidden in the stars. His fearsome power came from his connection to the dark forces of the world, and many believed that only the bravest could unlock his dark gifts. Dubhánach’s mighty flames, depicted in the fiery red and orange details of the pen, represent the fire of destruction and transformation, burning away the old to make way for new wisdom.

Glasóg (GLA-sog): The Green Dragon. Born from the heart of ancient forests, Glasóg was the protector of life itself. His emerald and sapphire scales shimmered with the vitality of the earth, and his glowing orange eyes pierced through the shadows of the wild. Known as the Bringer of Growth, Glasóg’s fiery breath could set the world ablaze, but from the ashes, new life would always emerge. Legend has it that Glasóg’s power kept nature in balance—forests would grow where his flames touched, and rivers would flow in his wake. The golden flames rising from the base of this pen are a symbol of his dominion over fire, regeneration, and the eternal cycle of life.

But the peace between the two dragons could not last forever. As their realms began to overlap, the tension between Dubhánach's control of the dark and Glasóg's mastery over nature grew. The skies above their land turned to fire as the two dragons clashed, their epic battle said to have shaken the very foundation of the world. Though their war raged for centuries, legend has it that their final breaths were captured in these pens, immortalizing their power for all who dared to wield them.

Please note: the Fine, Medium, and Broad steel nibs offered on this pen are a #6 Schmidt nib and housing. The 1.1mm Stub and Flex steel nibs are a #6 JoWo nib and housing. These two nib units are not swappable with each other.

Note: We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: BENU Euphoria Fountain Pen - Golden Beach
description:
Two new Euphoria pens from BENU! These two pens, Golden Beach and White Beach, are designed to evoke the blissful embrace of golden and ivory sands along tropical shores.

Golden Beach is made from warm amber resin, enriched with golden foil, and fitted with a #6 Schmidt gold-plated nib and matching gold clip. It pushes to post. 

Please note: the Fine, Medium, and Broad steel nibs offered on this pen are a #6 Schmidt nib and housing. The 1.1mm Stub and Flex steel nibs are a #6 JoWo nib and housing. These two nib units are not swappable with each other.

This fountain pen comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge. You can also fill the whole barrel with ink to use as an eyedropper pen with a massive ink capacity.

description:
BENU introduces the Honey Pals fountain pen, inspired by the endearing teddy bear created by English author, A.A. Milne, and English illustrator, E.H. Shepard. The pen is produced in a positive shade of turquoise-blue and green, and showcases the famous hand-painted yellow bear as it first appeared in Milne’s original Winnie-the-Pooh book in 1926.

The Euphoria features facets and an ergonomic design for long periods of comfortable writing. It has a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, silver clip, and pushes to post.

Inspired by the sweet Iced Caramel Latte, this faceted resin fountain pen transitions from a coffee brown color on the barrel to a warm caramel color on the grip, with some swirls in the middle of the barrel, replicating the swirls of adding cream to your coffee. title: BENU Haute Fountain Pen - Allure
description:
BENU proudly presents the Haute Collection, a new line of pens that embodies elegance, style, and sophistication, all while retaining the signature BENU flair. Each pen has a faceted body with four wide and four slender facets, creating a sleek and streamlined feel. These pens represent BENU’s vision of timeless elegance infused with a modern, fashion-forward twist.

This fountain pen has a stunning blue and teal body, a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, silver accents, a silver clip, and pushes to post. The cap does post on the pen body, though the squared shape of the pen body puts a limit on how securely the cap will hold on the pen. It should be okay for regular writing, but it may not be quite as secure as other pens you’re used to.

This fountain pen comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge.

title: BENU Pixie Fountain Pen - Aqua Glow
description:
Introducing the BENU Pixie collection, the cutest little fountain pen you've ever seen! Compact in size, yet comfortable to write with when the cap is posted, this pen is a true marvel in the world of pocket-sized fountain pens. Extensively tested before its launch, the Pixie strikes the balance between petite aesthetics and ergonomics, ensuring it is suitable for long writing sessions despite its compact size.

Aqua Glow features a glittering silver grey resin barrel, and a silver and translucent aqua resin cap with silver sparkles. It has a silver #5 stainless steel nib, and the clipless screw-cap pushes to post.

It comes with a blue standard international short ink cartridge. You can also fill the whole barrel with ink to use as an eyedropper pen with a larger ink capacity. A mini standard international converter (such as the Kaweco foldable converter) is available for purchase separately.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

description:
Compact in size, yet comfortable to write with when the cap is posted, the BENU Pixie is a true marvel in the world of pocket-sized fountain pens. This set of 3 fountain pens brings a fresh interpretation of the Jolly Roger motif through a nostalgic palette of orange, pink, and blue. Each pen is finished with a unique, hand-applied patina that captures the charm of timeworn elegance.

Each pen in the Jolly Roger Vintage set is finished with a hand-applied patina imitation, creating a distinctive timeworn aesthetic. Noticeable variations in tone and texture are part of the design, enhancing the aged, well-worn appearance.

To achieve this effect, BENU used an Giudaic Bitumen solution—traditionally applied by masters in painting and decorative arts to create an aged, patinated look. The solution consists of natural resins and oils and is safe to use, though it may carry a faint, characteristic scent similar to bitumen, which will dissipate over time.

All 3 pens have a Schmidt #5 stainless steel nib in Fine. It comes with a blue standard international short ink cartridge. Presenting three new stunning additions to our Talisman collection: Cat’s Eye, Hawk’s Eye, and Tiger’s Eye. These minerals, highly sought-after for their optical illusions, have been surrounded by myths and legends for centuries.

We, therefore, considered the stones a perfect fit for our Talisman collection! title: BENU Talisman Fountain Pen - Dragon's Blood
description:
This BENU Talisman fountain pen features a black resin base with green and red sparkles throughout. It has a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, a black resin grip and accents, a silver clip, and pushes to post. It comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge. You can also fill the whole barrel with ink to use as an eyedropper pen with a massive ink capacity.

BENU is proud to introduce their marvelous new collection of pens, Talisman. This collection is inspired by great legends and the mystical beliefs that surround talismans, amulets, and other magical items used to bring luck, protection, money, love or special abilities.

Whether you are an avid believer in the magical power of plants, stones, herbs, and crystals, or you remain skeptical to this mysterious and unknown world, there indeed lies a sprinkling of curiosity and intrigue within each of us. Believer or not, we can all admire the fabulous myths and ancient beliefs behind these good luck charms.

We invite you to step into this hypnotizing realm of folklore and see for yourself if there is any truth to be found beneath the fables. Who knows, perhaps this fascinating magic might make its way into our modern world!

This Talisman collection is made complete with 5 pens, each named after a special substance: Mandrake, Dragon’s Blood, Peacock Ore, Fox Gloves, and Edelweiss. Drawing inspiration from certain tales of yore, we set out to convey these stories not only in the color and style of each pen, but by actually infusing a part of each substance into the five different designs.

Known historically as Sanguis Draconis, Dragon’s Blood has been used in magic rituals and alchemy for centuries. Ancient traders obtained it from small islands, where the dragons were believed to dwell. However, the magical blood wasn’t yielded directly from the dragons, but from a genus of curious trees - the most famous species in horticulture was named Dracaena Draco, otherwise known as the Dragon Tree. The bright red resin that is obtained from Dracaena Draco is surrounded by many ancient myths and legends, one of which is the thrilling tale of the battle between Hercules and Ladon:

As the Ancient Greek Legend has it, Ladon, a serpent-like dragon, was sent by Hera, the Queen of Heaven, to protect the sacred fruit that she had gifted to Zeus. The hotheaded Hercules was sent on the dangerous task of stealing the Hesperides apples, with the fierce dragon on-guard close by. Against all odds, the mighty Hercules slayed the ferocious Ladon, and the dragon’s blood spilled out over the land, sprouting ‘dragon’ trees. These Dragon Trees, with their long, slender trunks and prickly leaves, continue to bleed the death of Ladon with an oozing, reddish sap whenever cut.

In old Europe, Dragon’s Blood became a vital component in the alchemical arts and the concocting of magical potions. During the Middle Ages it was used to make healing potions or to mark armor invulnerable and weapons unbreakable.

description:

The African Dream Bean is a climbing vine native to southern Africa, which is used in various ways by traditional communities. However, this curious plant is perhaps most notorious for its ability to induce lucid dreams that enable communication with the spirit world. Some African tribes also use the Dream Bean’s chocolate colored seeds as amulets or good luck charms, stringing them together to create pieces of jewelry. Always fans of exploring the world’s curiosities and turning them into works of art, we’ve chosen this mystical plant as inspiration to our latest BENU creation.

description:

It has a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, a black resin grip and accents, a silver clip, and pushes to post. It comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge. BENU is proud to introduce their marvelous new collection of pens, Talisman. This collection is inspired by great legends and the mystical beliefs that surround talismans, amulets, and other magical items used to bring luck, protection, money, love or special abilities.

Whether you are an avid believer in the magical power of plants, stones, herbs, and crystals, or you remain skeptical to this mysterious and unknown world, there indeed lies a sprinkling of curiosity and intrigue within each of us. Believer or not, we can all admire the fabulous myths and ancient beliefs behind these good luck charms.

We invite you to step into this hypnotizing realm of folklore and see for yourself if there is any truth to be found beneath the fables. Who knows, perhaps this fascinating magic might make its way into our modern world!

This Talisman collection is made complete with 5 pens, each named after a special substance: Mandrake, Dragon’s Blood, Peacock Ore, Fox Gloves, and Edelweiss. Drawing inspiration from certain tales of yore, we set out to convey these stories not only in the color and style of each pen, but by actually infusing a part of each substance into the five different designs.

Most people will recognize the word “edelweiss” from the famous 1965 musical romance, Sound of Music. However, this non-toxic, noble plant, with its snow-white leaves and star-shaped inflorescence, is often associated with certain myths related to proving one’s worth and discovering true love.

One fable tells the tragedy of a hauntingly beautiful queen with a heart of pure ice. Stories of her beauty reached many doomed suitors, who dared to proclaim love for the queen. Since her frozen heart was unable to love, she soon tired of them and ordered her loyal goblins to throw the hapless men to their deaths. One day, an ordinary shepherd found his way to her cave and the queen fell in love with him. The jealous goblins, fearing their mistress would marry this mortal and abandon them, threw him into the abyss. When she learned of the tragedy, her heart melted enough for her to shed a solitary tear. That tear became the first Edelweiss.

Although this tragic tale earned Edelweiss its popular name “The Tear of the Snow Queen”, another legend, told by Berthold Auerbach in 1861 in his book, Edelweiss, made the flower a true symbol of eternal love. The tale tells the story of a young man who risks his life to collect rare Edelweiss flowers for his lover as proof of his daring and brave nature.

With all the mystique surrounding the Edelweiss flower, these tales and fables might not be easy to chew. Accurate or not, this small, potent plant continues to be used in medicine as a remedy against many diseases. Its origins, however, are up to you to decide...

It has a silver Schmidt #6 stainless steel nib, a black resin grip and accents, a silver clip, and pushes to post. It comes with a standard international converter and one long blue ink cartridge. BENU is proud to introduce its marvelous new collection of pens, Talisman. This collection is inspired by great legends and the mystical beliefs that surround talismans, amulets, and other magical items used to bring luck, protection, money, love or special abilities.

Whether you are an avid believer in the magical power of plants, stones, herbs, and crystals, or you remain skeptical to this mysterious and unknown world, there indeed lies a sprinkling of curiosity and intrigue within each of us. Believe it or not, we can all admire the fabulous myths and ancient beliefs behind these good luck charms.

We invite you to step into this hypnotizing realm of folklore and see for yourself if there is any truth to be found beneath the fables. Who knows, perhaps this fascinating magic might make its way into our modern world!

This Talisman collection is made complete with 5 pens, each named after a special substance: Mandrake, Dragon’s Blood, Peacock Ore, Fox Gloves, and Edelweiss. Drawing inspiration from certain tales of yore, we set out to convey these stories not only in the color and style of each pen, but by actually infusing a part of each substance into the five different designs.

The mandrake root is native to both the Mediterranean and the Himalayas. With a long history of use in religious and occult practices, this plant is particularly noted for its potent roots, which somewhat resemble the human body.

One of the earliest mentions of mandrake can be dated back to the Bible. In Genesis 30, Rachel, Jacob’s wife, relies on this special plant to help her conceive a child. With its sweet fragrance that acts as an aphrodisiac, the mention of mandrakes in the Song of Solomon is part of a romantic encounter between Solomon and his new wife. It is suggested that the scripture links the mandrake with sexuality and fertility.

In the Middle Ages, folk understood that plants bearing resemblances to body parts could be used to treat their associated limbs and organs. Mandrakes can look rather like babies, so those having trouble conceiving would sleep with them under their pillows. And it wasn’t just about mandrakes getting people “in the mood” and fertile! According to Anthony John Carter, as he writes in the Journal of the Royal Society of Medicine in 2003, medieval folk carried mandrake roots around as good luck charms, hoping the plant would grant them not only wealth and the power to control their destiny, but also the ability to control the destinies of others as well.

Having a long history of medicinal and magical use - from witches brew to modern medicine - this fantastic plant is still fundamentally part of our lives and certainly continues to work its magic in our modern day society.

title: Conklin 1898 Fountain Pen - Bohemian Twilight (Special Edition)
description:
This Conklin 1898 fountain pen is a Goulet exclusive, limited production, featuring a dark blue, teal, and orange resin made by Jonathon Brooks of the Carolina Pen Company. It features a new clip and a trimless cap.

Conklin 1898 is inspired by the rich heritage of the Conklin brand, designed with comfort and durability in mind. This collection is suited to individuals looking for a well-sized, cigar shaped pen that provides a larger surface area for a comfortable grip while writing.

The Conklin 1898 fountain pen is offered with your choice of a reliable, smooth-writing German made JoWo #6 silver steel nib in extra-fine, fine, medium, broad, or 1.1mm stub, as well as the Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width. Each Cushion Point nib displays the brand name and is marked with special crescent-shaped breathing holes. The Conklin quality control team tests each nib individually to ensure top quality writing performance.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. title: Conklin 1898 Fountain Pen - Spectra Fusion Blue (Limited Edition)
options: {"Nib Size": ["Extra-Fine Steel", "Fine Steel", "Medium Steel", "Broad Steel", "1.1mm Stub Steel", "Omniflex Steel", "14k Fine", "14k Medium", "14k Omniflex"]}
description:
The Conklin® 1898 Spectra Fusion Collection represents a masterful blend of traditional craftsmanship and cutting-edge materials science—where the beauty of nature meets modern engineering. At the heart of this collection lies stabilized wood, a specially treated wood infused with epoxy to significantly enhance its durability, aesthetic appeal, and workability. Through a meticulous process involving drying, vacuum pressure infusion, and curing, the stabilizing agent deeply penetrates the wood fibers, filling pores and voids. Once hardened, the epoxy transforms the wood into a medium that resists warping, cracking, and moisture, while showcasing a smooth, polished finish. This process not only preserves the natural grain and color but also elevates them, making stabilized wood ideal for applications requiring both beauty and strength—such as luxury pen making.

Each Spectra Fusion pen begins with professionally stabilized maple burl, chosen for its intricate grain patterns and unique character. The stabilization process results in a wood that is hard, dense, and resistant to environmental stresses. On its own, this stabilized burl would already be suitable for precision work and detailed carving, capable of holding fine edges and showcasing vibrant hues.

However, the Spectra Fusion Collection takes innovation a step further by fusing the stabilized wood with hand-poured epoxy resin. This fusion creates a hybrid material that is both structurally superior and visually dynamic. The epoxy—pigmented, layered, or swirled—is poured to enhance and interact with the wood’s natural figure, filling voids and creating translucent layers with jewel-like depth. The use of vacuum-degassing ensures the epoxy is free of bubbles and achieves a flawless bond with the stabilized wood. Once cured, this hybrid is even stronger than stabilized wood alone, offering added structural integrity while preserving the tactile warmth of genuine timber.

The result is a writing instrument that is not only aesthetically breathtaking but also mechanically robust. Stabilized wood contributes density and resistance to wear, while the epoxy reinforces structural weaknesses and adds rigidity. This makes Spectra Fusion pens capable of withstanding daily handling, environmental changes, and moisture exposure without compromising their visual or functional qualities.

Design-wise, Spectra Fusion retains Conklin’s signature features: the classic cigar-shaped silhouette, engraved cap ring, and crescent-shaped clip that pay homage to the company’s 1898 legacy and iconic Crescent-Filler™ system.

This blue fusion pen - where oceanic blues swirl against golden-orange burl is so unique. Limited to 1,898 pieces per color, each Spectra Fusion pen is presented in a luxury Conklin gift box with a custom sleeve, underscoring its exclusivity and collectability. The collection stands as a testament to Conklin’s commitment to innovation, craftsmanship, and design—where stabilized wood and epoxy resin unite to form pens that are as functional as they are extraordinary. The Spectra Fusion Collection is more than a tool—it is a statement of artistry, engineering, and heritage, offering writers and collectors a unique convergence of nature, science, and legacy.

Conklin 1898 is inspired by the rich heritage of the Conklin brand, designed with comfort and durability in mind. This collection is suited to individuals looking for a well-sized, cigar shaped pen that provides a larger surface area for a comfortable grip while writing. 

The Conklin 1898 fountain pen is offered with your choice of a reliable, smooth-writing German made JoWo #6 silver steel nib in extra-fine, fine, medium, broad, or 1.1mm stub, as well as the Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width. Each nib displays the brand name and is marked with special crescent-shaped breathing holes. The Conklin quality control team tests each nib individually to ensure top quality writing performance.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

The 1898 fountain pen comes with reliable standard international cartridges as well as a threaded converter. Each Conklin brand writing instrument is housed in a luxury gift box. Conklin 1898 collection is an ideal gift for any person in your life or for yourself, whether it’s used in their professional lives, home offices, or daily journaling.

title: Conklin All American Fountain Pen - Raven Black
description:
The Conklin All American is an oversized yet comfortable fountain pen.

This fountain pen is offered with your choice of a reliable, smooth-writing German made JoWo #6 steel nib in extra-fine, fine, medium, broad, or 1.1mm stub, or the new JoWo Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width. With six nib options, you are sure to find a selection to fit your handwriting style.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

Crafted from high-grade, hand-made European resins, the Conklin All American is impressively large in size, yet not so big as to be uncomfortable in the hand. The screw cap and barrel are carefully tapered to provide a nice balance. The trademark Rocker Clip allows users to easily secure the pen to a shirt or coat pocket. The All American comes with a threaded, standard international converter and also uses reliable (short or long) standard international cartridges.

The Conklin Pen Company was established in 1898 and is still regarded as one of the most significant and innovative manufacturers from what is today known as the Golden Era of fountain pens.

During the 1930s, at the dawn of the depression, Conklin launched a collection that was priced more affordably to the general public. The "All American" collection was offered in a variety of sizes, filling mechanisms and finishes with the aim of satisfying a growing market demand for good quality, but affordably priced writing instruments. Today this pen pays homage to the classic designs of the vintage Conklin era.

The All American collection draws its inspiration from the rich heritage of the Conklin brand, which was purchased and revived by Yafa in 2009. The rebooted All American is manufactured in Asia, assembled and distributed from Canoga Park, California, and pays tribute to its roots with a "Toledo, Ohio" engraving on its nib and barrel. This collection brings a vibrant, contemporary style to a classic, oversize streamlined design.

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Conklin Duragraph Fountain Pen - Abalone Nights
description:
This abalone shell and black resin Conklin Duragraph fountain pen comes with a standard international converter and an ink cartridge. The Conklin Duragraph fountain pen is now offered with your choice of a reliable, smooth-writing German made JoWo #6 silver steel nib in fine, medium, broad, or 1.1mm stub, or the new JoWo silver Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

The Duragraph draws its inspiration from the rich heritage of the Conklin brand, which was purchased and revived by Yafa in 2009. It is manufactured in Asia, assembled and distributed from Canoga Park, California, and pays tribute to its roots with a “Toledo, Ohio” engraving on its nib and barrel. The cap top is embellished with the Conklin Est. 1898 logo and the cap band are engraved with the famous Duragraph model script font with three Conklin Crescent logos on either side of the model name.

In 1923, the Duragraph model was launched, and shortly afterwards was considered to be "the definitive" pen. The model was named by combining the words, durable and graph - Duragraph. Created to last as an heirloom to serve many generations, the Duragraph is offered with a lifetime guarantee. In honor of the Duragraph's 91st birthday, Conklin has introduced a new Duragraph collection that brings a fresh, modern style to a timeless oversize flat top design. Crafted from quality hand made resins, the Duragraph is substantial in size, yet not so large to be unwieldy in the hand.

The Duragraph offers the ideal choice for your individual handwriting style. The cap top mounted clip allows the pen to sit low in the pocket, making this model a more practical choice for everyday use. Each Conklin fine writing instrument is housed in a luxury gift presentation box lined with rich satin. It comes with a converter and also accepts short standard international cartridges. Ideal as a perfect gift for yourself or a loved one, this model is the right size for both men and women who use fine writing instruments in their daily professional lives.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Delta CANOVA Fountain Pen (Special Edition)
description:
The new CANOVA fountain pen from Delta is inspired by the Italian sculptor and architect Antonio Canova, who lived from 1757-1822 and was regarded as one of the greatest Neoclassical artists. His work is the inspiration for this pen, in particular his famous sculpture Psyche Revived by Cupid's Kiss (shown on the sleeve of the box), which is hailed as an important sculpture ushering in the Romantic period. The CANOVA pen has a stunning dark green resin body with very fine engraved lines down the barrel and swirled ivory body and cap finials. The spring-tension clip has a unique gold feathery wing design representing Cupid's wing. 

This fountain pen includes a threaded standard international converter, has gold-plated trim, and a gold-plated #6 JoWo steel nib. Each pen is handmade in Delta's factory in Naples, Italy.

This special edition is only available at Goulet Pens, and each one is individually numbered with a 3-digit number. Included with each pen is a 30ml glass bottle of Delta green ink. 

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some slight variation in the pattern seen here on the white portions of the pen. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Delta Duna Fountain Pen - Ghibli
description:
This Delta Duna fountain pen has a simple yet elegant design. It has a vintage-modern style with a classical ball clip and conical tip. The Duna features a piston-filling mechanism with a red and blue patterned cap and body.

The Duna collection is born from the encounter between the art of writing and the primordial force of the desert. Three fountain pens, three spirits of the wind, three visions of elegance and power that take shape in a refined and contemporary design.

Ghibli is the warm wind that envelops and transforms. Its amber body, with golden shades and antiqued bronze finishes, tells stories of distant lands, adventures and memories. An intense pen, with a strong character, that accompanies every word with warmth and depth.

This pen is accented by rose gold trim and a matching nib. The stainless steel #6 fountain pen nib is made by the German brand JoWo. In addition to several standard nib sizes, there is also a flex nib variant that allows you to alter the line thickness by varying the pressure applied to the nib.

Delta, the renowned Italian pen brand that has been creating stunning and distinct pens since the 1980s, has made a triumphant return after it ceased operations in the 2010s. This new Delta brand has been personally revitalized by Nino Marino, one of Delta's co-founders who also owns and manages Maiora and Nettuno pen brands. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy, and is individually numbered.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Delta DV Original Mid-Size Fountain Pen - Original
description:
The original is back! This mid-sized Delta DV Original Mid-Size fountain pen features the iconic color combination: solid black cap, orange marbled resin barrel. Complemented by sterling silver trim, it has a mid-sized comfortable design that fits perfectly in your hand. Equipped with a JoWo #6 steel nib, you'll be able to smoothly write with precision and ease.

The fountain pen is refillable using standard international ink cartridges or using the included converter with bottled ink.

DV is short for "dolce vita", translated from Italian as "sweet life".

title: Delta DV Original Mid-Size Fountain Pen - Primary Manipulation 4.5 (Limited Edition)
description:
The original is back! This mid-sized Delta DV Original Mid-Size fountain pen features the popular Primary Manipulation 4.5 resin from Jonathon Brooks at the Carolina Pen Company. Complemented by sterling silver trim, it has a mid-sized comfortable design that fits perfectly in your hand. Equipped with a JoWo #6 steel nib, you'll be able to smoothly write with precision and ease. This is a limited edition release! Each pen is numbered out of /88 on the back of the cap. 

The fountain pen is refillable using standard international ink cartridges or using the included converter with bottled ink.

DV is short for "dolce vita", translated from Italian as "sweet life". 

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

description:

DV is short for "dolce vita", translated from Italian as "sweet life".

title: Delta Italian Songs Fountain Pen - Anema e Core (Special Edition)
description:
There is a song that does not need time to exist. It lives in the breath of every word, in the silence after a note, in the deep beat of a sincere emotion: “Anema e Core” (Soul and Heart). The first fountain pen in the Delta Italian Songs collection is dedicated to this masterpiece of Neapolitan tradition, a celebration of love in all its forms.

The elegant silhouette of the pen blends with the sweet musicality of the verses. Verses finely engraved, accompany it with discretion and poetry: “Tenimmece accussì... anema e core” becomes a whispered promise, held in the hands. It is not just a pen. It is an emotion to write. A memory that remains, soul and heart.

The special edition Delta Anema e Core fountain pen is a Goulet Pens exclusive! It's made of special resin hand-turned from a solid bar and mirror polished and comes with a 24kt gold-plated steel nib in a range of nib sizes. Special details like the music note-filled ring on the barrel and the pink accents contribute to its uniqueness.

The fountain pen fills via a standard ink cartridge (short or long) or converter (included). It also comes with a bottle of Delta Black ink. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy.

title: Delta Italian Songs Fountain Pen - Reginella (Special Edition)
description:
The special edition Delta Italian Songs "Reginella" fountain pen is a Goulet Pens exclusive!

It's made of special resin hand-turned from a solid bar and mirror polished and comes with a pallidum-plated steel nib in a range of nib sizes. Special details like the music note-filled ring on the barrel and the white accents contribute to its uniqueness.

The fountain pen fills via a standard ink cartridge (short or long) or converter (included). It also comes with a bottle of Delta Black ink. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy.

From Delta:

There is a corner of the soul that belongs only to memories, to those sighs that time has not been able to extinguish. That is where Reginella lives, not just a fountain pen, but a small treasure chest of poetry, created to enclose and revive the enchantment of one of the most poignant Neapolitan songs.

A song that smells of nostalgia “Reginella” is a famous Neapolitan song written in 1917 by Libero Bovio, a poet and lyricist among the greatest of the Neapolitan tradition, with music composed by Gaetano Lama.

It tells the melancholic confession of a man who meets his lost love after years. With sweet words but full of regret, the protagonist wonders if she too, sometimes, thinks back to those happy days. It is a song of love and nostalgia that has moved anyone who listens to it for over a century, an eternal symbol of the delicacy and intensity of Neapolitan feelings.

The Reginella fountain pen translates this emotion into an object of rare beauty and refinement: The body of the pen is finely engraved with the words of the song's refrain, like a delicate tattoo that preserves the memory of a distant love. On the bottom, an elegant metal band bears the original score engraved: small musical notes dance along the metal, ready to play silently every time you look at them.
The nib, in high-quality steel, glides over the paper with the same lightness of a sigh, inviting you to stop your sweetest thoughts.

An invitation to write with your heart, with the Reginella pen, every word becomes a dedication, every signature a small serenade. It is a tribute to music, poetry and those heartbeats that sometimes remain only songs whispered in memory.

title: Delta Majestic Limited Edition Fountain Pen
description:
The limited edition Delta Majestic fountain pen has a translucent purple barrel, complemented by a purple resin cap, grip, and removable blind cap. It has an internal piston mechanism, gold-plated trim, a large purple ebonite feed, and an oversized #8 JoWo 14k gold nib.

Works of craftsmanship enclosed in a one-of-a-kind prestigious fountain pen. Crafted from a hand-turned translucent resin barrel, each pen is an individual work of art, carefully polished inside and out to ensure crystal clarity and a flawless finish. This meticulous workmanship not only enhances the beauty of the resin, but also offers a fascinating view of the internal mechanism, a fixed piston made in house, transforming each writing into a visual as well as tactile experience.

The heart of this fountain pen is its writing unit: the large number #8 nib in 14-carat gold accompanied by a special feeder, number #8, an essential component to guarantee a constant and precise ink flow. The feeder is made of ebonite the same color as the pen and produced in house with the same attention to detail, a perfect balance between functionality and aesthetics. Ebonite, chosen for its excellent conduction properties and durability, adds a touch of sophistication and durability, ensuring that your fountain pen is not just a writing instrument, but a life companion.

Perfect for collectors and handwriting enthusiasts, this fountain pen is more than just a writing instrument: it is a symbol of refinement and personal style. Each Majestic fountain pen comes with a complementary bottle of purple ink.

Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy. This Majestic fountain pen is limited to 188 worldwide.

title: Delta NAPOLI Fountain Pen (Special Edition)
description:
The new NAPOLI fountain pen from Delta has a stunning resin body with swirls of shimmering gold and blue. The centerband has a wave design to go along with the ocean motif.  

This fountain pen uses a threaded standard international converter, has gold-plated trim, and a gold-plated #6 JoWo steel nib. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy.

This special edition is only available at Goulet Pens, and each one is individually numbered with a 3-digit number.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Delta Neo Gallery Fountain Pen - Iris
description:
Delta is thrilled to introduce the Neo Gallery — Four Rings collection, a new chapter in their celebrated Delta Gallery series. This collection brings a fresh perspective, blending artistic heritage with modern sophistication.

The Four Rings are more than just design elements; they symbolize universal concepts that celebrate creativity and self-expression. Each golden ring represents a core value:

  • Creativity – The power to transform thoughts into art, words into emotions. Each pen in the Neo Gallery collection is an invitation to leave your unique mark on the world.

  • Expression – A reflection of individuality. With vibrant colors and contemporary designs, these pens become a medium for sharing thoughts, dreams, and aspirations.

  • Modernity – A symbol of refined elegance and innovation. The Four Rings seamlessly complement the sleek design, offering a cutting-edge writing experience.

  • Freedom – The boundless opportunity to explore, create, and write your own story. Every stroke of the pen breathes life into your ideas, unrestricted and uninhibited.

With the Neo Gallery — Four Rings collection, we aim to inspire you to write, sketch, and create. Experience the beauty of innovation and immerse yourself in the joy of self-expression with a writing instrument that is as much a work of art as it is a companion to your thoughts.

This purple and yellow resin fountain pen is accented by gold trim and a matching nib. The stainless steel #6 fountain pen nib is made by the German brand JoWo. In addition to several standard nib sizes, there is also a flex nib variant that allows you to alter the line thickness by varying the pressure applied to the nib. It fills via cartridge (included) / converter, allowing you to use bottled ink.

Delta, the renowned Italian pen brand that has been creating stunning and distinct pens since the 1980s, has made a triumphant return after it ceased operations in the 2010s. This new Delta brand has been personally revitalized by Nino Marino, one of Delta's co-founders who also owns and manages Maiora and Nettuno pen brands. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy, and is individually numbered.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Delta Neo Gallery Fountain Pen - Marigold
description:
Delta is thrilled to introduce the Neo Gallery — Four Rings collection, a new chapter in their celebrated Delta Gallery series. This collection brings a fresh perspective, blending artistic heritage with modern sophistication.

The Four Rings are more than just design elements; they symbolize universal concepts that celebrate creativity and self-expression. Each golden ring represents a core value:

  • Creativity – The power to transform thoughts into art, words into emotions. Each pen in the Neo Gallery collection is an invitation to leave your unique mark on the world.

  • Expression – A reflection of individuality. With vibrant colors and contemporary designs, these pens become a medium for sharing thoughts, dreams, and aspirations.

  • Modernity – A symbol of refined elegance and innovation. The Four Rings seamlessly complement the sleek design, offering a cutting-edge writing experience.

  • Freedom – The boundless opportunity to explore, create, and write your own story. Every stroke of the pen breathes life into your ideas, unrestricted and uninhibited.

With the Neo Gallery — Four Rings collection, we aim to inspire you to write, sketch, and create. Experience the beauty of innovation and immerse yourself in the joy of self-expression with a writing instrument that is as much a work of art as it is a companion to your thoughts.

This Marigold green and yellow resin fountain pen is accented by gold trim and a matching nib. The stainless steel #6 fountain pen nib is made by the German brand JoWo. In addition to several standard nib sizes, there is also a flex nib variant that allows you to alter the line thickness by varying the pressure applied to the nib. It fills via cartridge (included) / converter, allowing you to use bottled ink.

Delta, the renowned Italian pen brand that has been creating stunning and distinct pens since the 1980s, has made a triumphant return after it ceased operations in the 2010s. This new Delta brand has been personally revitalized by Nino Marino, one of Delta's co-founders who also owns and manages Maiora and Nettuno pen brands. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy, and is individually numbered.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Delta Oro di Amalfi Fountain Pen (Limited Edition)
description:
Inspired by the radiant light and vivid colors of the Amalfi Coast, the Delta Oro di Amalfi captures the essence of Mediterranean beauty through the artistry of Italian craftsmanship.

Created from the historical Delta archives, this masterpiece combines rare orange celluloid with sea-toned resin, harmonizing the warmth of the sun with the cool depths of the sea. Its refined silhouette and balanced design evoke the natural grace of the Amalfi landscape.

Fitted with a 14K gold nib made by JoWo in Germany the Oro di Amalfi offers a writing experience as smooth and timeless as its inspiration. It's outfitted with a standard international cartridge/converter filling system (threaded converter included), and comes packed with a 30ml bottle of Delta Blue ink. A tribute to elegance, heritage, and artistry — limited to only 68 pieces worldwide, and each pen is individually numbered.

Each pen is handmade in Delta's factory in Naples, Italy. 

Click to shop all compatible long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Delta POMPEII Fountain Pen (Special Edition)
description:
The new POMPEII fountain pen from Delta has a black body with subtle stripes and a red swirled cap, complemented with silver trim and a silver nib. The center band has a red ring. 

This fountain pen uses a threaded standard international converter (included), has silver trim, and a silver #6 JoWo steel nib. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy and comes with a bottle of Delta red ink. 

This special edition color is only available at Goulet Pens, and each pen is individually numbered on the bottom of the cap, opposite of the clip.

title: Delta Prestige Limited Edition Fountain Pen
description:
The limited edition Delta Prestige fountain pen has a translucent grey barrel, complemented by a glossy grey resin cap, grip, and removable blind cap. It has an internal piston mechanism, ruthenium-plated trim, a large blue ebonite feed, and an oversized ruthenium-plated #8 JoWo 14k gold nib.

Works of craftsmanship enclosed in a one-of-a-kind prestigious fountain pen. Crafted from a hand-turned translucent resin barrel, each pen is an individual work of art, carefully polished inside and out to ensure crystal clarity and a flawless finish. This meticulous workmanship not only enhances the beauty of the resin, but also offers a fascinating view of the internal mechanism, a fixed piston made in house, transforming each writing into a visual as well as tactile experience.

The heart of this fountain pen is its writing unit: the large number #8 nib in 14-carat gold accompanied by a special feeder, number #8, an essential component to guarantee a constant and precise ink flow. The feeder is made of ebonite the same color as the pen and produced in house with the same attention to detail, a perfect balance between functionality and aesthetics. Ebonite, chosen for its excellent conduction properties and durability, adds a touch of sophistication and durability, ensuring that your fountain pen is not just a writing instrument, but a life companion.

Perfect for collectors and handwriting enthusiasts, this fountain pen is more than just a writing instrument: it is a symbol of refinement and personal style. Each Prestige fountain pen comes with a complementary bottle of black ink.

Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy. This Prestige fountain pen is limited to 188 worldwide.

title: Delta Signs of Time Fountain Pen - Cave Painting (Special Edition)
description:
We celebrate the power of art through time. The Delta Signs of Time collection of twelve fountain pens masterfully pays tribute, through design details and materials, to the most important artistic movements that have influenced global culture. This collection is a bridge between the tradition of art and a passion for elegance.

Cave paintings represent the earliest known form of artistic communication, to the origins of human creativity. Drawn on the walls of caves thousands of years ago, these images represent hunting scenes, human figures, and animals, capturing the connection between primitives and their world. Each painted line tells stories of survival, spirituality, and a deep bond with nature. Cave art is a testament to the human desire to leave a mark, to convey emotions, and to communicate with the unseen. This fountain pen, inspired by the simplicity and primal strength of cave art, is the essence of humanity’s first artistic expression into its design. Its colors echo the earthy tones of soil and rock, paying tribute to an artistic tradition that paved the way for creative expression across millennia.

This blue/brown/orange fountain pen is accented by silver trim and a matching nib. The stainless steel #6 fountain pen nib is made by the German brand JoWo. In addition to several standard nib sizes, there is also a flex nib variant that allows you to alter the line thickness by varying the pressure applied to the nib. It fills via cartridge or converter (one is included), allowing you to use bottled ink.

Delta, the renowned Italian pen brand that has been creating stunning and distinct pens since the 1980s, has made a triumphant return after it ceased operations in the 2010s. Classical Greek-Roman art represents the pinnacle of the quest for harmony, proportion, and perfection. This artistic movement gave rise to masterpieces that blend aesthetics and storytelling, celebrating mythology, nature, and human life through images of extraordinary elegance and refinement. A symbol of the balance between creativity and rationality, classical art established the standards of beauty that have inspired generations of artists. Its compositions are a journey into the ideal, an ode to the pursuit of formal and spiritual perfection.

description:

The Delta Signs of Time collection of twelve fountain pens masterfully pays tribute, through design details and materials, to the most important artistic movements that have influenced global culture. Medieval art emerged in a deep contrast’s era, where the light of spirituality illuminated a world cloaked in shadows. Laden with symbolism and mysticism, medieval works tell stories of redemption and sacrifice, exploring the tension between the earthly and the divine. Dark frescoes, stained glass windows filtering ethereal light, and gilded illuminated manuscripts, evoke a universe where art was not merely decoration, but a bridge between humanity and the unseen. Stylized figures, abstract backgrounds, and enigmatic compositions convey a deep sense of devotion and reverent awe. This fountain pen captures the dark and intense tones of the era. Its design echoes the gothic details and profound hues of cathedrals and manuscripts, paying tribute to an art form that left an indelible mark on the folds of time.

title: Delta Signs of Time Fountain Pen - Renaissance (Special Edition)
description:

The Delta Signs of Time collection of twelve fountain pens masterfully pays tribute, through design details and materials, to the most important artistic movements that have influenced global culture. The Renaissance marks a time of extraordinary transformation, where man returns to the center of the universe and art becomes the voice of a new vision of the world. Drawing inspiration from classical antiquity but with an innovative drive, Renaissance artists celebrate beauty, knowledge, and harmony, creating masterpieces that blend science and poetry.Perspective revolutionizes pictorial space, bringing depth and realism to compositions, while intricate details become tools to exalt nature and the perfection of the human form. Renaissance art tells the story of an aspiration for earthly perfection, always intertwined with a spiritual dimension, elevating the everyday to a symbol of eternity. This fountain pen embodies the elegance and grace of an era that defined the standards of art and culture. Tones reminds of frescoes and the works of the great masters; each stroke is a tribute to the creative genius that changed the course of history.

title: Delta Spaccanapoli Fountain Pen - Ciliegia (Special Edition)
description:
Spaccanapoli, one of the oldest and most iconic streets in Naples, Italy, is not only a place rich in history and culture, but also a source of inspiration for artists and creatives. From this breathtaking backdrop, this exclusive collection of writing instruments is born, each reflecting the essence and spirit of Spaccanapoli. These pens are not simple writing instruments, but true pieces of art, designed to capture the lively atmosphere and unique hues of the city of Naples.

This Delta Spaccanapoli fountain pen was hand turned from a single bar of flecked burgundy red resin, that also has blue throughout. Ciliegia is Italian for "cherry". It features a gunmetal clip with a roller, and elegant trim rings with a subtle blue accent. This color is a Goulet Pens exclusive, limited run! 

It is fitted with a standard international converter and also accepts standard international ink cartridges. The gunmetal stainless steel #6 fountain pen nib is made by the German brand JoWo. In addition to several standard nib sizes, there is also a flex nib variant that allows you to alter the line thickness by varying the pressure applied to the nib.

Delta, the renowned Italian pen brand that has been creating stunning and distinct pens since the 1980s, has made a triumphant return after it ceased operations in the 2010s. This new Delta brand has been personally revitalized by Nino Marino, one of Delta's co-founders who also owns and manages Maiora and Nettuno pen brands. Each pen is handmade in Naples, Italy, and is individually numbered.

title: Diplomat Aero Fountain Pen - Cranberry/Gold (Special Edition)
description:

This cranberry red Diplomat Aero fountain pen features a lacquered Zeppelin-inspired body with groove-like depressions on the barrel and cap. It has a satisfying soft sliding click cap that posts securely onto the barrel when writing. It features a smooth writing #6 JoWo two-tone stainless steel nib, a matte gold-plated grip and trim, and fills via standard international cartridge/converter (both are included).

It has a satisfying soft sliding click cap that posts securely onto the barrel when writing. It features a smooth writing #6 JoWo nib in stainless steel, a matte gunmetal grip and trim, and fills via standard international cartridge/converter (both are included).

Forged in fire, designed for innovation. Each pen is individually set under a blowtorch, ensuring a unique style on every fine writing instrument. Clear lacquer is applied during the finishing touches to offer a stunning sheen on the body of each pen. The hues and textures are truly original, and any pen lover is sure to appreciate the craftsmanship.

title: Diplomat Aero Fountain Pen - Funky (Special Edition)
description:
A new very limited Diplomat Aero is here! It has a satisfying soft sliding click cap that posts securely onto the barrel when writing. It features a smooth writing #6 JoWo silver stainless steel nib, a matte black grip and trim, and fills via standard international cartridge/converter (both are included).

From Diplomat: Unlike other models in the Aero range, the Aero Funky features a smooth surface, offering an exceptional grip and fluidity. But its true distinction lies in its double surface treatment: PVD + Niobium.
 
Niobium is a rare metal often used in jewelry and the aerospace industry for its ability to create unique color effects. Combined with PVD treatment, it gives the Aero Funky a stunning finish with ever-changing reflections of violet, blue, green, depending on the light and viewing angle. A truly unique and mesmerizing result.

The Aero Funky is only being produced once, so quantities are very limited and it is a true special edition! Get yours before they are gone for good! 

Note: The converter you receive may vary from what is pictured here.

description:

The pen’s streamlined form is complemented by a precisely engineered nib, designed to offer a smooth and effortless writing experience. 

This blue chiseled metal fountain pen also has a satisfying soft sliding magnetic cap with matching blue trim. The hooded stainless steel nib comes in size Fine/Medium, and the pen fills via standard international cartridge/converter (both are included).

Despite its premium appearance, the Diplomat Viper is designed to offer exceptional value for a controlled budget, making it accessible to both pen enthusiasts and professionals seeking a high-quality tool.

title: Diplomat XO Fountain Pen - Camel Leather (Limited Edition)
description:
Drawing inspiration from the world of luxury cognacs, the name “XO” represents. Extra Old, a term reserved for the most refined and exceptional creations. The pen’s cigar-inspired design with his clipless cap flowing seamlessly into the barrel, encapsulates this spirit. The XO belongs in the realm of classic leather club chairs, iconic designers, poker tables, and fine cigar lounges; a world where elegance reigns supreme.

The XO Camel Leather embodies the perfect fusion of design and material.
Its genuine camel leather, carefully applied by hand, evokes the warmth of gentlemen’s lounges, classic car interiors, and the timeless elegance of 1970s design.
A statement piece where every detail breathes luxury.

This edition of the XO is a true collector’s item, limited to just 555 individually numbered pieces worldwide. The 555 collection echoes the art of triple refinement found in the world’s finest spirits; a nod to the X.O’s inspiration drawn from the culture of rare cognacs and refined craftsmanship. Owning the XO means more than acquiring a pen; it’s writing a story as unique as its design.

It comes with a two-tone steel #6 JoWo nib. Also included is a standard international converter inside of the pen.

Each pen will come in a custom metal box with a handcrafted rigid leather case, designed exclusively for this edition.

title: Esterbrook Estie Bestie Fountain Pen - Bubble Gum Pink
description:
The Esterbrook Bestie Collection celebrates friendship, fun, and a shared love of pinks and purples through two joyful fountain pens: Bubble Gum Pink and Sugar Plum Purple.

Bubble Gum Pink is a rich blend of deep pinks, fuchsia, and soft whites, lively and,expressive without being overpowering. The balance and weight are familiar and comfortable for long writing sessions, journaling, or everyday use.

Each bestie pen is housed in a playful drawer-style box. Inside, you'll discover a soft, furry "bed" for your Bestie, adding an extra layer of charm and collectability to your unboxing experience. It's whimsical, cozy, and perfectly on theme.

The Esterbrook Pen Company, a true American Original, is rewriting its long success story in modern times with a fresh new pen collection based on a complete rebranding. The first new collection is called Estie, a modern day nickname for the brand and a symbol of 1930s nostalgia. The Estie fountain pen is available in a vintage palette of colors.

This flecked pink resin fountain pen has gold trim and has a cushion cap closure. It can be inked with either standard international cartridge or converter (both included) and is equipped with the respected #6 JoWo German gold-plated steel nib.

A sleek clip provides a clean accent for the cap and slides easily into a shirt pocket. A cushion cap closure provides a secondary seal to ensure a wet point. Finally, the fountain pen is equipped with a gold #6 JoWo steel nib in a range of sizes. The Estie fills via standard international cartridge or converter (included).

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Esterbrook Estie Fountain Pen - Botanical Gardens
description:
This comfortably balanced Estie Botanical Gardens is offered in a fountain pen with gold-plated trim. The material is blended and turned acrylic with a mix of colors and a highly-polished finish. A sleek clip provides a clean accent for the cap and slides easily into a shirt pocket. A cushion cap closure provides a secondary seal to ensure a wet point. The Estie fills via standard international cartridge or converter (included).

The Estie fountain pen is equipped with a gold-plated #6 JoWo steel nib. In addition to the normal nib sizes, this pen is also available with select specialty nib grinds including the Journaler, Needle Point:

  • The Journaler Nib, by Gena Salorino, is a medium nib ground to a stub with wide downstrokes and thinner cross-strokes.
  • The Needle Point Nib, by Kirk Speer, is a superfine point that's perfect for smaller writing and Japanese characters.

More on the Botanical Gardens from Esterbrook:

With Spring in the air and the months getting warmer, what better time to celebrate the beauty of nature than with a new pen? Introducing Botanical Garden, the latest from Esterbrook. Using our high-quality acrylic, we have created a pen that doesn’t just
pay homage to springtime gardens –but celebrates them. In each pen, you will find a kaleidoscope of floral accents, from greens to blues, deep reds to oranges, all displayed in a crackle-like pattern that intrigues the eye and inspires the imagination.

Note: JoWo is transitioning their nib designs from the old scroll pattern to a more simple design. Stock is currently mixed; what you receive may not necessarily match what is photographed.

At the turn of the 19th century, the artist Alphonse Mucha was at the height of his career. A fine artist, whose name is now synonymous with the art nouveau style, the Czech Mucha came from an illustration background and became widely and commercially well-known through his advertisements for everything from chocolate to cigarettes to laundry detergent.

Living in Paris, Mucha was also celebrated for his idealized female figures that were often based on Parisian film stars and glitterati, and his work included his years studying, drawing, and painting film actress and icon, Sarah Bernhardt. His portraits of her were printed as large-scale posters heralding his commercial work which took advantage of new advances in printing.

In 1887, the invention of celluloid film paved the way for Mucha to become the first artist to work directly from photography. Thusly, his color palette was often the rich, warm, pastel tones of photographs and he used these hues to create Mucha women with flowing hair that matched the flourish of his gorgeous lettering and typefaces.

Within this range of color emerges a signature eau de nil blue that Mucha used to clothe the women in lush drapery, illuminate the skies behind them, give them wings and surround them with waves of water.

Our newest addition to our core range of Esterbook Estie’s celebrates the innovation of Mucha’s work and his particular shades of blue, blended into a material that reflects the celluloid of pen making past.

Introducing Nouveau Bleu, the latest offering that joins our other classic colors as a permanent part of the Estie lineup.

title: Esterbrook Estie Fountain Pen - Raven
description:

Because of this history, Esterbrook was inspired to create a pen that has all of the subtle, mysterious charm of the intelligent and curious corvid. Introducing the Estie Raven. With its matte black body and matching nib and trim, this pen is a departure from our regular colorway -- but no less exciting.

“The sea once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.” -Jacques Cousteau

Timeless takes time.
And so it is with the coveted coastal treasures that wash ashore during low tides all over the world, known as sea glass. Shaped over many sunrises and sunsets, these bits of colored glass drift for as many as two hundred years, weathering storms in the salt water, tossing and turning, Mother Nature’s own polishing that gives them their characteristically smooth, frosted texture.

Prominent in the Northeastern United States, beaches along the shores of New Jersey and New York can be found teeming with these heirlooms and artifacts of whiskey and spirits, trinkets, medicine bottles, dinnerware, jam jars, old taillights and if fortune finds you, a piece of an antique ink bottle.

First used decoratively at the turn of the last century, beachcombers seek out these little gems giving credence to the statement that one man’s trash is another man’s treasure. A bounty of colors ranging from amber to green, black to pale pink and clear frost to the rarest turquoise blue, make sea glass a highly collectible commodity.

description:

The "Back to the Land" collection celebrates the 1970s era of flower power and free love, drawing inspiration from the decade's return to nature and Americana spirit. This collection is designed to appeal to those who appreciate a retro aesthetic and the hippie ethos, offering a nostalgic journey in writing through its uniquely themed products and packaging.

The Funky Lake is crafted from blue acrylic with gold trim and a brown centerband, all with a classic design. As an added bonus, two free gifts are included: a magnetic pen loop in a contrasting color, and a sample of ink.

A sleek clip provides a clean accent for the cap and slides easily into a shirt pocket. A cushion cap closure provides a secondary seal to ensure a wet point. The Incredible Rock is crafted from brown acrylic with gold trim and a blue centerband, all with a classic design. As an added bonus, two free gifts are included: a magnetic pen loop in a contrasting color, and a citrus-scented air freshener.

A sleek clip provides a clean accent for the cap and slides easily into a shirt pocket. A cushion cap closure provides a secondary seal to ensure a wet point. Finally, the fountain pen is equipped with a gold #6 JoWo steel nib. Most exciting of this release is the button piston mechanism for the Incredible Rock release. With a simple press, you can fill your pen for an easy, mess-free experience.

title: Esterbrook Estie Piston Fountain Pen - Raven
description:
Ravens have long held an almost mystical fascination in the human psyche. From Edgar Allen Poe to Norse mythology, depictions of ravens have long interested our storytelling.

Because of this history, Esterbrook was inspired to create a pen that has all of the subtle, mysterious charm of the intelligent and curious corvid. Introducing the Estie Raven. With its matte black body and matching nib and trim, this pen is a departure from our regular colorway -- but no less exciting.

This comfortably balanced Estie Raven, part of the regular lineup, is offered in a fountain pen with black trim. A sleek clip provides a clean accent for the cap and slides easily into a shirt pocket. A cushion cap closure provides a secondary seal to ensure a wet point. Finally, the fountain pen is equipped with a black #6 JoWo steel nib. Most exciting of this release is the button piston mechanism for the Raven release. With a simple press, you can fill your pen for an easy, mess-free experience. This is the latest in a suite of new innovations from the brand and we are excited to debut it with the Raven!

title: Esterbrook JR Pocket Fountain Pen - Fantasia (Limited Edition)
description:
﻿This limited edition, sparkling translucent blue resin pocket-sized fountain pen is the Esterbrook JR, short for "J Reborn". A modern take on a vintage classic, it is complemented by gold-plated trim. It fills via standard international cartridge/converter (included) and has a gold-plated JoWo #5 stainless steel nib.

From Esterbrook:

In music, a fantasia is a mixing of styles that create a cohesive piece. It’s a blending of seemingly nonobvious forms that create a symphony that can be appreciated, enjoyed, or even hated. But, it evokes a strong emotion, like all great art.

And, really, is writing so different?

Many of us compose our own masterpieces on paper every day. We take from one source and cut, paste, rip, and tear to build something harmonious, seemingly out of nothing. And then, just when it’s about finished, we leave a little blank space to write our own story. And yes, this often evokes strong emotions, too.

The new Limited Edition Fantasia JR lets you improve and innovate any way you want to the beat of your own drum.

The “J” was the original Esterbrook’s sleek and suave, classic 1940’s and 50’s pocket pen that appealed to the practicality of the times. It was the perfect pen for both men and women, and we think it still is today. Our new “JR” model, introduced as part of our revival of the Esterbrook brand and added to our core line of collections, is stylish and refined without being too fancy. It’s meant to match your style, as nicely as it graces your hand. With an elegant design, that isn’t fussy, it is compact in size, so you can always have one on hand and with you on the go, wherever you go.

Both the German JoWo nib and the top of the pen have been engraved with the Esterbrook Eternity symbol.

title: Esterbrook JR Pocket Fountain Pen - Twinkle
description:
The Twinkle JR adds sparkle to your writing with its translucent body and dazzling white accents. Compact and charming, this JR pen blends whimsical design with reliable performance. Whether journaling or drafting notes, it’s a perfect balance of elegance and playfulness. Let this shimmering pen brighten your collection and inspire creativity in every stroke.

A modern take on a vintage classic, it is complemented by gold-plated trim. It fills via standard international cartridge/converter (included) and has a gold-plated JoWo #5 stainless steel nib.

title: Esterbrook Model J Fountain Pen - Blackberry
description:
This purple ebonite fountain pen is the Esterbrook Model J. It comes with gold-plated trim and a gold-plated JoWo #6 stainless steel nib. A modern take on a vintage classic. It fills via standard international cartridge/converter (included). In addition to the normal nib sizes, this pen is also available with select specialty nib grinds including the Journaler.

The Journaler Nib, by Gena Salorino, is a medium nib ground to a stub with wide downstrokes and thinner cross-strokes.

From Esterbrook:

Drawing inspiration from vintage aesthetics, the Model J encapsulates the essence of timeless design. With its sleek silhouette and meticulous attention to detail, this penpays homage to Esterbrook's rich heritage while embracing modern functionality. Crafted to exude understated elegance, the Model J seamlessly combines vintage charm with contemporary appeal, making it a versatile accessory for any writing enthusiast.

Ebonite, renowned for its durability and tactile warmth, serves as the perfect material for the Model J. Derived from hardened rubber, ebonite offers a unique writing experience, providing a comfortable grip and smooth writing surface. Its natural luster and rich colors enhance the aesthetic appeal of the pen, while its robust construction ensures longevity and reliability. Embrace the classic allure and superior performance of ebonite with the Model J, a testament to Esterbrook's commitment to craftsmanship and quality.

Encased in slide premium packaging, complete with a vintage-inspired sleeve adorned with Esterbrook factory imagery, the Esterbrook Model J is a timeless treasure waiting to grace your collection. 

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Esterbrook Model J Fountain Pen - Capri Blue
description:
As the newest silhouette in Esterbrook's repertoire, we're thrilled to share that the Model J now comes in an acrylic version! The Model J Chatoyant Acrylics collection comes in three colors.

This blue fountain pen is the Esterbrook Model J in Capri Blue. It comes with gold-plated trim and a gold-plated JoWo #6 stainless steel nib. A modern take on a vintage classic. It fills via standard international cartridge/converter (included).

From Esterbrook:

Introducing the Esterbrook Model J - a timeless masterpiece that gracefully blends vintage charm with modern ingenuity. This pen showcases a seamless fusion of tradition and innovation. Its iconic design, inspired by the beloved 1950's vintage model, pays homage to Esterbrook's rich heritage.

Equipped with a JoWo #6 gold-plated steel nib, this pen promises an exceptional writing performance. Delight in the subtle yet distinctive barrel engraving, adorned with the R.Esterbrook signature logo, while the grip section ensures extended writing comfort.

Encased in slide premium packaging, complete with a vintage-inspired sleeve adorned with Esterbrook factory imagery, the Esterbrook Model J is a timeless treasure waiting to grace your collection.
