title: Esterbrook Model J Fountain Pen - Lotus Green
description:
This green and yellow ebonite fountain pen is the Esterbrook Model J. It comes with gold-plated trim and a gold-plated JoWo #6 stainless steel nib. A modern take on a vintage classic. It fills via standard international cartridge/converter (included). In addition to the normal nib sizes, this pen is also available with select specialty nib grinds including the Journaler, Scribe, and Needle Point.

  • The Journaler Nib, by Gena Salorino, is a medium nib ground to a stub with wide downstrokes and thinner cross-strokes.
  • The Scribe Nib, by Josh Lax, is a modified architect nib with thin downstrokes and thick cross-strokes. 
  • The Needle Point Nib, by Kirk Speer, is a superfine point that's perfect for smaller writing and Japanese characters.

From Esterbrook:

Introducing the Esterbrook Model J - a timeless masterpiece that gracefully blends vintage charm with modern ingenuity. Crafted with exquisite ebonite from Germany, this pen showcases a seamless fusion of tradition and innovation. Its iconic design, inspired by the beloved 1950's vintage model, pays homage to Esterbrook's rich heritage.

Equipped with a Jowo size 6 gold plated nib, available in various sizes, including custom options, this pen promises an exceptional writing performance. Delight in the subtle yet distinctive barrel engraving, adorned with the R.Esterbrook signature logo, while the grip section ensures extended writing comfort.

Encased in slide premium packaging, complete with a vintage-inspired sleeve adorned with Esterbrook factory imagery, the Esterbrook Model J is a timeless treasure waiting to grace your collection.

title: Esterbrook Niblet Fountain Pen - Black Raven
description:
The Esterbrook Niblet's design philosophy is simple: vintage-inspired charm for the everyday carry (EDC) community. Coming in several core colorways and fitted with a #6 Jowo nib, fans of the Estie will find the Niblet familiar, yet offering something new to love.

Big things come in small packages—and the Niblet proves it. A compact, clipless companion to the Estie, it’s built for those on the go who still value craftsmanship and style. Staying true to Esterbrook’s core design principles, the Niblet offers a bold new way to experience fine writing in a smaller, more portable form.

With its vintage-inspired design, the Niblet is packaged to impress. Each pen comes nestled in a premium retro box that nods to classic stationery sets, complete with a soft felt pen pouch for added protection. Practical as well as stylish, customers will love this bonus "gift" with every purchase! This pen is all black and very sleek.

Every part of the Niblet was taken into consideration for our customers. For one, this pen model is equipped with a #6 Jowo nib (in contrast to the JR's #5). This makes for a broader writing appeal and interchangeability with collectors' Esties. Further, the Niblet is equipped with a Mini converter, a slightly smaller converter to match the pen's diminutive size.  A black standard international short cartridge is also included.

title: Esterbrook x BUNGUBOX Estie Fountain Pen - Kingfisher (Limited Edition)
description:
Esterbrook is thrilled to release their latest collaboration with BUNGUBOX Japan: the Kachofugetsu Kingfisher Fountain Pen—a celebration of beauty, nature, and the art of writing.

In Japanese, Kachofugetsu (花鳥風月)—Flower, Bird, Wind, and Moon—is a timeless expression honoring the natural world and its seasonal rhythms. Each release in this series is inspired by one of these elements and designed in collaboration with Kaoru Yamagishi, founder of BUNGUBOX, one of Japan’s most beloved pen boutiques. The new Kingfisher Edition pays tribute to the vibrant bird known for its jewel-like feathers and graceful flight along riversides.

Crafted in the U.S. from DiamondCast resin, the body of the pen features a stunning interplay of deep teal, warm copper, and soft black—mirroring the iridescent elegance of the kingfisher in motion. Gold-plated trim and a matching converter complete the design, along with a special gold-plated nib engraved with the Japanese character for “bird.”

Every detail of this collection has been thoughtfully considered for to bring the ethos of this limited edition collection to life.

With a #6 JoWo German gold-plated steel nib and Esterbrook’s renowned cushioned inner cap system, this pen promises a smooth writing experience. The Estie fills via standard international cartridge or converter (included).

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of this unique material, there will be variation in the patterns and colors seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Esterbrook X Peanuts 75th Anniversary Edition Fountain Pen - Charlie Brown (Special Edition)
description:
Founded in 1858 in Camden, NJ, Esterbrook became one of America’s leading pen makers, trusted by presidents, educators, artists, and everyday writers. Our pens were staples in schools, offices, and studios, known for their quality and accessibility. Revived in the 21st century, Esterbrook now combines its heritage with modern design. The Peanuts collaboration connects two cultural icons and marks the start of a long-term partnership, with new accessories and products beyond pens.

Charles M. Schulz, the creator of Peanuts, used Esterbrook pens exclusively to bring his beloved characters to life. From the very first sketches, these pens were the tools that shaped Snoopy, Charlie Brown, and the rest of the Peanuts world. Both Esterbrook and Peanuts share deep roots in mid-century American culture, embodying creativity, optimism, and timeless storytelling that still resonate today.

This Esterbrook X Peanuts 75th Anniversary Edition Fountain Pen - Charlie Brown is a special edition yellow, black and white pen that comes with  a #6 JoWo German gold-plated steel nib, engraved with "Good Grief!" on the nib. 

The pen comes with a mini t-shirt (which is a polishing cloth), a converter, and an ink cartridge. Additional items pictured are sold separately. 

Click to shop all compatible long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Faber-Castell Hexo Fountain Pen - Bronze
description:
With its hexagonal shape and feel, the Faber-Castell Hexo fountain pen brings an entirely new perspective to the world of creative writing.

The Hexo Fountain Pen features an anodized aluminum barrel in a sophisticated bronze color. The anodizing treatment forms a protective outer layer of oxide that gives the pen its special color and makes it even more robust.

The pen features a smooth flowing stainless steel nib in complementary black. It is equipped with a cartridge/converter system and is fitted with 1 royal blue ink cartridge. Converter sold separately.

Iconic Faber-Castell Jousting Knights are embossed and prominently displayed on the top of the detachable cap. The cap features a stable lacquered metal clip in black. It easily pulls off and posts on the back end of the pen while writing if desired. The pen has a balanced weight with and without the cap.

description:

title: Faber-Castell Poly Fountain Pen - Black
description:
Introducing The Poly collection from Faber-Castell! This fountain pen features a non-slip, soft-touch barrel with ergonomic triangular grip zone. Each pen comes with a stainless steel nib, and the pen can be posted while writing.  It is equipped with a cartridge/converter system, and the pen comes with 1 royal blue ink cartridge. Converter sold separately to use with bottled ink.

Plastic parts of the product are made with 64% recycled materials, making it an eco-friendly choice.

title: Ferris Wheel Press Harry Potter Carousel Fountain Pen & Ink Set - Gryffindor (Special Edition)
description:
The beloved everyday writer, now enchanted with House spirit. This special edition of the Carousel Fountain Pen brings the magic of Harry Potter™ to life in four vibrant House colors — each one a declaration of honor.

Each fitted with a high-quality gold plated No.5 steel nib featuring the Hogwarts™ crest in brilliant gold plating, this pen is approachable yet elevated — perfect for journaling, sketching, and writing home to muggles.

With its smooth-writing 0.55mm medium line weight, and infinitely refillable converter system, it’s designed to grow with every writer, from curious beginners to seasoned scribes. Whether you’re starting your journey or adding to your collection, this enchanted edition is ready to cast your creativity onto the page.

This Gryffindor set comes with a 10ml bottle of matching ink and a standard international converter inside the barrel. They will also accept standard international long cartridges, or can be converted to an eyedropper.

title: Ferris Wheel Press Harry Potter Carousel Fountain Pen & Ink Set - Ravenclaw (Special Edition)
description:
The beloved everyday writer, now enchanted with House spirit. This special edition of the Carousel Fountain Pen brings the magic of Harry Potter™ to life in four vibrant House colors — each one a declaration of honor.

Each fitted with a high-quality gold plated No.5 steel nib featuring the Hogwarts™ crest in brilliant gold plating, this pen is approachable yet elevated — perfect for journaling, sketching, and writing home to muggles.

With its smooth-writing 0.55mm medium line weight, and infinitely refillable converter system, it’s designed to grow with every writer, from curious beginners to seasoned scribes. Whether you’re starting your journey or adding to your collection, this enchanted edition is ready to cast your creativity onto the page.

This Ravenclaw set comes with a 10ml bottle of matching ink and a standard international converter inside the barrel. They will also accept standard international long cartridges, or can be converted to an eyedropper.

title: Ferris Wheel Press Harry Potter Joule Fountain Pen - Gryffindor
description:
At the heart of the Houses of Hogwarts™ collection lies the most enchanting duo— where writing becomes a ritual, and every detail leaves a legacy. 

The Joule Fountain Pen, Ferris Wheel Press’ crowning achievement in writing design, has been transformed to honor the four noble Houses of Hogwarts. Each edition features a custom-etched grip section inspired by House iconography and virtues. Precision-crafted with a solid brass body and finished in radiant House- themed lacquers, the Joule delivers a beautifully weighted writing experience with exceptional balance in hand.

Each Joule has a matching House ink — a gleaming 38ml treasure crowned with a sculpted metal cap, cast in intricate detail to bring each House mascot to life. The ink is sold separately. 

Each pen also comes with a pen sleeve.

Note: Due to the metal threads on the cap, we strongly recommend not posting the cap to avoid scratching the pen body.

Note: The personal views or opinions by the author of the Harry Potter book series do not necessarily reflect the views or opinions of The Goulet Pen Company or its team members.

title: Ferris Wheel Press Lord of the Rings Bijou Fountain Pen & Ink Set - Gandalf
description:
Introducing The Lord of The Rings Special Edition Pen and Ink Set – Gandalf.  This collection transforms writing into an unforgettable experience, celebrating the courage, heroism, and rich storytelling of Tolkien’s legendary trilogy.

Featuring a silver-white metallic Snowfall Lacquer™ body, representing Gandalf the White. Gandalf’s grip is a spiral of fascination with the various iconic accoutrements of this powerful wizard. His staff, sword, and pipe are interwoven with the embroidery from his sleeves. 

Each set includes:

  • TWO gold-plated stainless steel nibs: standard "medium" 0.55mm writing nib PLUS Tengwar Calligraphy nib (similar to a Japanese fude nib). 
  • Dawning Silver 28ml Ink – a cool grey ink with silver shimmer

At the heart of The Bijou lies a No. 5 steel nib; experience smoothness in every stroke. With improved machining and threading accuracy, expect a high-quality instrument that is equipped with a removable feeder unit that allows for easy maintenance.

Each pen features high-quality brass and copper bodies, gold-plated steel nibs, and intricately etched details inspired by iconic characters and scenes. The included Tengwar calligraphy nib allows writers to practice Elvish script.

This pen has a threaded cap and fills via standard international converter, which is included.

Disclaimer: The cap is technically postable on the back of the pen, but it's our recommendation to avoid this since the metal threads on the cap could scratch the finish on the pen body.

title: Ferris Wheel Press Lord of the Rings Bijou Fountain Pen & Ink Set - Ringbearer
description:
Introducing The Lord of The Rings Special Edition Pen and Ink Set – Ringbearer. This collection transforms writing into an unforgettable experience, celebrating the courage, heroism, and rich storytelling of Tolkien’s legendary trilogy.

The pen features a moss green Snowfall Lacquer™ body evoking the verdant glades of the Shire, and etched with symbols and references to Frodo™. Along with the brooch he wears as a gift from the Elves of Lothlorien; the engraving from his sword Sting; and his personal burden, The One Ring, depicted on its chain.

Each set includes:


• TWO gold-plated stainless steel nibs: standard "medium" 0.55mm writing nib PLUS Tengwar Calligraphy nib (similar to a Japanese fude nib).
• Verdant Voyage 28ml Ink – a mossy sun-dappled green ink with fine gold shimmer.

At the heart of The Bijou lies a No. 5 steel nib; experience smoothness in every stroke. With improved machining and threading accuracy, expect a high-quality instrument that is equipped with a removable feeder unit that allows for easy maintenance.

Each pen features high-quality brass and copper bodies, gold-plated steel nibs, and intricately etched details inspired by iconic characters and scenes. The included Tengwar calligraphy nib allows writers to practice Elvish script.

title: Ferris Wheel Press Lord of the Rings Bijou Fountain Pen & Ink Set - Sauron
description:
Introducing The Lord of The Rings Special Edition Pen and Ink Set – Sauron.  This collection transforms writing into an unforgettable experience, celebrating the courage, heroism, and rich storytelling of Tolkien’s legendary trilogy.

Featuring a dark fiery red body and a grip with the gates of Mordor™ bracketed by Sauron's face and Eye. Sauron's grip is etched with the Black Gates of Mordor. Prominent on the grip is the silhouette of his helmet, as depicted in the Prelude to the Fellowship of the Ring, as well as a render of the top of his tower, Barad-Dûr, complete with the Eye’s fiery manifestation.

Each set includes:

  • TWO gold-plated stainless steel nibs: standard "medium" 0.55mm writing nib PLUS Tengwar Calligraphy nib (similar to a Japanese fude nib). 
  • Shadows of Mordor™ 28ml Ink – ominous wine-red ink with gold shimmer

title: Ferris Wheel Press Superman Edition Marquise Fountain Pen & Ink Set - A View From Above
description:
A bold take on a classic, this deep navy Superman Edition Marquise Fountain Pen reflects confidence and composure. The matte sandblasted finish enhances its refined silhouette, while the intricately etched grip adds unique detail and distinction. This fountain pen & ink set comes with a 28ml bottle of Ferris Wheel Press Heroic Blue ink - an iconic Superman blue ink with gold shimmer. Bring confidence and bravery to every stroke.

Meet the Marquise Fountain Pen, as dazzling as a precious gemstone and as refined as nobility, this faceted aluminum instrument transforms your every experience at the desk into a fun and fancy endeavor.

Crafted using state-of-the-art CNC, the Marquise’s unique faceted tapering silhouette is seldom seen in metal writing instruments due to the complexity of its production. The Marquise is a true standout in both form and function. Its aluminum body is beautifully weighted and balanced. Adorned with gold-plated brass details that bring every flourish to life.

The Marquise is equipped with a JoWo housing and a beautiful gold-plated steel nib etched with the Superman logo. Whether you’re sketching caricatures, capturing thoughts, or composing poetic verses, the Marquise adapts to your every whim and inspires endless possibilities.

This pen has a threaded cap and fills via standard international converter, which is included.

description:

Retreat, and dip into the crisp, icy blue of Frozen Fortress.

title: Franklin-Christoph Model 31 Fountain Pen - Boundless Horizon (Limited Edition)
description:
Introducing our seventh exclusive collaboration with Franklin-Christoph! This limited edition Model 31 style fountain pen features a stunning custom blended resin named Bound Horizon. The resin has swirls of red, purple, and cream, with large glitter sparkles throughout. The design is unique in every pen and no two are exactly alike. The resin is made by Jennifer Early of Stormwind's Blanks.

A limited number of pens are available.

The Model 31 pen has a screw-cap to open/close and pushes to post, and has a silver clip. It comes with a standard international converter and fits both short and long standard international cartridges. You can also convert it to eyedropper fill. It is completed with a smooth-writing #6 JoWo nib in a variety of size offerings.

Note: We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, expect some variation in the pattern from what you see here. We’re unable to honor any preferential pattern requests at this time.

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Itoya Blade Fountain Pen - Black
description:
The Itoya Blade® ready-to-write fountain pen is designed for the current generation of writers who want something different. It’s just as easy to use and maintenance-free as a ballpoint pen, but has the pizzazz and wonderful ink flow of a traditional fountain pen. 

The Blade is engineered with a precision fine point nib that is durable enough for everyday use, but refined to provide a consistent and smooth flow of ink as you write on your favorite paper. The sealed ink compartment design requires no messy refilling or ink cartridges; simply discard the pen like a traditional disposable ballpoint pen.

description:

title: Itoya Blade Fountain Pen - LINE FRIENDS Set
description:
The Itoya Blade® ready-to-write fountain pen is designed for the current generation of writers who want something different. It’s just as easy to use and maintenance-free as a ballpoint pen, but has the pizzazz and wonderful ink flow of a traditional fountain pen.

Each box set contains 6 pens featuring LINE FRIENDS minini, globally popular characters from IPX (formerly LINE FRIENDS)! Each pen corresponds to a minini friend, meet them below:

  • On the red pen: meet lenini a peace advocate who spreads happiness with a warm heart!
  • On the green pen: meet selini a self-indulgent and tactless foodie, but strangely not hated!
  •  On the caramel pen: meet bnini a good student who plays along with pranks from friends and helps out when they make mistakes!
  • On the purple pen: meet conini a positive plan enthusiast who always organizes parties to make plans!
  • On the blue pen: meet chonini who loves playing with friends more than anything else!
  • And on the black pen: meet jenini who bakes bread, grooms, and throws cat punches!

The Blade is engineered with a precision fine point nib that is durable enough for everyday use, but refined to provide a consistent and smooth flow of ink as you write on your favorite paper. The sealed ink compartment design requires no messy refilling or ink cartridges; simply discard the pen like a traditional disposable ballpoint pen. Comes pre-filled with blue or black ink.

description:

title: Jinhao 993 Shark Fountain Pen - Matte Blue (#5 Nib)
description:
Attack your writing with a Jinhao Shark fountain pen! This fun plastic pen is a good writer for the beginner or the long-time enthusiast.

This variation has a non-hooded #5 steel nib in medium.

It fills via standard international cartridge/converter (converter included, no ink) or can be converted to be eyedropper-filled. The shark head cap unscrews open and pushes to post. The translucent triangular grip assists in proper pen position. Perfect for kids, the avid shark enthusiast, or anyone who enjoys a fun affordable pen.

By converting this pen to an eyedropper, you can fill the entire barrel with ink for maximum ink capacity! All you need to do is add an o-ring and a small amount of silicone grease to the threads (both available separately).

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Jinhao 999 Dragon Fountain Pen - Black
description:
Grab your shiniest armor, sharpen your sword, and prepare for battle with the epic Jinhao Dragon pen. Tales have long been told of such mythical beasts as these, and now the legend has come alive in this completely over-the-top pen. Two dragons face off against each other with burning red eyes, wrapping their bodies around the pen in three dimensional form. The heft and weight of this pen alludes to the intensity of the battles these dragons face as they fly through the caverns of mystical lands.

This dragon pen is sure to get the attention of anyone in your role-playing guild. Heck, bring it to your next work meeting and you’re sure to be able to gloss over whatever topic you were supposed to have prepared because this hefty piece of work will surely grab all the attention in the room.

Equipped with a #6 nib, you can purchase a Goulet #6 nib to swap yourself if you prefer a different size. You can use standard international cartridges or converter (converter included, no ink). Don your armor, prepare for battle, and conquer your noble quest with this pen of epic proportions!

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Kaweco AL Sport Fountain Pen - Deep Red
description:
The Kaweco AL Sport is a pocket-sized fountain pen that when posted transforms into a full-sized pen that easily fits in your hand. The body and cap are aluminum with an anodized red colored finish. It comes with a stainless steel nib and an ink cartridge to get you started writing right away! It accepts short standard international cartridges. Kaweco converter and optional clip sold separately.

Note: This pen comes with an ink cartridge stored in the body. If it doesn’t fall right out, you can get it loose by giving the body a few solid taps on a hard surface.

title: Kaweco Brass Sport Fountain Pen
description:
The Kaweco Brass Sport is a pocket-sized fountain pen that when posted transforms into a full-sized pen that easily fits in your hand. The brass will pick up its own unique patina and pattern of scuffs and scratches over time as you use and transport the pen, making this version of the Sport truly unique to you. It comes with a stainless steel nib and an ink cartridge to get you started writing right away!

It accepts short standard international cartridges. Kaweco converter and optional clip sold separately.

Note: This pen comes with an ink cartridge stored in the body. If it doesn’t fall right out, you can get it loose by giving the body a few solid taps on a hard surface.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Kaweco Liliput Fountain Pen - Kolibri (Limited Production)
description:
The Kaweco Liliput is a tiny fountain pen that when posted transforms into a full-sized pen that easily fits in your hand. The stainless-steel body is equally as striking as the mesmerizingly shining plumage of different hummingbird species. They get their colorful appearance due to the surface structure of their feathers, known as the phenomenon of interference, where light is reflected. Reminiscent of this play of color, this Kaweco Collection Liliput Kolibri gets its metallic shine thanks to the PVD-plating, a process resulting in various unique colour combinations, making each pen one of a kind.

The cap screws on to the back to post securely, and it accepts short standard international cartridges. Optional clip sold separately. 

A special highlight of the Kolibri is a laser-temperature-treated nib that shimmers in rainbow colors. It also comes with a Kaweco Summer Purple ink cartridge. 

This Liliput is a limited production run and will only be offered for a limited time.

Note: This pen comes with an ink cartridge stored in the body. If it doesn’t fall right out, you can get it loose by giving the body a few solid taps on a hard surface.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

Note: We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Kaweco Perkeo Calligraphy Fountain Pen Set - Blue
description:
This Kaweco Perkeo calligraphy gift set comes with one full sized pen, two additional interchangeable front nib/grip sections, and several ink cartridges. The three silver stainless steel nibs are in sizes 1.1mm stub, 1.5mm stub, and 1.9mm stub.

The Perkeo is an entry-level full-sized pen from Kaweco. The faceted body, grip, and cap are made of resin, and the triangular grip helps keep your fingers in the proper grip position.

The Perkeo accepts standard international ink cartridges, or you can also purchase a standard international converter separately.

title: Kaweco Piston Sport AL Fountain Pen - Black
description:
The Kaweco Sport is a pocket-sized fountain pen that when posted transforms into a full-sized pen that easily fits in your hand. This solid matte black anodized aluminum fountain pen comes with a gold-plated steel nib and a gold-plated clip. As a piston filler, it uses bottled ink only.

Since 1883, there have been various systems for filling a fountain pen. Today, ink cartridges are a widespread and popular filling method. In the past, fountain pens were mainly filled using ink bottles. Besides lever fountain pens and eyedroppers, the piston mechanism has been the most important and reliable filling system. In 1937, the Kaweco Sport fountain pen was first presented as a piston filler under the name #612 and has been further developed in many different versions over the years.

A piston inside the writing instrument allows ink to be drawn directly from the glass into the integrated reservoir. This makes ink cartridges obsolete. The transparent window allows you to keep an eye on the ink level at all times.

Replacement nib units are available separately (note- these nib units are different than the normal Kaweco Sport).

title: Kaweco Supra Fountain Pen - Brass
description:
The Kaweco Supra fountain pen is the big brother of the Liliput and a quick-change artist. A connector piece transforms this pen from a cartridge-only pocket pen to a full-sized converter-accepting pen. The fountain pen's weight and length can be adjusted to meet the individual needs of its user. The minimalistic design is reminiscent of Bauhaus and Braun.

This fountain pen is made entirely out of brass. Brass will become tarnished when in use and develop an individual patina over time. The well-known ECO brass (brass manufactured by the Wieland Werke in Ulm) is lead-free.

It comes with a larger #6 stainless steel nib and an ink cartridge to get you started writing right away! The cap screws on to the back to post securely, and it accepts short standard international cartridges. Standard international converter is available separately. The pen comes packaged in a tin box.

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Kolo Tino Fountain Pen - Acrylic Albert Blue
description:
The Kolo Tino fountain pen is a testament to the elegance of minimalism, designed to conquer new frontiers without sacrificing ergonomic excellence. Its compact form slips easily into pocket or pen case, balanced perfectly in hand, yet never diminishing in its gravitas. A nod to the opulence of 20th-century art deco, the pen’s modern silhouette is a quiet symphony of form and function.

With a German-engineered nib and housing, each stroke feels deliberate and precise, transforming every word into a work of art. Available with a Schmidt #5 Medium steel nib. This Acrylic pen in Albert Blue is a regular edition color. Each pen comes with an ink cartridge so you are ready to write.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Laban 325 Fountain Pen - Lagoon
description:
It’s a lake of paradise, the ultimate tranquility... Laban presents to those who yearn for freedom, the 325 Lagoon. The lagoon is the eye of the sea. The tide eases, fish schools gather, and time is slowing down. Imagine going for a barefoot walk on the beach. The sunshine is gentle, the waves kissing your toes, and the sea is a mix of blue, green, and transparent, reflecting an endless imagination in the light and bringing endless joy. "Lagoon" is the soul’s sincere desire; life finds a place to rest...

The ivory white pen cap and grip of this fountain pen resemble a sandy beach in the sunshine, complemented by the crystal clear turquoise water colors of the barrel. The pattern of each "Lagoon" is absolutely different.

It has a durable gold-plated clip and gold-plated trim, and a gold Laban medallion adorns the top of the cap. The hand-polished, smooth ivory white resin grip section has an appropriate size to ensure a comfortable writing experience.

It comes with a #6 gold-plated steel nib. The German-made gold-tone nib is made of rhodium and stainless steel with the engraved Laban logo and "3952", which is the height of Mount Jade and the symbol of Taiwan, on the nib.

This fountain pen accepts a standard international converter (included), short standard international cartridges, or long standard international cartridges.

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Laban 325 Fountain Pen - Ocean
description:
Standing at the east seashore of Formosa island, and feeling the sea breeze— inspired this Laban 325 Ocean blue fountain pen. The azure blue of the Laban Ocean conveys an open and unruly freedom style. Writing is creating a new chance and preparing to go far, in this vast ocean. Laban Ocean is telling a story about an unruly, brave soul.

The creamy ivory white pen cap and grip of this fountain pen is complemented by the azure blue water colors of the barrel. The pattern of each "Ocean" is absolutely different.

It has a durable gold-plated clip and gold-plated trim, and a gold Laban medallion adorns the top of the cap. The hand-polished, smooth ivory white resin grip section has an appropriate size to ensure a comfortable writing experience.

It comes with a #6 gold-plated steel nib. The German-made gold-tone nib is made of rhodium and stainless steel with the engraved Laban logo and "3952", which is the height of Mount Jade and the symbol of Taiwan, on the nib.

This fountain pen accepts a standard international converter (included), short standard international cartridges, or long standard international cartridges.

description:

Laban presents the 325 Wisteria, a dreamy purple fountain pen. The beautiful ivory white cap and dark purple barrel are both made of acrylic resin and trimmed in gold-plated appointments.

description:
A gift from the sea. The Laban Abalone fountain pen series is made of authentic abalone shells from New Zealand. Beautiful shimmers in a rainbow of swirling iridescent colors, along with the natural spiral votex of the shells, create an irresistibly beautiful pen.

Gunmetal trim, including the clip and grip section, complement the abalone for a sleek, elegant look. The two-tone German-made #6 steel nib is engraved with the Laban logo.

title: Laban Formosa Fountain Pen
description:
Laban pays homage to the mountains and seas with the Formosa fountain pen, inspired by Taiwan's northeast coast. With an image of the ocean between your fingers, you may be inspired to write reflections for a better self, and dreams you will bring to life.

Formosa is made of fine brass with a silver-plated overlay, covering the blue acrylic pen barrel. Turning the pen to see the abstract mountains and sea became the poetic filigree patterns in such a sophisticated pen, which shows Laban’s outstanding manufacturing technique.

Mirroring the torpedo shape pen design, the clip comes to a sharp point at each end. It shows an elegant balance. Laban logo is engraved on the cap band.

The German-made JoWo #6 steel nib is engraved with the Laban logo and a mountain and water image. 

This fountain pen accepts a standard international converter (included), short standard international cartridges, or long standard international cartridges.

title: Laban Mother of Pearl Fountain Pen

Natural, pure, nacreous mother of pearl, an iridescent gift from the ocean. The Laban Mother of Pearl, which is known as a protection stone and a stress-relieving stone, brings you the power of the sea in this fountain pen. Made of true natural mother of pearl and resin lacquer, it is a harmonious and balanced pen. The cap is adorned with a silver clip and cap-top medallion, and the cap band is engraved with the Laban logo.

title: Laban Skeleton Fountain Pen - Gunmetal
description:
The veins of leaves. The skeleton of human beings. They are principles that guide the way to go. Look at the beautiful giant Amazonian lotus; it proves how incredible geometry our nature can do, which inspired Laban to make this beautiful collection.

The poetic filigree pattern is made of fine brass, which shows Laban’s outstanding manufacturing technique and protects the transparent acrylic tube inside the barrel.

With a classic torpedo shape, the brass metal and transparent acrylic structure ensure the lightweight of the fountain pen. It allows you to see the ink in the converter as well.

The Gunmetal Skeleton is low-key and neat. A dark-gray coating faintly shines with matte luster. Every Skeleton pen has its unique look. Write with it creatively, and make something very YOU.

The German-made #6 steel nib is engraved with the Laban logo.

description:

title: LAMY 2000 Fountain Pen - Stainless Steel
description:
This LAMY 2000, LAMY's flagship fountain pen, is made of brushed stainless steel. This pen features a hooded platinum-plated 14k gold nib and uses a piston-filling mechanism to fill from bottled ink. It has a spring-tensioned clip that's also plated in platinum. It's a great option for those who like the format of the 2000 but want a heavier pen and like the all metal look. The LAMY 2000 is so revered that it is on permanent display at the Museum of Modern Art and has won countless design awards.

Note: To ensure quality performance, LAMY tests their pens as a final step in manufacturing. If you happen to see any residual blue ink, rest assured that this is normal.

title: LAMY aion Fountain Pen - black
description:
The LAMY aion is a completely new series of writing instruments, designed by Jasper Morrison. The black body and cap are constructed from solid aluminum, each made from seamless closed components. The body features an anodized matte finish, while the grip has a matte blasted circular-brushed finish. The spring-loaded clip is made from stainless steel with the logo embossed on the side.

A new innovative stainless steel nib with unconventional contours is exclusive to this series, yet interchangeable with the existing LAMY steel nibs. This fountain pen comes with a blue LAMY ink cartridge as well as a LAMY Z27 converter to get you started writing right away!

description:

The triangular grip section makes it great for those starting out who have no idea how to hold a fountain pen, but it's used and loved by fountain pen lovers of all levels of experience.

This muted purple anodized aluminum AL-star features a translucent neon yellow grip section, black trim, and an interchangeable black steel nib, which can be easily swapped out for another size.

description:
In partnership with Warner Bros. Discovery Global Consumer Products (WBDGCP), LAMY is launching its first licensed collection–Harry Potter x LAMY AL-star. With a total of four models, the collection will inspire all writing enthusiasts and creative fans.

The design of the four models is inspired by the four houses of the famous Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Each fountain pen features the unmistakable color scheme of the houses and has a fine engraving and an image of the respective emblem on the cap and barrel.

Gryffindor features a red anodized aluminum body, with a matching red clip and a translucent red resin grip section. title: LAMY dialog cc Fountain Pen - darkblue
description:
The LAMY dialog cc is a revolutionary fountain pen without a cap. Thanks to a fascinating twist mechanism the nib slides elegantly out of the interior of the barrel. The twist-action fountain pen is then ready to write. When the fountain pen is twisted closed, a ball valve automatically moves in front of the opening and protects the retracted nib from drying out and getting dirty.

The dialog cc features a roll stop, in lieu of a clip, creating a minimalistic look. It is slightly shorter than the dialog 3, and features rose gold-plated trim.

This matte dark blue lacquered fountain pen comes with a smooth interchangeable two-tone 14K rose gold nib. It comes with a blue LAMY ink cartridge as well as a proprietary Z27 converter to get you started writing right away. It is set in a gift box with a leather pen slip.

description:
This LAMY Lx ("Luxe") fountain pen features a body made from rose gold colored double-anodized aluminum, a gold-coated clip, a translucent grey triangular grip section, and a black glossy interchangeable steel nib.

There are lot of subtle details on the Lx as an enhancement over the similar AL-star model, including matching metal accents on the cap end and barrel end with a shiny diamond polish, a glossy LAMY logo on the barrel, and the laser engraving on the nib. While slightly different in appearance than the other LAMY steel nibs, they are indeed swappable as well.

This pen comes with a matching rose gold-colored anodized aluminum pen case. It also comes with a blue LAMY ink cartridge so you can get started writing right away. If you'd like to use bottled fountain pen ink, you can also purchase a LAMY Z28 converter.

Note: To ensure quality performance, LAMY tests their pens as a final step in manufacturing. If you happen to see any residual blue ink, rest assured that this is normal.

Click here to shop all compatible LAMY ink cartridges.

title: LAMY nexx Fountain Pen - multi-blue (Special Edition)
description:
For all those who like it comfortable or are learning to write: the LAMY nexx simply lies comfortably in the hand all round and makes even long writing sessions entirely easy. The ergonomic grip is soft and nonslip and ensures relaxed hands over many pages. In addition, it supports an ideal hand position without constricting. The overall feel of the fountain pen is as light as the writing experience itself: the triangular body is made of aluminum and thus has a low weight, is robust and does not roll off the table thanks to its shape.

This 2026 special edition fountain pen has a light and exceptionally sturdy blue aluminum body, darker blue plastic cap and matching grip section, and a teal colored clip. comes with an interchangeable silver steel nib in size A (medium), as well as a blue LAMY ink cartridge so you can get started writing right away. If you'd like to use bottled fountain pen ink, you can also purchase a LAMY Z28 converter.

Note: To ensure quality performance, LAMY tests their pens as a final step in manufacturing. If you happen to see any residual blue ink, rest assured that this is normal.

title: LAMY safari Fountain Pen - all black-multi ring set (Special Edition)
description:
A bold twist on a design icon. This special edition features customizable colored rings - allowing you to add a personal touch to your pen. Mix, match, and swap among the included rings to suit your mood or style. Creativity meets individuality in this versatile update to the classic safari.

The shiny black pen comes with a matching black steel nib, black trim, black grip, and a black accent ring. Six additional accent rings are included in pink, red-orange, light orange, yellow, green, and turquoise.

The LAMY safari is a workhorse pen, known throughout the fountain pen community for its ruggedness, reliability, and no-nonsense functionality. The triangular grip makes it great for those starting out who have no idea how to hold a fountain pen, but it's used and loved by fountain pen lovers of all levels of experience.

The safari comes with an interchangeable black steel nib, which can be easily swapped out for another size. It features a black barrel, cap, grip section and trim. This fountain pen comes with a blue LAMY ink cartridge so you can get started writing right away.

If you'd like to use bottled fountain pen ink, you can also purchase a LAMY Z28 converter.

Note: To ensure quality performance, LAMY tests their pens as a final step in manufacturing. If you happen to see any residual blue ink, rest assured that this is normal.

This LAMY studio fountain pen has a palladium-plated finish with high gloss chrome grip. It has a propeller shaped bright chrome metal clip and a smooth interchangeable two-tone 14k gold nib. This fountain pen comes with a blue LAMY ink cartridge and a Z27 converter for use with bottled ink so you can get started writing right away.

Note: To ensure quality performance, LAMY tests their pens as a final step in manufacturing. If you happen to see any residual blue ink, rest assured that this is normal.

Click here to shop all compatible LAMY ink cartridges.

title: LAMY vista Fountain Pen
description:
This clear demonstrator LAMY vista fountain pen, essentially the clear version of the LAMY safari, has silver trim and an interchangeable silver steel nib. It features a triangular grip for proper hand position when writing. It comes with a blue LAMY ink cartridge to get you started writing right away.

If you'd like to use bottled fountain pen ink, you can also purchase a LAMY Z28 converter.

Note: To ensure quality performance, LAMY tests their pens as a final step in manufacturing. If you happen to see any residual blue ink, rest assured that this is normal.

Click here to shop all compatible LAMY ink cartridges.

title: Magna Carta Mag 1000 Fountain Pen - Black
description:
The Magna Carta Mag 1000 fountain pen is impressive in size with one of the biggest fountain pen nibs available!

It has a classic black and gold design and is crafted with premium ebonite and 24K PVD gold plated trim. Its massive #10 steel nib is available in Fine and Medium. Each pen comes with an ebonite feed housing and a standard international converter. This pen can also be converted to be eyedropper-filled.

Click to shop all compatible long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Magna Carta Mag 500 Fountain Pen - Lilac Gold (Special Edition)
description:
A Goulet exclusive, limited production run!

The compact Magna Carta Mag 500 fountain pen is smaller than its Mag 600 sibling, with a #5 Magna Carta 14K True Flex Nib and an ebonite feed housing. A unique and desirable flex nib that effortlessly transitions between intricate detail and wide strokes.

It is crafted from a white resin with swirls of royal purple and shimmering gold throughout, complemented by 24K PVD gold plated trim. It comes with a removable slide-on gold-plated clip.

The Mag 500 fountain pen fills with bottled ink via eyedropper only. A glass eyedropper is included in the gift box.

title: Magna Carta Mag 600 Fountain Pen - "Modern Raden" Blue/Black (Special Edition)
description:
A Goulet exclusive, special edition!

The Magna Carta Mag 600 fountain pen is impressive in size with a unique and desirable flex nib! This unique fountain pen is crafted with alternating bands of blue-purple faux-raden cut into a black resin barrel, and 24K PVD gold plated trim. Its impressive dimensions provide a comfortable and balanced grip.

Boasting a #6 Magna Carta 14K True Flex Nib and an ebonite feed housing, the Mag 600 flex nib effortlessly transitions between intricate detail and wide strokes. Each pen comes with a standard international converter. This pen can also be converted to be eyedropper-filled.

title: Maiora Everest Fountain Pen - Celestia
description:
The new Maiora Everest – The Majesty of Writing!

Overcoming limits is in human nature. Everest, born in the Maiora workshops, is not just a fountain pen: it is a feat of engineering and craftsmanship; it is the first “giant” fountain pen in the world that adopts a fixed piston, innovative in terms of its generous dimensions, called “Mega Piston”, designed to guarantee unprecedented ink capacity and an uninterrupted writing experience: 5ml ink.

Each example is born from entirely artisanal workmanship: precious and embellished materials, hand turned from solid bar; Everest is the result of great technical commitment, precision and dedication, combining elegance and technique in an imposing and exclusive form.

Like the mountain from which it takes its name, Everest rises above all other fountain pens, embodying the pinnacle of creativity and craftsmanship.

This fountain pen is made entirely of blue, black and tan ebonite hand-turned from a solid bar and mirror polished. The pen comes with a 14k #8 gold nib with an ebonite feed. Each pen is numbered on the base of the cap, and handmade in Italy. It comes with a pen slip/sleeve and a bottle of blue ink. 

Maiora's legacy dates back to 1978 and is the result of a collaboration of skilled professionals with over 40 years of experience in crafting exquisite writing instruments. The brand's steadfast commitment to "made in Italy" authenticity, coupled with a perfect balance of functionality and elegance, has created a timeless style that is synonymous with Maiora's success. The brand's strengths are rooted in experience, passion, and enthusiasm, as evident in the stories and craftsmanship of each Maiora pen.

Maiora is managed by Nino Marino, the former co-founder and president of the Delta Pen Company. Maiora also produces fountain pens under the Nettuno brand.

title: Maiora Ogiva Fountain Pen - Astriel (Limited Edition)
description:
This fountain pen is made entirely of fine cellulose acetate, a one-of-a-kind material, recovered from Delta's Historic Materials Archive! It is hand turned from solid bar and comes with a fixed piston ink filling mechanism and a 14k rose gold nib.

The beautiful design captures the depth of space with shades that change under the light: the deep blue of the night, the warm brown of nebulae, the radiant gold of rising stars and shadows as dark as the vastness of infinity.

Each limited edition pen is numbered out of 68, and is 100% handmade in Italy. The Maiora Ogiva Astriel fountain pen is only available at Goulet Pens!

Maiora's legacy dates back to 1978 and is the result of a collaboration of skilled professionals with over 40 years of experience in crafting exquisite writing instruments. title: Monteverde Axis Fountain Pen - Matte Black
description:
The Monteverde Axis fountain pen collection was inspired by the perfection of balance. It features a gear-like midsection that connects to a slim, elongated cap and matching barrel. This prevents the pen from rolling around on your desk. 

The Axis is made of matte black anodized aluminum and is lightweight and comfortable in hand, and available with a JoWo #5 nib in a variety of nib sizes. The Axis fills via a mini converter, and has a magnetic cap.

title: Monteverde Dakota Fountain Pen - Airforce Matte Blue
description:
The Monteverde Dakota fountain pen is compact when closed, but a full-sized pen when posted. The Slip-In cap has an oh-so-satisfying feel. This fountain pen features a matte blue stainless steel barrel and cap, with silver trim and a JoWo #5 steel nib. This is a tribute to the brave Air Force pilots of World War II. This stunning collection commemorates the 80th anniversary of the historic end of World War II, honoring the courage and sacrifice of those who flew into history.

Inspired by the shape of the fuselage of the magnificent Douglas C-47 Skytrain, also known as Dakota, which played a pivotal role during World War II, the Monteverde USA® Dakota collection pays homage to the 80th anniversary of the end of this historic conflict on September 2, 1945. The Dakota aircraft was instrumental during crucial moments of the World War II, most notably on D-Day, June 6, 1944. During this pivotal operation, the C-47 Skytrain was vital in executing Operation Overlord, the Allied invasion of Normandy. It transported thousands of paratroopers, including the 82nd and 101st Airborne Divisions, and delivered essential supplies and equipment to the landing forces.

Ideal for those who appreciate writing instruments that “fly” across every page with ease, the Dakota collection adds satisfaction to every action when in use. Whether you prefer holding the pen by the barrel for comfort or posting it to achieve a full-length writing experience, the Monteverde Dakota is designed to meet your needs. Its pocketable design makes it easy to carry, transforming from a compact pen to a full-sized writing instrument when posted. The Dakota collection is a fitting tribute to the aircraft that soared through history, blending functional elegance with a deep respect for its storied past.

The top of the cap is adorned with an engraved Dakota plane propeller, adding a touch of nostalgia and honoring the legacy of the Dakota plane during this anniversary.

What makes the cap special? The Monteverde Dakota’s innovative SLIP-IN CAP™ is where precision meets function, blending engineering excellence with sensual design to create more than just a pen—it’s an extraordinary experience. Every detail is inspired by the smooth ascent of a plane, allowing the cap to glide effortlessly into place with just a gentle push, delivering an airtight embrace that keeps your ink fresh and ready to flow. This innovative design, unlike traditional screw-on or snap-on mechanisms, offers a seamless blend of functionality and elegance, accentuating the pen’s sleek profile and transforming it into a true companion in your writing journey. Impeccable design and unparalleled performance come together in a luxurious ritual, where every time you close the cap, you're reminded of the power of precision and the beauty of simplicity.

The Dakota features a premium JoWo #5 nib from Germany, renowned for its superior craftsmanship, ink flow, and smooth performance. The nibs are offered in three distinctive point sizes: Extra-Fine, Fine and Medium. JoWo nibs are celebrated for their precision and consistency, providing a luxurious writing experience with every stroke. This high-quality nib enhances the pen’s overall functionality, making it a standout choice.

The fountain pen can easily be filled via standard international short ink cartridges or a full-sized standard international push-in piston converter (included).

The Monteverde Dakota collection pens are elegantly packaged in a luxury gift box with dedicated themed sleeves, making it the perfect gift. All pens in the collection come with the specially designed military green sleeve, reflecting the heritage of the Dakota plane. The sleeve is adorned with a propeller logo and a subtle plane design, paying homage to the iconic aircraft that inspired the collection.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Monteverde Dakota Fountain Pen - Raw Flame
description:
The Monteverde Dakota fountain pen is compact when closed, but a full-sized pen when posted. The Slip-In cap has an oh-so-satisfying feel. This fountain pen features a subtle flame-kissed stainless steel barrel and cap, with silver trim and a JoWo #5 steel nib.

The Raw Flame variant of the Monteverde Dakota is a true masterpiece, achieved through a specialized process of hand-flaming the stainless steel barrel. The metal, when subjected to these high temperatures, creates a unique, one of a kind rainbow effect. As the flame dances across the surface, it produces an extraordinary spectrum of colors that seem to glow from within.

The result is a pen that radiates with an array of iridescent tones, shifting and changing depending on the angle of the light. The colors evoke the intense heat and brilliance of a fire glow, with deep blues, purples, and rich fiery oranges and reds. The process of achieving this finish is incredibly intricate and challenging, requiring a high level of skill and precision. Each Raw Flame pen is unique, as the pattern and distribution of colors are the direct result of the flame’s interaction with the stainless steel, ensuring no two pens are exactly alike.

Due to the complexity of the manufacturing process, minor imperfections can sometimes occur during the hand-flaming, adding even more character and uniqueness to each pen. These slight variations in the finish—whether subtle shifts in color or irregularities in the pattern—are a testament to the handcrafted nature of the pen. Rather than detracting from the overall design, these imperfections contribute to its individuality, ensuring that every Raw Flame Dakota has its own personality, making it impossible to replicate. The pen is finished with chrome trim, which not only complements the hues with its reflective shine but also adds a sleek, modern touch, creating a perfect blend of raw intensity and refined elegance.

Inspired by the shape of the fuselage of the magnificent Douglas C-47 Skytrain, also known as Dakota, which played a pivotal role during World War II, the Monteverde USA® Dakota collection pays homage to the 80th anniversary of the end of this historic conflict on September 2, 1945. The Dakota aircraft was instrumental during crucial moments of the World War II, most notably on D-Day, June 6, 1944. During this pivotal operation, the C-47 Skytrain was vital in executing Operation Overlord, the Allied invasion of Normandy. It transported thousands of paratroopers, including the 82nd and 101st Airborne Divisions, and delivered essential supplies and equipment to the landing forces.

Ideal for those who appreciate writing instruments that “fly” across every page with ease, the Dakota collection adds satisfaction to every action when in use. Whether you prefer holding the pen by the barrel for comfort or posting it to achieve a full-length writing experience, the Monteverde Dakota is designed to meet your needs. Its pocketable design makes it easy to carry, transforming from a compact pen to a full-sized writing instrument when posted. The Dakota collection is a fitting tribute to the aircraft that soared through history, blending functional elegance with a deep respect for its storied past.

Starting from the Dakota’s solid stainless steel cap and barrel, to its German-made nib that effortlessly glides across the page, and ending with the satisfying closing action of the slip-in elongated cap, this pen completes every writing session with joy. The top of the cap is adorned with an engraved Dakota plane propeller, adding a touch of nostalgia and honoring the legacy of the Dakota plane during this anniversary.

What makes the cap special? The Monteverde Dakota’s innovative SLIP-IN CAP™ is where precision meets function, blending engineering excellence with sensual design to create more than just a pen—it’s an extraordinary experience. Every detail is inspired by the smooth ascent of a plane, allowing the cap to glide effortlessly into place with just a gentle push, delivering an airtight embrace that keeps your ink fresh and ready to flow. This innovative design, unlike traditional screw-on or snap-on mechanisms, offers a seamless blend of functionality and elegance, accentuating the pen’s sleek profile and transforming it into a true companion in your writing journey. Impeccable design and unparalleled performance come together in a luxurious ritual, where every time you close the cap, you're reminded of the power of precision and the beauty of simplicity.

The Dakota features a premium JoWo #5 nib from Germany, renowned for its superior craftsmanship, ink flow, and smooth performance. The nibs are offered in three distinctive point sizes: Extra-Fine, Fine and Medium. JoWo nibs are celebrated for their precision and consistency, providing a luxurious writing experience with every stroke. This high-quality nib enhances the pen’s overall functionality, making it a standout choice.

The fountain pen can easily be filled via standard international short ink cartridges or a full-sized standard international push-in piston converter (included).

The Monteverde Dakota collection pens are elegantly packaged in a luxury gift box with dedicated themed sleeves, making it the perfect gift. All pens in the collection come with the specially designed military green sleeve, reflecting the heritage of the Dakota plane. The sleeve is adorned with a propeller logo and a subtle plane design, paying homage to the iconic aircraft that inspired the collection.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

The cool, subdued surface not only highlights the pen’s sleek contours but also serves as a nod to the precision craftsmanship involved in its creation. title: Monteverde Innova Fiberglass Fountain Pen - Amethyst (Special Edition)
description:
In 1999 Monteverde USA® was founded in Canoga Park, California USA with the intention to create writing instruments that feature unparalleled quality, function, and affordable luxury.

A true classic, the Innova™ is one of the first (in a long line of) innovative pens to be designed under the Monteverde USA® name. This Innova is made of Fiberglass, a reinforced plastic material composed of fine glass fibers woven into fabric or used as strands, then combined with resin to create a strong, lightweight, and durable composite. It is widely valued for its strength, versatility, and resistance to environmental factors, making it a popular material across numerous industries.

Advantages of Using Fiberglass in Pens:
- Lightweight yet durable – Stronger than plastic while being lighter than metal, offering a balanced feel.
- Corrosion-resistant – Unlike metal pens, fiberglass won’t rust or tarnish over time.
- Temperature resistant – Doesn’t get too hot or cold like metal pens, making it comfortable for long writing sessions.

This is a Goulet Pens-exclusive special edition release in the color amethyst! 

A stainless steel nib is individually hand-fitted to each fountain pen, intricately cut for maximum performance. Stunning and sleek, each Innova has the perfect flair, whether it is for a formal occasion, business, or casual setting.

The Monteverde Innova fountain pen is offered with your choice of a reliable, smooth-writing German made JoWo #6 silver steel nib in extra-fine, fine, medium, broad, 1.1mm stub, or the JoWo Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

It fills via standard international converter or ink cartridge, both of which are included. 

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Monteverde Innova Fountain Pen & Ink Set - USA 250 Anniversary (Limited Edition)
description:
To honor the 250th Anniversary of the United States, Monteverde® proudly presents the Innova USA 250th Anniversary Edition, featuring a handcrafted resin material created by Jonathon Brooks of the Carolina Pen Company. This limited-edition pen combines artistry, heritage, and innovation, celebrating the enduring spirit of freedom and resilience.

Limited to 250 pieces worldwide. Each pen comes with a 15ml bottle of black shimmering ink. 

At the heart of the Innova USA 250th Anniversary pens is the exclusive American made resin created by Jonathon Brooks specifically for this collection—each blank individually poured, swirled, and cured by hand in his North Carolina studio. Using his signature techniques, Jonathon blends vibrant red, white, and blue tones inspired by the American flag into bold, one-of-a-kind patterns. No two pens are alike, celebrating both personal expression and shared heritage. This artisan-crafted resin delivers exceptional depth, luminosity, and a refined glossy finish, making every pen a true functional work of art. This handcrafted resin not only delivers exceptional depth and luster but also ensures durability and longevity, making every Innova a collectible heirloom-quality instrument.

The iconic Innova silhouette—a cornerstone of Monteverde’s heritage—remains instantly recognizable for its sleek profile, perfect balance, and exceptional everyday comfort. Brilliant chrome accents elevate the striking red, white, and blue resin body, while the carbon fiber center ring pays tribute to the original Innova, which was famously crafted from that same high-performance material.

A stainless steel nib is individually hand-fitted to each fountain pen, intricately cut for maximum performance. Stunning and sleek, each Innova has the perfect flair, whether it is for a formal occasion, business, or casual setting.

The Monteverde Innova fountain pen is offered with your choice of a reliable, smooth-writing German made JoWo #6 silver steel nib in extra-fine, fine, medium, broad, 1.1mm stub, or the JoWo Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

It fills via standard international converter or ink cartridge, both of which are included. 

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Monteverde Innova Ombre Fusion Fountain Pen - Bliss
description:
The Monteverde USA® Innova Ombre Fusion collection draws its inspiration from the very first pen introduced by the Monteverde brand, a milestone in their legacy of crafting exceptional writing instruments. This collection pays homage to the original design, blending the timeless elegance of the brand’s heritage with modern innovation. Each piece in the collection reflects the brand’s dedication to quality and craftsmanship, bridging the past and present in a way that honors the origins of Monteverde's iconic first pen.

Each fountain pen in the Monteverde Innova collection is crafted with the attention to details, from the luxurious gradient finishes to the precision-engineered components, offering a writing instrument for every preference while maintaining the brand's commitment to quality and style.

Bliss features a calming gradient flows effortlessly from crisp white to soft blue and warm yellow, evoking the peaceful beauty of a clear sky at dawn. The blend of these colors creates a sense of serenity and balance, perfect for those seeking a moment of stillness in their day. The chrome trim adds a modern, polished contrast, emphasizing the smooth transition of hues while elevating the pen's elegant and contemporary design. Bliss is a harmonious fusion of simplicity and sophistication, making it a timeless addition to the collection. Its gentle palette inspires clarity and focus, making it the ideal companion for creative expression or thoughtful reflection. With Bliss, elegance meets tranquility in a truly refined form.

A standout feature of the pen is the authentic carbon fiber mid-ring, which adds both style and strength to the pen’s design. This high-performance material is renowned for its durability and lightweight properties, seamlessly blending cutting-edge technology with the pen’s elegant aesthetic. The carbon fiber ring serves as a subtle yet striking accent, providing a modern, industrial touch that contrasts beautifully with the pen's luxurious finishes. It not only enhances the pen’s visual appeal but also reinforces its construction, ensuring long-lasting performance and making it a truly unique writing instrument.

The German premium stainless steel #6 JoWo nib, engraved with the Monteverde USA logo, offers an effortless ink flow that enhances the writing experience. Available in multiple nib sizes—Extra Fine, Fine, Medium, Broad, 1.1mm Stub, and Omniflex—the fountain pen caters to all preferences, from crisp, fine lines to bold, expressive strokes. Paired with an expertly designed plasma-treated feed system, the pen delivers consistent, reliable ink flow, ensuring rich and even lines without skipping or blotting, regardless of your writing speed or style.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

The Monteverde Innova fountain pen fills via standard international converter or ink cartridge, both of which are included. Each pen is housed in a luxury gift box with a custom-designed sleeve

In 1999 Monteverde USA® was founded in Canoga Park, California USA with the intention to create writing instruments that feature unparalleled quality, function, and affordable luxury.

title: Monteverde Innova Titanium Fountain Pen
description:
The Monteverde USA® Innova Titanium collection is a celebration of cutting-edge materials and modern design. Inspired by a commitment to crafting exceptional writing instruments, this collection reflects a harmonious blend of innovation and elegance. Each pen embodies the brand’s passion for quality and precision, offering a seamless writing experience.

What sets the Innova Titanium collection apart is its ability to deliver luxury and performance at an accessible price point. By combining advanced materials like TA2 grade titanium and carbon fiber with precision engineering, Monteverde ensures that high-end craftsmanship is within reach for a wider audience. This commitment to luxury affordability makes the collection a standout choice for those who value both style and substance in their writing instruments.

Every Monteverde Innova Titanium fountain pen is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, highlighting its solid titanium body and precision-machined construction. A standout feature is the matte finish, which not only provides a smooth feel but also enhances durability. The slim design and balanced weight ensure comfort during extended writing sessions, minimizing hand fatigue.

A distinctive carbon fiber mid-ring enhances the pen’s design with its contemporary, high-tech appeal. Known for its exceptional strength and lightweight properties, carbon fiber adds structural integrity and visual interest. Its textured appearance creates a striking contrast to the matte titanium and gunmetal accents, highlighting the pen’s modern sophistication.

The titanium body is further complemented by gunmetal trim on the cap and other components, completing the sleek and cohesive design. This thoughtful combination of materials ensures strength, longevity, and a timeless aesthetic that seamlessly blends sophistication with innovation.

Each pen is part of an individually numbered regular edition, with the unique serial number prominently displayed on the cap. This numbering emphasizes the pen’s exclusivity and celebrates its collectible nature, making it a cherished item for writing enthusiasts and connoisseurs alike.

The pen features a premium titanium grade 9 nib, engraved with the Monteverde USA logo, delivering smooth and consistent ink flow for a flawless writing experience. Grade 9 titanium, celebrated for its excellent balance of strength and flexibility, ensures a nib that is durable and capable of adapting to the writer's pressure for a responsive and personalized experience.

Enhancing the nib's performance is the advanced plasma-treated feeder system, designed to provide a consistent and efficient ink flow. This cutting-edge technology eliminates skipping and blotting while promoting even ink distribution, ensuring a seamless writing experience regardless of speed or style.

Titanium’s corrosion-resistant and hypoallergenic properties add to the nib’s longevity and comfort, making it suitable for users with sensitivities. Available in Fine and Medium nib sizes, the pen caters to a range of writing preferences. It fills via standard international ink cartridges or a converter (included), providing versatility and convenience for those who enjoy the tactile pleasure of fountain pen writing.

Each Monteverde Innova Titanium pen is elegantly presented in a luxurious gift box with a custom-designed sleeve. Crafted from premium vegan leather, the box is both sophisticated and protective, ensuring an exceptional unboxing experience. Perfect for gifting, the packaging highlights the pen’s elegance and exclusivity, making it a memorable choice for any occasion.

1999 Monteverde USA® was founded in Canoga Park, California USA with the intention to create writing instruments that feature unparalleled quality, function, and affordable luxury.

title: Monteverde Invincia Color Fusion Fountain Pen - Stealth Black
description:

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Monteverde Invincia Deluxe Fountain Pen - Graphite (Limited Edition)
description:
When art and technology are blended in perfect symbiosis, the result is a pen of extremes in perfect balance. The Monteverde Invincia is the highest form of the penmaker's art. The Invincia has a large, contoured profile that is well-balanced for writing comfort.

This Monteverde Invincia Deluxe fountain pen features a sleek brushed gunmetal grey barrel and cap, complemented by gunmetal trim. It fills via standard international ink cartridges or converter (included). The screw-cap pushes to post onto the barrel when writing. It fills via standard international ink cartridges or converter (included).

This limited edition of 250 is a Goulet Pens-exclusive! Each pen is individually numbered on the bottom of the barrel.

This fountain pen is offered with your choice of a reliable, smooth-writing German made JoWo #6 steel nib in black in sizes extra-fine, fine, medium, broad, 1.1mm stub or the new JoWo #6 Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width. With six nib options, you are sure to find a selection to fit your handwriting style.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Monteverde MP1 Collectible Fountain Pen - Black Noir
description:
Introducing the new Monteverde MP1 Collectible, the first piston fountain pen in the Monteverde collection, where innovation, elegance, and advanced technology converge in a meticulously crafted design. Released as part of Monteverde's 25th-anniversary celebration, the MP1 Collectible represents a significant leap forward in the piston-fill fountain pen category, combining luxury with satisfying performance.

One of the standout features of the Monteverde MP1 Collectible is its grip section and the radiant, crystal-clear barrel, which are crafted as a single transparent piece. This one-piece construction not only enhances the pen's durability and sleek aesthetic but also provides a smooth, uninterrupted surface that feels natural and comfortable in the hand. The continuous design ensures a perfect balance and a secure grip, making the pen exceptionally comfortable during extended writing sessions.

The pen's design is further distinguished by its durable anodized aluminum cap in black, adorned with finely etched lines that add visual appeal. The anodized blind cap, equipped with a lock-in piston mechanism, ensures that the piston remains in place, preventing accidental twisting or ink spills, adding to the pen's overall reliability and functionality.

At the core of the Monteverde MP1 Collectible is a finely crafted #6 premium German-made JoWo nib, renowned for its precision and silky smooth writing experience. The black steel nibs are offered in six distinctive point sizes: extra-fine, fine, medium, broad, 1.1mm stub, and finally the Omniflex flexible steel nib for variation in line width.

Paired with an expertly designed plasma-treated feed system, the pen delivers consistent, reliable ink flow, ensuring rich and even lines without skipping or blotting, regardless of your writing speed or style.

The pen features an integrated piston-filling mechanism that allows for effortless ink refilling directly from an ink bottle, eliminating the need for cartridges and making the pen eco-friendly. The large 2ml ink reservoir, made of polycarbonate resin, ensures ample ink capacity, reducing the need for frequent refilling and maing it perfect for extensive writing sessions.

Dark and sophisticated, the Black Noir MP1 Collectible offers a deep, rich black that conveys timeless elegance. The matte finish softens the black, giving it a smooth and subtle texture, while the gunmetal trim enhances the pen's modern and luxurious aesthetic.

The Monteverde MP1 Collectible pen is beautifully packaged within a sleek, minimalist gift box, perfect for the discerning individual who appreciates both elegance and functionality. Assembled at the Monteverde headquarters in California, the MP1 Collectible adheres to the highest standards of production and quality control, a testament to the brand's 25-year legacy of precise craftsmanship.

With its lightweight yet durable construction, consistent ink flow, and elegant design, the Monteverde MP1 Collectible is a must-have for writing enthusiasts and pen collectors alike, offering a significant edge in features and value compared to its competitors. The Monteverde MP1 Collectible is an excellent choice for those seeking a professionally advanced piston-fill fountain pen that embodies reliability, durability, and user-friendly design.

Our note about the JoWo Omniflex nib: This flex nib will allow you to experience more bounce and softness than writing with conventional nibs. You can achieve some line variation with a little additional downward pressure, to a point. We recommend flexing the nib to about twice the line width that you would see without using any pressure. Please take care to avoid pressing too hard on the nib, as over-flexing could prevent the tines from returning fully to their original position and decrease or stop your ink flow.
