title: Sailor 1911L Fountain Pen - Black / King Eagle Nib
description:
This Sailor 1911 Large fountain pen features a solid glossy black resin barrel and cap, complemented by gold-plated accents. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k yellow gold nib with a special King Eagle nib. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. The 1911L comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

The heart of this pen is its distinctive and specialized nib. It’s designed to provide a writing experience reminiscent of a traditional brush.

Unique Construction: The King Eagle nib is crafted by layering three nib sheets at the tip. This process results in a pen point that is even taller than a Cross Point nib. It features a unique three-layered tip with an elongated vertical point.

Dynamic Writing: The design allows the pen to produce especially bold horizontal strokes. Writers can enjoy dynamic and expressive line variation depending on the writing angle and direction.

Smooth Flow: Its rich, high ink flow ensures smooth writing. This means the pen glides easily even on rough-textured paper such as washi.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

Please note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Sailor 1911L Fountain Pen - Themis
description:
The Sailor 1911L Themis fountain pen was originally created exclusively for the ITO-YA in Japan, but is now available for the first time in North America.

The 1911L Themis is finished in a beautiful gray color that radiates a modern, casual feel while maintaining a refined look. The pen features a well-balanced, black IP-finished metal grip section that enhances the writing experience by providing a satisfying weight and allowing for smoother strokes without the need for excessive pressure, making it ideal for extended writing sessions. Additionally, this model showcases Sailor’s unique 21K solid gold nib, finished with black IP.

This model is aptly named "Themis" after the Greek goddess known as the personification of law, order, and justice. In Greek mythology, Themis is a symbol of fairness, balance, and rightful counsel, often depicted holding scales and a sword to represent impartiality and truth. Her presence symbolizes the timeless pursuit of justice—a fitting inspiration for this pen, which has been thoughtfully designed with legal professionals and students of law in mind.

The name "Themis" reflects Sailor’s commitment to providing tools that support those who champion justice, emphasizing the pen’s practicality, elegance, and thoughtful construction. Like the goddess herself, the 1911L Themis brings balance to its user, offering stability, control, and a writing experience that stands up to the demands of a professional environment.

The Sailor 1911 Large fountain pen comes equipped with Sailor's legendary black ion 21k gold nib in several nib sizes. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. The 1911L comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

Sailor notes that the ion-plated nib should only be used with Sailor inks to avoid damage. While we have tested these nibs with other inks, we do recommend using Sailor inks if you wish to maintain the 1 year manufacturer warranty.

title: Sailor 1911L Naginata Togi Fountain Pen - Black/Black
description:
This Sailor 1911L fountain pen features a solid glossy black resin barrel and cap, complemented by ion-plated black accents. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k gold nib in black with a Naginata Togi nib grind available in three nib sizes. It also has a black ion-plated brass grip section for a weighted balance.

This special Naginata Togi nib allows you to write with a thin line when holding the pen vertically upright, or with a thicker line when holding the pen at a lower writing angle. In this way it’s similar to a Sailor Zoom nib. It also is ground so that it writes thicker on the cross stroke and thinner on the down stroke, like an Architect nib. It’s really a blend of Zoom and Architect, which is quite unique and not available from any other pen manufacturer.

The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. Each pen comes equipped with a black ion-plated ink converter, perfectly complementing the pen’s sleek design. The 1911L also comes as well with two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

This special Naginata Togi nib allows you to write with a thin line when holding the pen vertically upright, or with a thicker line when holding the pen at a lower writing angle. In this way it’s similar to a Sailor Zoom nib. It also is ground so that it writes thicker on the cross stroke and thinner on the down stroke, like an Architect nib. It’s really a blend of Zoom and Architect, which is quite unique and not available from any other pen manufacturer.

A special engraved metallic centerband infilled with resin using the special Cloisonné technique signifies the special nib.

title: Sailor 1911L Ninja Maki-e Fountain Pen - Tsuki
description:
From the Muromachi period (1336-1573) to the Edo period (1603-1868), Ninja were employed by warring feudal lords in various regions. The Ninja's missions included night raids, sabotage, and assassination, but the most important mission was to invade the enemy's camp, gather information on the enemy's situation, and convey this
information to the lord.

Thus, because the Ninja needed to survive and return to their lord living in castles, they often used weapons to protect themselves, such as Swords, Shurikens, Makibishi etc.

Crafted from PMMA Resin with Yuubi Maki-e, this pen is a true work of art. This Sailor 1911 Large fountain pen features different maki-e designs on the translucent grey barrel and cap. It is complemented by rhodium plated accents, and comes equipped with Sailor's legendary rhodium plated 21k gold nib in a wide variety of nib sizes.

The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. The 1911L comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

Even if you’re not penning the next bestselling masterpiece, each page you fill deserves a little magic. And thanks to Sailor’s expertly crafted solid 21K gold nib, every pen stroke feels intentional, turning everything from journal entries to grocery lists into moments of inspiration. description:
Sailor is introducing the next addition to their CHINKIN series. The pen’s design is inspired by the Ohmurasaki, or giant purple butterfly, which is Japan’s national butterfly. This butterfly has been loved by many people since ancient times, spreading its beautiful wings as it flutters.

 Its name is said to come from “Murasaki no Ue,” the woman whom Hikaru Genji loved the most in The Tale of Genji, Japan's most famous classic. The purple color of the butterfly symbolizes her beauty and nobility. The deep purple wings of the pen’s design emit a mysterious glow depending on the angle of the light, like stars scattered across the night sky.

This King of Pen-sized, flat top, clipless, ebonite fountain pen comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k gold nib in the massive King of Pens size.

title: Sailor Compass Fude De Mannen Fountain Pen - Dark Blue, 40°
description:
Discover the artistry of writing and sketching with the new Sailor Compass Fude (pronounced foo-deh) De Mannen Calligraphy Pen. Designed for versatility, this pen features a stainless steel nib with a unique angled tip (40° or 55°), allowing effortless transitions between fine and broad strokes. Whether used for expressive writing and calligraphy or intricate sketching, this pen offers a smooth and dynamic writing experience.

This Dark Blue color comes with a gold-plated 40° Fude steel nib. A practical knob on the cap prevents rolling, adding function to its refined aesthetic.

Each Sailor Compass Fude De Mannen Calligraphy Pen is individually packaged and comes with two Sailor Standard Black ink cartridges, making it a perfect ready-to-use option for customers. A Sailor converter is available for purchase separately.

Ideal for artists, calligraphy enthusiasts, and anyone looking to explore the expressive potential of fude-style writing, the Sailor Compass Fude De Mannen is a must-have.

title: Sailor CYLINT Fountain Pen - Black Stainless Steel
description:
Introducing a brand new fountain pen model from Sailor! Inspired by Sailor’s 110th Anniversary Pen, the CYLINT boasts a lasting and reflective black hue. Different from black plating or black paint application, the new electrolytic technology involves developing an ultra-thin black oxide layer on the surface of the material, leveraging light interference for color recognition. This ensures a durable and elegant black finish that will last the test of time.

The Sailor CYLINT has a black ion-plated pen clip, cap ring, and a weighted black ion-plated metal grip section. The fountain pen shines with a black ion-plated 21k gold nib in Fine, Medium, or Broad. 

The CYLINT fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

title: Sailor CYLINT Fountain Pen - Matte Black Stainless Steel
description:
Unlike traditional plating or paint, the Sailor CYLINT's deep, beautiful matte black is achieved through a groundbreaking electrolytic coloring technology. This innovative process develops an ultrathin black oxide layer directly on the surface of the stainless steel, leveraging light interference for color recognition. This means the material itself takes on the color, eliminating any concerns of peeling, and ensuring unparalleled durability and weatherability. The metallic nature of the material remains intact, resulting in a highly durable, functional, and stylish matte black design that will not fade over time.

The Sailor CYLINT has a black ion-plated pen clip, cap ring, and a weighted black ion-plated metal grip section. The fountain pen comes with a black ion-plated 21k gold nib in Fine or Medium.

The CYLINT fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Kabazaiku Fountain Pen
description:
Kabazaiku, or cherry bark woodworking art work, is a traditional Japanese art work which fluorished in Kaunodate in Akita prefecture of Japan. The technique was used 250 years ago by Samurai warriors to decorate their weapons. The same uncompromising spirit of quality and workmanship has been handed down the generations to the producer of the 'Kabazaiku" Cherry Bark – Denshiro Shouten. Each pen shows a unique pattern of wild Cherry bark and gives a warm, natural feeling in the hands.

The barrel and cap are made of brass, with a wild cherry bark covering, complemented by gold-plated accents. The fountain pen comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 14k gold nib with 24kt gold plating in medium. It comes in an exclusive gift box with a 50ml bottle of Sailor Black ink and an ink converter.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

Note: Sailor has fully transitioned to the new design of nib that features the anchor logo only. Some of our images may feature the old design with the anchor and “1911”.

title: Sailor King of Pens Naginata Togi Ebonite Fountain Pen - UMESAKI (Limited Edition)
description:
This oversized Sailor King of Pens fountain pen features a gorgeous ebonite cap, barrel and grip section. Each UMESAKI pen is meticulously crafted with a 21K gold KOP Naginata Togi nib, renowned for its exceptional writing quality and durability. 
 
Colored ebonite fountain pen UMESAKI, available in a limited quantity, features Sailor Pen's special 21K gold KOP Naginata Togi nib, and is crafted with the Chirashi technique for an intricate yet stately allure. As with other models in this annually released series, the body's design is inspired by a masterpiece of traditional Japanese art, expressed with colored ebonite. This year's model is Sailor's interpretation of "Plum Estate in Kameido" by Hiroshige Utagawa as published in the "One Hundred Famous Views of Edo". Regarded highly by the world, as evident in Vincent van Gogh's reproduction "Flowering Plum Tree", they brought the image to life with UMESAKI.

Plum Estate in Kameido was a plum orchard situated behind Kameido Tenjin Shrine, that became famous for "Garyubai", meaning a plum tree shaped like a sleeping dragon. It was a hugely popular sightseeing spot in spring, even known to be cherished by Yoshimune Tokugawa, the 8th Shogun of the Tokugawa Shogunate. The portrayal of sightseers enjoying the view from beyond the fence is testimony to the estate's popularity. Depicting closer objects as close-ups and farther objects in smaller size was Hiroshige's preferred composition. He also succeeded in giving the tree a convincing woody texture by layering paint.

Engraved with a serial number, each piece is unique. UMESAKI is a limited edition of only 500 pieces worldwide, made available only through authorized Sailor Bespoke dealers. Each pen is individually numbered.

UMESAKI comes in a new dark brown wooden gift box in the image of plum wood, different from packaging for past models of this series. The inside is lined with exquisitely elegant crape fabric, a reproduction of traditional "Chirimen" that has been cherished in Japan since ancient times, and adorned with sleeves in color inspired by dainty plum blossoms. The inside is lined with an exquisitely elegant crape, Chirimen, fabric, a reproduction of a traditional material that has existed in Japan since ancient times.

This special Naginata Togi nib allows you to write with a thin line when holding the pen vertically upright, or with a thicker line when holding the pen at a lower writing angle. In this way it’s similar to a Sailor Zoom nib. It also is ground so that it writes thicker on the cross stroke and thinner on the down stroke, like an Architect nib. It’s really a blend of Zoom and Architect, which is quite unique and not available from any other pen manufacturer.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

Please note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Area 51 (Limited Edition)
description:
Introducing the Sailor Pro Gear "Area 51" fountain pen: Some say it arrived from beyond the stars. Others whisper of secret experiments deep in the Nevada desert. But one thing is certain—the Sailor Pro Gear "Area 51" is not of this world.

For those who dare to question, who seek signs, each of these instruments of inquiry comes with a set of 3 cryptic markers – alien-themed stickers. Consider them proof that UFOs exist, a tangible item to show you believe... or perhaps show your skepticism. We leave that for you to decipher.

Classified Features: Crafted from a never-before-seen alien green resin, the body of this pen shines with an unearthly glow. Its 21K solid gold nib, cloaked in IP black, delivers an ultra-smooth, otherworldly writing experience. Complementing this striking design, the pen features IP black trim and clip, creating a sleek, stealth-like aesthetic that feels almost... paranormal.

Don’t Blink Or You’ll Miss It: Like a UFO vanishing into the night, the Sailor Pro Gear "Area 51" is here for a limited time. Will you uncover the mystery, or will it disappear before you can make contact? Secure yours now before it’s declassified… or gone forever.

The Professional Gear fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Black/Silver

This Sailor Pro Gear fountain pen features a black barrel and cap, complemented by rhodium-plated accents. The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary bi-color 21k gold nib in a wide variety of nib sizes. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Classic Ko "Ala SV"
description:
Classic Ko is a celebrated name in the world of intricate artistry and timeless design. The Classic Ko jewelry brand is made by the Maki-e producer Oshita Kosen Kobo, which has been operating in Kaga City, Ishikawa Prefecture in Japan since 1894. Known for their deep appreciation of cultural heritage, they expertly blend traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics. Every Classic Ko creation tells a story, combining artistry and innovation to produce remarkable, culturally inspired works.

The name “Ala” translates to “wings,” symbolizing good fortune and beauty, while “SV” highlights the use of silver in the design. This pen, based on a smoky gray transparent Pro Gear Standard, features an exquisite silver "Maki-e" motif, adorned with shimmering mother-of-pearl accents.

At the top finial, you’ll find a luxurious gold foil stamping of "Ko,” a signature touch that underscores the collaboration’s exclusive nature. This detail elevates the pen’s aesthetic appeal, making it a true standout piece.

The pen is equipped with Sailor’s 21k solid gold nib, delivering Sailor's signature smooth, precise writing experience. The collaboration with Classic Ko combines exceptional technical expertise with artistic vision, resulting in a pen that is both functional and a work of art.

The Classic Ko "Ala SV" is exclusively available at Sailor Bespoke retailers.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Dreamy Hour
description:
Get ready to be transported to a world of twilight beauty with the breathtaking new Sailor Pro Gear “Dreamy Hour” fountain pen series! 

The "Dreamy Hour" refers to that serene moment in the early morning when the world is suspended between darkness and light. The sky transforms into an ethereal canvas, creating an illusion of wandering into a fantastical, twilight realm. Sailor has beautifully encapsulated this fleeting, enchanting beauty in this new series.

The essence of the "Dreamy Hour" is inspired by the pre-dawn sky. Imagine delicate hues that evoke:

  • The deep, transitioning purple-blues of the fading night.
  • Soft, iridescent purples and lavenders as light begins to emerge.
  • Subtle, glimmering yellow-grays reflecting the dew-kissed world.
  • Even faint, rosy blushes hinting at the approaching sunrise.

The Professional Gear fountain pen is equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k gold nib, and comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Eleuthera Island (Limited Edition)
description:
Introducing a new fountain pen collaboration between Sailor and Satellite Crayon Project! The Fountain Pen of the Seas explores the natural colors of the Earth. This limited edition series features shades of the sea captured in satellite imagery from space, showcasing the diverse hues created by Earth’s rich natural environments.

In 2022, Satellite Crayon Project, based in Japan, began using colors captured by satellite images to create high quality, original crayons. Based on the actual colors of the Earth, the crayons also enumerate the latitude and longitude of the location where the color was sampled.

The pens are inspired by the waters surrounding specific coordinates, with finials corresponding to specific natural features in the surrounding areas.

 Eleuthera Island Coordinates 24.98503 – 76.36213

  • A turquoise body inspired by the seawater around the western area of the Island, with finials based on the color of Ooid (Roestone) found in the surrounding waters

The Professional Gear fountain pen is a stunning teal color equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k rhodium plated gold nib, and comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Ginza Silver (Limited Edition)
description:
The Professional Gear Ginza Silver Fountain Pen pays homage to Ginza, a district synonymous with luxury and refinement. In the Edo period, Ginza was the site of a silver coin mint for the shogunate, and the name “Ginza” itself translates to “Silver” in English. As Western culture permeated Japan during the Meiji era, Ginza emerged as the epicenter of cutting-edge fashion. Today, Ginza remains a symbol of opulence and sophistication, reflecting its illustrious past and contemporary elegance. 

This Sailor Pro Gear fountain pen features a black barrel and cap, complemented by rhodium-plated accents, and a chrome-plated brass grip section. The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary rhodium plated 21k gold nib in a wide variety of nib sizes. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

The Professional Gear fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Matcha (Limited Edition)
description:
The highly anticipated 5th installment of the Sailor "Tea Time Around the World" series: Japanese Tea Ceremony. This collection is a beautiful homage to the peaceful and intricate art of "Cha-no-yu," a centuries-old tradition that embodies deep spirituality and aesthetics.

Matcha powder is a central element of the tea ceremony, and the original color of the pens is inspired by the deep, rich hue of Koicha, a thick green tea made with a generous amount of matcha. The pens have a translucent yellow-green cap top, a transparent green body, dark green cap, and gold-plated trim.

The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k gold nib. title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Roppongi Gold (Limited Edition)
description:
The Professional Gear Roppongi Gold Fountain Pen draws its name from the historic Roppongi area, once a samurai town renowned for its samurai residences and goldfish farming, thanks to the area’s abundant underground water. Today, Roppongi thrives as a vibrant hub in Tokyo, blending its storied past with a modern downtown, bustling business district, and flourishing art scene. Sailor Pen’s Head Office proudly resides in this dynamic locale, embodying the area’s spirit of tradition and innovation.

This Sailor Pro Gear fountain pen features a black barrel and cap, complemented by gold accents, and a gold-plated brass grip section. title: Sailor Pro Gear Fountain Pen - Sapporo Snow Festival (Limited Edition)
description:
New from Sailor: This special edition is inspired by the world-famous Sapporo Snow Festival in northern Japan — an awe-inspiring celebration of winter where the city is transformed into a wonderland of snow and ice. Massive, hand-carved snow sculptures tower over visitors, glowing under soft illumination each night. Temples, castles, creatures, and landmarks are brought to life in breathtaking scale, drawing millions of visitors into a dreamlike world of winter artistry.

Sailor has beautifully captured that frozen enchantment in this stunning pen. The icy blue and frosty white tones echo the soft lights of the snow sculptures, while glitter-infused resin adds a delicate sparkle — just like snow under moonlight.

This Sailor Pro Gear fountain pen features a dreamy icy blue and snow-white color palette with shimmering glitter and rhodium plated trim.  It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary rhodium plated 21k gold nib in a wide variety of nib sizes. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

The Professional Gear fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

description:
The Pro Gear "Sunlight from the Ocean Floor" is the fourth pen in Sailor’s beloved "Ocean" series, which began with "Sunset Over the Ocean" in 2021. This stunning pen captures the jewel-like sparkle of sunlight as seen from the depths of the sea, offering a fantastical glimpse into an underwater world. The light from the sun is a crucial source of energy for marine life and holds a beauty that transcends mere aesthetics.

The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary rhodium-plated 21k gold nib in a variety of nib sizes. description:

The Fountain Pen of the Seas explores the natural colors of the Earth. This limited edition series features shades of the sea captured in satellite imagery from space, showcasing the diverse hues created by Earth’s rich natural environments.

In 2022, Satellite Crayon Project, based in Japan, began using colors captured by satellite images to create high quality, original crayons. Based on the actual colors of the Earth, the crayons also enumerate the latitude and longitude of the location where the color was sampled.

Syvash Coordinates 46.13594 – 33.91955

  • A pink-orange body capturing the color of shallow tidal wetlands along the west bank of the Sea of Azov (Eastern Europe), with finials based on pink salt found in the nearby Crimean Peninsula

The Professional Gear fountain pen is a stunning pink/orange color equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k rhodium plated gold nib, and comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges. title: Sailor Pro Gear Realo Fountain Pen - Black/Gold
description:
This Sailor Pro Gear Realo fountain pen features a solid black resin barrel and cap, complemented by gold-plated accents. The Realo is unique model within the Sailor pen offerings as it fills via internal piston mechanism, instead of with an ink cartridge or converter. A small ink window towards the bottom of the barrel shows you your ink level.

The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 21k gold nib in a wide variety of nib sizes.

Note: Sailor has fully transitioned to the new design of nib that features the anchor logo only. Some of our images may feature the old design with the anchor and “1911”.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen & Ink Set -  Yumeyoi (Limited Edition)
description:
Introducing a stunning new limited edition release from Sailor: the PLUS x Sailor Professional Gear Slim "Yumeyoi" Fountain Pen and Ink Set. This release is this year's special collaboration with the Japanese stationery company, PLUS Corporation, and is designed to capture the mystical, quiet moment between day and night.

The pen is named "Yumeyoi," which beautifully translates to evoke the feeling of entering the night—a pathway between lingering memories of wakefulness and the depths of dreams. It is an enchanting, dreamlike theme for a writing instrument.

This Pro Gear Slim features a captivating translucent navy and purple limited edition color. This translucent resin allows the light to catch the deep, mysterious tones of the pen, evoking the atmosphere of twilight just before the stars appear. The pen is finished with rhodium-plated metal parts, perfectly complementing the cool color palette. It is fitted with Sailor's signature 14K solid gold nib (rhodium plated), available in three popular sizes: Extra Fine (EF), Medium Fine (MF), and Broad (B).

The 14k solid gold nib ensures an unparalleled writing experience, while the deep blue finial and grip section, embellished with silver glitter, add a touch of sophistication.

The mythical creature, Baku, is engraved on the nib and a moon/star design on the finial. The set is completed with a specially crafted 20ml bottle of ink. It also comes with two converters, one secured inside of the box and one inside of the pen itself. There's also two cartridges included. 

Yumeyoi is a limited edition pen. 

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen - Black Rose
description:
Sailor is introducing the second Sailor Dried Flower Collection! A dreamy quartet of Pro Gear Slim fountain pens inspired by the delicate art of drying and preserving flowers. 

Black Rose features a classic, crisp combination of black and white, reflecting the dramatic elegance and profound meaning often associated with a preserved rose.

Each pen features a semi-translucent pastel body, beautifully contrasted with glittering finials and grip sections. 

The nostalgic allure of antiqued gold-plated trim meets the elegance of a 14k gold nib, adorned with a delicate floral bouquet engraving. Offered in fine, medium-fine, and medium, these pens promise the unparalleled writing experience that only Sailor can provide.

The Sailor Dried Flower Collection is only available outside of Japan.

The Professional Gear Slim fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges. The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen - Happiness (Limited Production)
description:
New from Sailor: the Kimono Series fountain pens. Inspired by Japan's iconic traditional garment, the kimono, this series celebrates the timeless artistry and cultural significance embodied by kimonos. Often worn during festivals and special occasions, kimonos are adorned with intricate patterns and designs that carry deep symbolic meanings and heartfelt wishes.

Each Professional Gear Slim fountain pen in the Kimono Series is a work of art, crafted with meticulous attention to detail. The pen cap showcases auspicious patterns traditionally found on kimonos, while the barrel artfully represents the folds of a kimono collar, creating a harmonious blend of cultural homage and elegant design. The designs include motifs drawn from nature, floral arrangements, and geometric forms, reflecting the rich tapestry of Japanese aesthetics.

The Happiness pen is white with a blue grip and red throughout. The Sailor Pro Gear Slim fountain pen is equipped with a 14k gold nib in fine, medium fine, or medium. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. Each pen comes with a proprietary Sailor converter.

The highly anticipated 5th installment of the Sailor "Tea Time Around the World" series: Japanese Tea Ceremony. This collection is a beautiful homage to the peaceful and intricate art of "Cha-no-yu," a centuries-old tradition that embodies deep spirituality and aesthetics.

Inspired by the delicate, artistic Japanese sweets served during a Japanese tea ceremony. Nerikiri are traditional confections, often crafted into beautiful seasonal shapes, that are designed to complement the flavor of the tea and serve as the highest form of hospitality. The cap of this pen is a translucent beige, while the body and grip section are a soft, translucent violet. All trim is gold-plated.

The fountain pen comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 14k yellow gold nib in a variety of nib sizes.

The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. The Professional Gear Slim fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen - Princess Koto
description:
For centuries, princesses have captured the hearts and imaginations of people around the world with their grace, beauty, and noble spirit. Across cultures and throughout history, these regal figures have been cherished symbols of elegance and virtue.

Now, Sailor is paying homage to these beloved icons with this stunning Princess Raden collection of fountain pens inspired by the enchanting princesses of Japanese fairytales. Each pen in this series is a testament to the enduring allure of these mythical characters, using iconic motifs and colors that combine to tell a beautiful story. From delicate cherry blossoms to majestic dragons, every detail is intricately expressed with Raden (mother-of-pearl) and "yubi maki-e" on the barrels and caps, ensuring that each pen is a true work of art.

Princess Koto was a fallen Heike clan princess who was washed ashore and saved by seaside villagers. To thank them, she played a “koto” harp beautifully each day on the beach, but soon fell ill and passed away. Ever since, the beach sand became musical sand, and the beach was named “Beach of Koto.”

This Sailor Pro Gear Slim fountain pen features a light blue resin barrel, a sandy brown resin cap, and applied details of seashells and waves. The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary rhodium-plated 14k gold nib and is complemented by rhodium-plated accents. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

The Professional Gear Slim fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges. Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen - Prosperity (Limited Production)
description:
New from Sailor: the Kimono Series fountain pens. Inspired by Japan's iconic traditional garment, the kimono, this series celebrates the timeless artistry and cultural significance embodied by kimonos. Often worn during festivals and special occasions, kimonos are adorned with intricate patterns and designs that carry deep symbolic meanings and heartfelt wishes.

Each Professional Gear Slim fountain pen in the Kimono Series is a work of art, crafted with meticulous attention to detail. The pen cap showcases auspicious patterns traditionally found on kimonos, while the barrel artfully represents the folds of a kimono collar, creating a harmonious blend of cultural homage and elegant design. The designs include motifs drawn from nature, floral arrangements, and geometric forms, reflecting the rich tapestry of Japanese aesthetics.

The Prosperity pen is red with a white grip. The Sailor Pro Gear Slim fountain pen is equipped with a 14k gold nib in fine, medium fine, or medium. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. Each pen comes with a proprietary Sailor converter.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen - Sapporo Snow Festival (Limited Edition)
description:
New from Sailor: This special edition is inspired by the world-famous Sapporo Snow Festival in northern Japan — an awe-inspiring celebration of winter where the city is transformed into a wonderland of snow and ice. Massive, hand-carved snow sculptures tower over visitors, glowing under soft illumination each night. Temples, castles, creatures, and landmarks are brought to life in breathtaking scale, drawing millions of visitors into a dreamlike world of winter artistry.

Sailor has beautifully captured that frozen enchantment in this stunning pen. The icy blue and frosty white tones echo the soft lights of the snow sculptures, while glitter-infused resin adds a delicate sparkle — just like snow under moonlight.

The Sapporo Snow Festival features a dreamy icy blue and snow-white color palette with shimmering glitter and rhodium plated trim. The Sailor Pro Gear Slim fountain pen is equipped with a 14k gold nib in several nib sizes. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. Each pen comes with a proprietary Sailor converter.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen - Syvash (Limited Edition)
description:
Introducing a new fountain pen collaboration between Sailor and Satellite Crayon Project! The Fountain Pen of the Seas explores the natural colors of the Earth. This limited edition series features shades of the sea captured in satellite imagery from space, showcasing the diverse hues created by Earth’s rich natural environments.

In 2022, Satellite Crayon Project, based in Japan, began using colors captured by satellite images to create high quality, original crayons. Based on the actual colors of the Earth, the crayons also enumerate the latitude and longitude of the location where the color was sampled.

The pens are inspired by the waters surrounding specific coordinates, with finials corresponding to specific natural features in the surrounding areas.

Syvash Coordinates 46.13594 – 33.91955

    • A pink-orange body capturing the color of shallow tidal wetlands along the west bank of the Sea of Azov (Eastern Europe), with finials based on pink salt found in the nearby Crimean Peninsula

This Sailor Pro Gear Slim fountain pen features a pink body, complemented by rhodium accents. The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 14k gold nib. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

The Professional Gear Slim fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Fountain Pen - Yuu-tsubame
description:
Shikiori Sansui is a collection of writing instruments that evoke the essence of Japan's diverse and breathtaking seasons. The name "SANSUI" itself pays homage to the great vitality of flora and fauna, which tenaciously thrive in the wild.

Spring - "Yuu-tsubame Swallows, considered messengers of good fortune in spring, inspire this pen. Witness the graceful flight of these birds across the beautiful spring skies at sunset.

Sailor Pro Gear Slim Yuu-tsubame fountain pen features a dark navy resin barrel and cap, complemented by gold-plated accents and a pink grip. The flat top cap features the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. It comes equipped with Sailor's legendary 14k yellow gold nib in medium fine. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing.

The Professional Gear Slim fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as two proprietary Sailor Black ink cartridges. Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Manyo Fountain Pen Set - Persimmon (Limited Edition)
description:
Announcing the arrival of the third installment in the Sailor Manyo Pen series. This latest release has been crafted to celebrate the 5th anniversary of the Manyo ink collection. This series stands out not only for its design and quality but also because it is not available in Japan, making it a truly unique offering for North America consumers.

Each pen in this limited-edition series is a work of art, featuring exquisite foil embossing on the top finial, rendered in a stunning rainbow foil.

The Persimmon pen showcases a rich, warm orange hue reminiscent of ripe persimmons. It is paired with a 50ml bottle of Manyo Budo, a deep and vibrant blue-purple ink inspired by wild grapes that were historically used for food and dyeing during the Heian period.

This Sailor Pro Gear Slim fountain pen features a translucent orange cap, grip section, and barrel finial, complemented by an opaque blue-purple barrel and top finial. It is completed by gold-plated trim, and the top finial features a persimmon.

The pen is equipped with a 14k yellow gold nib in fine, medium fine, or medium. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. The Professional Gear Slim fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter. It also can accept proprietary Sailor ink cartridges.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor Pro Gear Slim Manyo Fountain Pen Set - Red Bean (Limited Edition)
description:
Announcing the arrival of the third installment in the Sailor Manyo Pen series. This latest release has been crafted to celebrate the 5th anniversary of the Manyo ink collection. This series stands out not only for its design and quality but also because it is not available in Japan, making it a truly unique offering for North America consumers.

Each pen in this limited-edition series is a work of art, featuring exquisite foil embossing on the top finial, rendered in a stunning rainbow foil.

The Red Bean pen is adorned in a purplish red, reminiscent of the traditional Japanese azuki bean. Paired with a 50ml bottle of Manyo Azuki, a warm purple ink that reflects how azuki was traditionally consumed in savory dishes, often simply salted, during the Heian period.

This Sailor Pro Gear Slim fountain pen features a translucent purple cap, grip section, and barrel finial, complemented by an opaque light purple barrel and top finial. It is completed by rhodium-plated trim, and the top finial features a red bean.

The pen is equipped with a rhodium-plated 14k gold nib in fine, medium fine, or medium. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. The Professional Gear Slim fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter. It also accepts proprietary Sailor ink cartridges.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

title: Sailor TUZU Adjust Fountain Pen - Black
description:
Introducing the Sailor TUZU Adjust fountain pen, designed for all writing styles and habits. With two innovative features, this pen dispels the belief that fountain pens are complex and difficult to use. Experience effortless writing and comfort like never before.

The "Rotating Nib Feature" lets you customize the nib and grip rotation to your liking, while the "Natural Fit Grip" ensures a comfortable writing experience for all finger sizes and positions. With 10-degree rotation options, you can find the perfect hand position while maintaining proper nib alignment on paper. Additionally, the rounded grip has two grooves for easy and comfortable holding. The TUZU Adjust is versatile in accommodating left-handed writers, steep angles, and various gripping habits.

This sustainable fountain pen is made from black recycled polycarbonate. Each pen comes with a stainless steel nib and Sailor's slide-type sealing feature in the snap cap to prevent ink from drying out.

Packaged with a Sailor proprietary converter and two ink cartridges, this pen is ready to bring joy to writing for a long time to come.

title: Sailor Veilio Fountain Pen - Blue (Limited Production)
description:
Revel in the true elegance of ink with this BESPOKE by Sailor: Veilio. The artistic vision of Veilio captures the look of a softly draped veil. Beautiful acrylic rods are cut, bored out, and polished to make these transparent fountain pens shine, making each one uniquely special. A limited-edition color-matched converter is also designed to blend in seamlessly.

The Sailor Veilio Blue fountain pen shines with a beautiful blue hue on its finials, a serene swirling blue motif throughout its translucent body, and the elegance of rhodium-plated details shimmering both within and externally. This remarkable pen features Sailor’s smaller 21K rhodium-plated gold nib, which offers superior elasticity and feedback for an unmatched writing experience. 

This fountain pen has a flat top cap featuring the Sailor anchor logo inset into the top finial. The cap screws to open/close and can push to post onto the back of the barrel when writing. Each fountain pen comes with a Sailor proprietary converter as well as a proprietary Sailor ink cartridge.

As a handturned pen, the overall dimensions are slightly different than a normal Pro Gear Slim or Standard. Please refer to our Tech Specs for detailed measurements.

The Sailor Veilio fountain pen collection is available in limited quantities exclusively through authorized Sailor Bespoke retailers.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

Please also note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use. We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: SCRIBO FEEL Fountain Pen - Anni60 (Limited Edition)
options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "14k Flex Medium", "14k Flex Broad"]}
description:
Handmade in Italy, the SCRIBO FEEL fountain pen features a faceted, dodecagonal shaped body and cap. The Anni60 black resin body is complemented by ultra black PVD-plated trim, and fills with a built-in piston mechanism. It is fitted with an in-house made nib in 14k gold Flexible sizes with an ebonite feed. Each pen comes with a matching pen sleeve made of genuine leather and cotton.

The SCRIBO FEEL Anni60 fountain pen is made in a limited quantity of 219.

In the 1960s, the dandy style made a comeback, fueled by a rebellious youth culture and a fashion revolution that broke away from established conventions. A new generation embraced elegance as a form of individual expression. Rejecting conformity, this generation reimagined the elegant dandy style of the 19th century with a bold mix of sophistication and theatrical flair.

Attention to detail became an act of rebellion, and with appearance treated as an expression of art, the dandy style was a challenge to established norms. The dandy became a modern icon of defiance, straddling tradition and revolution, a walking symbol of an era where fashion was much more than just style: it was identity, loud and unapologetic.

In the spirit of 1960s dandy style, the FEEL Anni60 captures this same rebellious elegance. Through the art of the Guilloché technique, mastered by the Italian company Renzetti, FEEL Anni60 revolutionizes the balance between tradition and innovation.

The Anni’ 60 pattern, so refined and with a vintage flavor, adorns the FEEL Anni60 and was used for a long time in high jewelry and watchmaking. The design replicates the effect of antique lace and has recently returned to prominence with applications in various fields, especially in design and high fashion, with surprising results. For the first time, it is featured on a writing instrument made of resin.

The artistic Guilloché engraving is done entirely by hand and is still operated exclusively mechanically today. It is an ancient art achieved by tracing one line at a time with various tools, creating a harmonious design on metal, resin, and wood surfaces. Its earliest record dates back to the year 1624, found engraved on some vintage watch cases featuring this craftsmanship.

Only a few companies in the world master and preserve the true artisanal Guilloché method, making every engraved object even more precious and unique thanks to the skilled hand of the artisan. The company Renzetti1909, with its expertise, SCRIBO's partner for this exclusive collection, represents one of the leading exponents of this ancient craft.

As in the best tradition of hand writing instruments, every stylistic detail of the FEEL has been conceived, designed and manufactured to create a unique fountain pen that stands out in the search for the best writing experience.

The body of the pen, which slips into the shape of the Doric column, is turned by hand from a solid bar. The cap, the barrel and the knob, characterized by a slight entasis that enhances the shape, describe a statuesque object with a neo-classical, elegant and timeless design.

Even the nib-holder, before tapering to the classic circular section, is finished with a hint of facet that facilitates the handle and allows you to better manage the angle which you want to use the nib with.

The nib of the FEEL, the SCRIBO cornerstone, is the real protagonist of this writing instrument. The 14-carat gold Flexible nib is the same nib used by Omas and that is for SCRIBO the first brick to start again a brand-new story of Italian creativity.

The perfect match for this historic nib is undoubtedly the ebonite feeder, which enhances the always ready, generous, soft and precise writing, thanks to the use of the classic piston filling system.

The SCRIBO FEEL is accompanied by a genuine leather and cotton handmade soft pouch realized to protect two writing instruments. In the side pocket there is a cloth to keep your fountain pens clean. A precious and modern packaging to always carry with you your favourite writing instruments.

FEEL is an invitation to live a unique writing experience of the highest quality; it is an exhortation to seek everyone’s own writing style, it is a tribute to the aesthetics of handwriting and the pleasure of writing.

FEEL. Feel the writing.

About SCRIBO:

SCRIBO, short for Scrittura Bolognese, was founded by former employees of the retired OMAS brand. Fundamental values include writing tradition, design, craftsmanship, and made in Italy. Every working component of the fountain pen is handmade. The heart of every SCRIBO fountain pen is the gold nib. The classic 18-carat alloy and the special Extra-Flexible 14-carat alloy both offer elasticity, mechanical memory, and softness that highlights every fountain pen's writing quality.

The nib of the FEEL, the SCRIBO cornerstone, is the real protagonist of this writing instrument. Available in 18-carat gold or the exclusive version made of 14-carat gold Flexible. A unique nib, the same nib used by Omas and that is for SCRIBO the first brick to start again a brand-new story of Italian creativity.

The perfect match for this historic nib is undoubtedly the ebonite feeder, which enhances the always ready, generous, soft and precise writing, thanks to the use of the classic piston filling system.

The SCRIBO FEEL is accompanied by a genuine leather and cotton handmade soft pouch realized to protect two writing instruments. In the side pocket there is a cloth to keep your fountain pens clean. A precious and modern packaging to always carry with you your favourite writing instruments.

Feel is an invitation to live a unique writing experience of the highest quality; it is an exhortation to seek everyone’s own writing style, it is a tribute to the aesthetics of handwriting and the pleasure of writing.

Feel. Feel the writing.

About SCRIBO:

SCRIBO, short for Scrittura Bolognese, was founded by former employees of the retired OMAS brand. Fundamental values include writing tradition, design, craftsmanship, and made in Italy. Every working component of the fountain pen is handmade. The heart of every SCRIBO fountain pen is the gold nib. The classic 18-carat alloy and the special Extra-Flexible 14-carat alloy both offer elasticity, mechanical memory, and softness that highlights every fountain pen's writing quality.

title: SCRIBO FEEL Fountain Pen - Finestra sul Tempo (Limited Edition)
options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "14k Flex Medium", "14k Flex Broad"]}
description:
Handmade in Italy, the SCRIBO FEEL fountain pen features a faceted, dodecagonal shaped body and cap. The body is complemented by ruthenium trim, and fills with a built-in piston mechanism. It is fitted with an in-house made nib in 14k gold Flexible sizes with an ebonite feed. Each pen comes with a matching pen sleeve made of genuine leather and cotton.

Every stroke is a sign of elegance that transcends time. A tribute to the warmth and clarity of this ancient gem, capable of preserving the Earth's history. Imagine a world where writing becomes a bridge between past and present. FEEL Finestra sul Tempo draws inspiration from amber as a symbol of eternity. This fountain pen, with its ruthenium finishes, invites you to write not just words but to create memories that, like fossils in amber, withstand the test of time, celebrating the dialogue between past and future.

This fossilized resin is more than a gem: it is the Earth's diary, a natural archive that preserves fragments of a distant past, capturing time in all its perfection.

With FEEL Finestra sul Tempo, each crafted in 150 pieces per model, we celebrate this extraordinary connection between nature and memory, creating writing instruments that transform every word into an eternal gesture and every thought into a timeless mark.

As in the best tradition of hand writing instruments, every stylistic detail of the FEEL has been conceived, designed and manufactured to create a unique fountain pen that stands out in the search for the best writing experience.

The body of the pen, which slips into the shape of the Doric column, is turned by hand from a solid bar. The cap, the barrel and the knob, characterized by a slight entasis that enhances the shape, describe a statuesque object with a neo-classical, elegant and timeless design.

Even the nib-holder, before tapering to the classic circular section, is finished with a hint of facet that facilitates the handle and allows you to better manage the angle which you want to use the nib with.

The perfect match for this historic nib is undoubtedly the ebonite feeder, which enhances the always ready, generous, soft and precise writing, thanks to the use of the classic piston filling system.

The SCRIBO FEEL is accompanied by a genuine leather and cotton handmade soft pouch realized to protect two writing instruments. In the side pocket there is a cloth to keep your fountain pens clean. A precious and modern packaging to always carry with you your favourite writing instruments.

FEEL is an invitation to live a unique writing experience of the highest quality; it is an exhortation to seek everyone’s own writing style, it is a tribute to the aesthetics of handwriting and the pleasure of writing.

title: SCRIBO LA DOTTA Fountain Pen - Al Zigant (Limited Edition)
options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "18k Medium"]}
description:
Handmade in Italy, the SCRIBO LA DOTTA fountain pen features a rounded barrel and cap with flat ends. The swirly and shimmery blue, purple, and orange Diamondcast resin body is complemented by ruthenium trim, and fills with a built-in piston mechanism. It is fitted with an in-house made nib in 14k gold Flexible sizes or 18k gold standard sizes, with an ebonite feed. Each pen comes with a matching pen sleeve made of genuine leather and cotton.

LA DOTTA Al Zigant is a limited production run of 219 pieces.

The history of Bologna, Italy in the Middle Ages and Renaissance is full of significant events that helped shaping the city and its culture. There are many architectural monuments that tell the rich history of Bologna from these historical periods. 

The Neptune Fountain is one of the most famous monuments in Bologna and it was built in the 16th century to celebrate the power of the city. The famous fountain has been given an affectionate and ironic nickname in the dialect of Bologna by the Bolognese people, “Al Zigant” (the Giant), and it is meant to emphasize its size and impact on the city. This nickname is due to the large size of the statue, which is 3.2 meters tall and weighs 28 tons.

Thus, the LA DOTTA Al Zigant fountain pen is a tribute to the history of Bologna and some of its most significant monuments from the medieval/renaissance ages.

About SCRIBO:

SCRIBO, short for Scrittura Bolognese, was founded by former employees of the retired OMAS brand. Fundamental values include writing tradition, design, craftsmanship, and made in Italy. Every working component of the fountain pen is handmade. The heart of every SCRIBO fountain pen is the gold nib. The classic 18-carat alloy and the special Extra-Flexible 14-carat alloy both offer elasticity, mechanical memory, and softness that highlights every fountain pen's writing quality.

options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "14k Flex Medium", "14k Flex Broad"]}
description:
Handmade in Italy, the SCRIBO LA DOTTA fountain pen features a rounded barrel and cap with flat ends. From SCRIBO:

LA DOTTA Frassinago and Saragozza are dedicated to the strength and unity of Bologna. On Saturday 19th of October there was a serious flooding, in the heart of Bologna, Italy, leaving areas devastated and in need of complete rebuilds.

In the light of these recent events, we have moved forward this LA DOTTA launch, dedicating our two new editions to the support of rebuilding our community.

Therefore 30% of the revenues from these two editions will be donated to support Comune di Bologna in the rebuilds of our community.

title: SCRIBO LA DOTTA Fountain Pen - Labante (Limited Edition)
options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "18k Medium"]}
description:
Handmade in Italy, the SCRIBO LA DOTTA fountain pen features a rounded barrel and cap with flat ends. This design is handcrafted in a turquoise mother-of-pearl resin inspired by the colors of waterfalls near caves and embellished with ruthenium finishes, and fills with a built-in piston mechanism. It is fitted with an in-house made nib in 14k gold Flexible sizes or 18k gold standard sizes, with an ebonite feed. Each pen comes with a matching pen sleeve made of genuine leather and cotton.

LA DOTTA Labante is a limited production run of 119 pieces.

A few dozen kilometers from Bologna, in the hills separating Emilia-Romagna from Tuscany, we find the Labante Caves, one of the most impressive travertine formations in Italy, with a length of 54 meters and a drop of about 15 meters.

The caves were created by the erosive action of spring water that, over millennia, has created a fairy-tale and evocative landscape where you can admire stalactites, stalagmites, flows and pools. In addition to their geological value, the Labante Caves are located in an area of great scenic beauty, and their dark and silent environment is capable of creating an evocative and fascinating atmosphere.

The travertine that makes them up is a sedimentary limestone that is widespread in Emilia-Romagna and in Bologna itself. In fact, travertine has been used since Roman times for the construction of numerous historic buildings in our city including, the Two Towers and the incomplete Basilica of San Petronio facade that dominates Piazza Maggiore in the city center.

About SCRIBO:

The classic 18-carat alloy and the special Extra-Flexible 14-carat alloy both offer elasticity, mechanical memory, and softness that highlights every fountain pen's writing quality.

The history of Bologna, Italy in the Middle Ages and Renaissance is full of significant events that helped shaping the city and its culture. There are many architectural monuments that tell the rich history of Bologna from these historical periods. 

In the early Middle Ages, between the 11th and 13th centuries, dozens of towers were built in Bologna, reaching more than 100. Bologna, at that time, appeared as a veritable “selva turrita”, a wild turreted city, like a modern-day Manhattan, but older by almost a millennium.

Thus, the LA DOTTA Turrita fountain pen is a tribute to the history of Bologna and some of its most significant monuments from the medieval/renaissance ages.

title: SCRIBO PIUMA Fountain Pen - A Riveder Le Stelle (Limited Edition)
options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "18k Medium", "18k Broad"]}
description:
The SCRIBO PIUMA A Riveder Le Stelle is born from this upward gaze. From the need to lift our heads, search for direction, and recognize beauty even in darkness. An ancient gesture that has always been with us: looking up at the sky and letting ourselves be filled with wonder. On clear nights, stars seem to whisper.

The name of this fountain pen is an invitation. It is inspired by the final verse of Dante’s Inferno, when darkness gives way to light, when Dante and Virgilio emerge from the abyss and the sky lights up once again above them. A verse that still reminds us today how powerful even a single fragment of light can be. The body, made of deep and translucent midnight blue resin, evokes the night sky dotted with stars. Palladium-finished details shine like thin lines of distant galaxies, tracing a secret map between the sky and the page.

PIUMA – A riveder le stelle is made in just 219 pieces. Each fountain pen is unique, like every truly starry night. An invitation to slow down, observe, and entrust to ink what deserves to remain.

Handmade in Italy, the SCRIBO PIUMA fountain pen features a seamless barrel and cap. The blue resin body is complemented by palladium trim, and fills with a cartridge/converter (included). It is fitted with an in-house made nib in 14k gold Flexible sizes or 18k gold standard sizes, with an ebonite feed. Each pen comes with a matching pen sleeve made of genuine leather and cotton.

Handmade with a vivid deep blue resin that reproduces the effect of stone, the Agata PIUMA is inspired by the Agate stone and its symbolism.

The name agate derives from the Greek word “achates”, the river where in ancient times large quantities of this stone were found and extracted. The meaning attributed to agate is ‘stone of magic that brings calm and peace’.

With its yellow gold trim, the SCRIBO PIUMA Agata precisely inspires this sense of inner well-being.

options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "18k Medium"]}
description:

Handmade with a vivid purple resin that reproduces the effect of stone, the Ametista PIUMA is inspired by the Amethyst and its symbolism.

Amethyst is a variety of quartz, characterized by the presence of purplish shades. It often originates in sub-alkaline basaltic rocks. Known to man since 3,000 BC, this crystal was mined and venerated in Egypt, South Africa and Mesopotamia. The name amethyst derives from the Greek “améthystos” meaning “not drunk”, an etymology at the basis of one of the most fascinating myths in history.

The SCRIBO PIUMA Ametista, with yellow gold finish, is inspired by one of the longest-lived precious stones a symbol of the elixir of life.

title: SCRIBO PIUMA Fountain Pen - Ara (Limited Edition)
options: {"Nib Size": ["14k Flex Extra-Fine", "14k Flex Fine", "18k Medium"]}
description:
Aras, with their flamboyant plumage and lively personalities, are among the most iconic parrots in the world. Native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, these fascinating birds embody the exotic beauty and lush biodiversity of their natural habitats and are considered as radiant jewels of the Tropics.

The most distinctive feature of Aras is undoubtedly their plumage. Each species sports a unique combination of vibrant colors, ranging from fiery red to sunny yellow, cobalt blue to emerald green.

Beyond their beauty and allure, Aras play a crucial ecological role, maintaining the delicate balance of tropical ecosystems. Spotting an Ara in its natural environment is an unforgettable experience, a reminder of the fragile beauty and precious biodiversity our planet harbors.

Handmade in Italy, the SCRIBO PIUMA fountain pen are inspired by the bright colors of the plumage of these tropical birds and are a genuine rainbow of colors, fixed by hand with brush and airbrush. Finally, the color layering is protected by a special anti-UV lacquer to protect its luminosity over time. It is complemented by platinum trim, and fills with a cartridge/converter (included). It is fitted with an in-house made nib in 14k gold Flexible sizes or 18k gold standard sizes, with an ebonite feed. Each pen comes with a matching pen sleeve made of genuine leather and cotton.

PIUMA Ara is a limited production run of 90 pieces.

description:
A tribute to timeless design and enduring craftsmanship. The Legacy collection combines Sheaffer's storied heritage with a modern sensibility, crafted for those who value tradition and redefined for those who shape the future. 

A symbol of timeless elegance, the Sheaffer Legacy revives the signature inlaid stainless steel nib in size fine or medium, a masterpiece of design and craftsmanship that has inspired generations of writers. Reimagined for the present, this pen doesn’t just write; it remembers. title: TACCIA Empress Chinkin Fountain Pen - Tiger (Limited Edition)
description:
2022 was the year of Five Yellow Tigers, a very special time which occurs once every 36 years. The year of Five Yellow Tigers is deeply connected to the traditional Chinese folklore.

The legend is rooted in the Nine Star Ki and the twelve signs of the Chinese zodiac. It is said that every 36 years the fifth star, which is associated with Saturn, and the Five Yellow Tigers meet to create an extraordinary powerful leader. This individual is gifted with natural disposition for leadership and possesses innate power that overshadows those around it. We wish that this Soaring Tiger brings you great prosperity and an abundance of peace.

In celebration of this special year, Taccia's famous Chinkin artist presents one of the most delicate Japanese Maki-e techniques. The Empress Chinkin Tiger Maki-e LE pen is masterfully carved to accentuate the power exuding from the Soaring Tiger while highlighting the three-dimensional beauty and intricacies of the Chinkin technique.

Each Taccia Empress Chinkin Tiger Maki-e LE pen is fitted with an exceptional 18K gold “King of Pen" nib, made in Japan exclusively for Taccia. This stunning pen is limited to 36 pens, available exclusively in North America.

The airtight cushion seal cap allows for a snug closure. Each limited edition fountain pen is individually numbered out of 36, and is accompanied with a certificate of authenticity. It comes packaged in a wooden gift box and comes with a cloth pen wrap. The pen fills with either a proprietary Sailor converter or Sailor ink cartridges; both are included.

Click here to shop all compatible Sailor ink cartridges.

Please note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: TACCIA Empress Fossils in the Sky Fountain Pen - Shadow (Limited Edition)
description:
The TACCIA Empress Fossils in the Sky outstanding limited edition collection features the use of Rankaku Maki-e techniques, the masterful inlay of quail eggshells combined with expert application of Urushi lacquer for astonishing results.

The tremendous skill and time invested in creating each individual work of art that you hold and write with is clearly evident, and you will love the massive famously smooth two-toned 18K gold King of Pen nib.

It takes several months to complete the hand-laid Maki-e technique, Rankaku, on the hand-polished ebonite barrel of the oversized Empress LE body. Each is fitted with a significant 18 karat gold “King of Pen” nib, made in Japan exclusively for TACCIA.

These fountain pens are made by hand in TACCIA Urushi studio in Wajima, enhancing traditional inlay techniques with precious metals and lacquers. The body features natural urushi lacquer and classic maki-e techniques such as rankaku (eggshell inlay). The airtight cushion seal cap allows for a snug closure.

Each limited edition Fossils in the Sky fountain pen is individually numbered out of 88, and is accompanied with a certificate of authenticity. It comes packaged in a wooden gift box and comes with a cloth pen wrap and a bottle of matching ink.

The pen fills with either a proprietary Sailor converter or Sailor ink cartridges; both are included.

Please note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: TACCIA Empress Fountain Pen - Koi Oasis (Limited Edition)
description:
TACCIA is proud to introduce its newest flagship design-The TACCIA Empress Limited Edition Collection. This collection not only represents their dedication to honored traditions, but also as a celebration of TACCIA's roots, founded by their matriarch. Experienced Maki-e artisans hand-laid the unique Maki-e technique, Raden and Rankaku on each hand polished ebonite barrel, that takes several months to complete. Each TACCIA Empress LE pen is fitted with a significant 18K gold "King of Pen" nib, made in Japan exclusively for TACCIA.

The Empress Koi Oasis fountain pen is enhanced with exquisite designs of Koi fish swimming with water lilies and lily pads. Rankaku (quail eggshell) and Raden (abalone shell) are used in the design, and even the clip has maki-e urushi lacquer applied.

It is fitted with an exceptional King of Pen 18K gold nib, and is limited to only 20 fountain pens worldwide. The pen fills with either a proprietary Sailor converter or Sailor ink cartridges; both are included.

This piece highlights the mastery of Taka Maki-e with such control and precision that you will be mesmerized by how the honeybees are floating above the golden honeycombs sparkling with Raden and Nashiji gold powder. The delicate way the honeybees' wings have been adorned from mother of pearl and the sparkle of Raden in their eyes are absolutely enchanting. 

In Japan, honeybees are a symbol of diligence, prosperity, and wealth and the chrysanthemum flowers represent longevity and renewal. We hope this piece brings you all that it symbolizes and further enhances your collection.

This oversized Ao-Iro fountain pen features an exquisite deep blue urushi lacquered ebonite body, adorned with delicate quail eggshell and raden maki-e inlay. Over 20 different layers of urushi lacquer go into the making of this pen.

The Empress model is fitted with the famous Japanese King of Pen bi-color 18k gold nib, and fills with either a proprietary Sailor converter or Sailor ink cartridges; both are included. A fabric pen wrap and a complementary bottle of ink are also included in the wooden gift box.

title: TACCIA Miyabi Bon-Bori Fountain Pen - Lunar Prairie (Limited Edition)
description:
This Maki-e fountain pen has a black urushi lacquered ebonite body, featuring beautiful inlaid raden in the shape of moons as well as gold and silver dust sparkles. The cigar-shaped fountain pen has a bicolor 18k gold nib made in Japan, and fills with either a proprietary Sailor converter or Sailor ink cartridges (both are included).

Lunar Prairie is part of the limited edition TACCIA Miyabi Bon-Bori fountain pen collection celebrating the company's 20th anniversary. It comes packaged in a wooden gift box with an accompanying pen wrap and a certificate of authenticity. Each pen is individually numbered out of 20 worldwide.

From TACCIA:

In honor of its 20th anniversary and Japan's Hinamatsuri festival which dates back over 1000 years to Heian period, TACCIA introduces the Miyabi Bon-Bori LE collection. The Hinamatsuri is a Shinto festival celebrated annually on March 3rd and it’s one of the five seasonal festivals in Japan. Hence, Bon-Bori collection's five distinct and balanced designs: Aurora Grimmer, Blue Daisies, Twilight Shimmer, Cherry Blossom, and Luna Prairie.

The Miyabi Bon-Bori LE collection is produced by a single Japanese artist and involves a long and elaborate process to bring these designs to life. Uncolored abalone shells are cut to appropriate shapes and the artist individually hand paints or foils them with gold or silver. Each piece of Raden is individually arranged and intricately applied to the pen’s body by the artist to create these sophisticated designs. After each additional layers of Urushi lacquer are applied and each pen is hand polished to a radiant and lustrous finish.

The five distinct designs in this collection demonstrate the mastery of TACCIA's artist with traditional and modern Maki-e techniques using Raden, gold and silver Nashiji, creating these colorful and harmonious impressions.

The Miyabi Bon-Bori LE collection salutes femininity and celebrates happiness, health, and prosperity with its joyful designs. Each pen is equipped with an exquisite 18K gold nib, combining unique and timeless ascetics with unparalleled performance, make sure to pick-up one or all the designs that appeal to you from TACCIA authorized retailers.

title: TACCIA Miyabi Fountain Pen - Wajima Azure Wave
description:
In crafting the TACCIA Miyabi Wajima Azure Wave fountain pen, the maki-e artist employed the exquisite Kawari Nuri technique, infusing it with captivating blue hues. The Kawari-Nuri, a technique dating back to the early 17th centuries, originated from the innovative experimentation with diverse material and structures.

In this precise process, the artist begins by carefully selecting an appropriate amount of Urushi, applying it to the designated area of a pen via a stippling method using a special brush, and allowing it to dry. This sequence is repeated for each color in the design. Once the Urushi dots have been applied and dried, the artist meticulously rubs the surface to achieve a smooth finish. If unsatisfied, he starts anew, ensuring perfection in every details.

This TACCIA Miyabi fountain pen has urushi lacquer in a speckled pattern, with accents of gold, and is accented by silver trim. The airtight cushion seal cap allows for a snug closure. Each limited edition fountain pen is individually numbered out of 20 on the bottom of the barrel.

Each fountain pen is made by hand in TACCIA's Urushi studio in Wajima. It comes fitted with a bi-color 18k gold nib made in Japan. And to bring historical craftsmanship into your hand, each series is limited and signed by the maki-e artisan.

This fountain pen comes packaged in a wooden gift box and comes with a cloth pen sleeve. The pen fills with either a proprietary Sailor converter or Sailor ink cartridges; both are included.

Please also note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: TACCIA Miyabi Kaga Fountain Pen - Autumn Monsoon (Limited Edition)
description:
A Goulet exclusive in North America! As a special promo, we're including a free 40ml bottle of dark blue TACCIA Hokusai-Koiai fountain pen ink.

This maki-e TACCIA Miyabi Kaga ebonite fountain pen in Autumn Monsoon has a turquoise background with specs of black and gold, and is accented by silver trim. The airtight cushion seal cap allows for a snug closure. Each limited edition fountain pen is individually numbered out of 100 on the bottom of the barrel.

In the 17th century, Tsunanori Maeda, the fuedal lord of the Kaga Domain, collected a series of historically important craftsmanship techniques now referred to as Hyakka-Hisho. To honor the artwork and creativity of this original period, TACCIA has created the Kaga Limited Collection to pay homage to the history and tradition of this celebrated period.

Each fountain pen is made by hand in TACCIA's Urushi studio in Wajima, enhancing traditional inlay techniques with precious metals and lacquers.

To blend the old with the new, each fountain pen comes fitted with a bi-color 18k gold nib made in Japan. And to bring historical craftsmanship into your hand, each series is limited and signed by the maki-e artisan.

This fountain pen comes packaged in a wooden gift box and comes with a cloth pen sleeve. The pen fills with either a proprietary Sailor converter or Sailor ink cartridges; both are included.

title: Tom Hessin Charles Fountain Pen - Birmingham Noir
description:
Bringing heritage, expertise, creativity and contemporary design to create fine writing instruments for everyday writing. The Tom Hessin Charles collection is an enviable design that will doubtlessly be the eye-candy of every office meeting, and will flawlessly carry you through to any album-worthy signature occasion. The Charles collection is the culmination of five generations in the pen industry; each generation represented by a diamond design elegantly depicted in the clip detail. With expertise dating back to 1870, the Charles fountain pen earns its moniker from the ‘Charles’ name that spans the family tree.

The Charles Birmingham Noir will take you straight from the office to a working lunch. A fountain pen inspired by 18th Century heritage in Birmingham’s Jewellery Quarter. Once the centre of a thriving global pen industry, Birmingham is now the UK’s second city with a vibrant and trendy scene. This fountain pen carefully crafted using high grade European resin with an elegant and modern finish. The black finish of the pen represent the industrial era, and modernized with a glossy tapered barrel and chrome trims. 

Featuring a reliably smooth silver PVD JoWo nib x Tom Hessin, it also has a screw cap. The chrome clip features an engraved five diamond design detail, emblematic of the five generations that span the Tom Hessin legacy. 

Each fountain pen is presented in a stylish Tom Hessin box, complete with pen card leaflet, two ink cartridges and converter. Backed by a two-year mechanical warranty.
