title: Tom Hessin Edinburgh Fountain Pen - Stockbridge Stone
description:
Tom Hessin has found inspiration for this pen from this vibrant and historic city. With a grey dyed wood finished barrel and chrome trim, this pen will look the part wherever you want to make a statement. 

The Stockbridge Stone color is inspired by the iconic Forth Bridge landmark in Scotland, bringing together Tom Hessin's historic links with this vibrant city and the original "Edinburgh Pen." This pen imitates the changing hues and dramatic shadows of this unforgettable structure. 

Featuring a reliably smooth silver PVD JoWo nib x Tom Hessin, the Edinburg provides a smooth writing experience. Adorning the push close cap (which can be posted) is a chrome clip that features an engraved five diamond design detail, emblematic of the five generations that span the Tom Hessin legacy. The understated style continues with an attractive band featuring the Tom Hessin name.

Each Edinburgh fountain pen is presented in a stylish Tom Hessin box, complete with pen card leaflet, ink cartridge and converter. Backed by a two-year mechanical warranty.

Note: This pen comes with an ink cartridge stored in the body. If it doesn’t fall right out, you can get it loose by giving the body a few solid taps on a hard surface.

Click to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Tom Hessin Rebel Fountain Pen - Garrison Green
description:
The Tom Hessin Rebel fountain pen in Garrison Green is presented with a candescent finish and military inspired color way, complete with gunmetal trim. Edgy and with a peaky twist, Garrison Green reveals its color and namesake thanks to a deep rooted history in Birmingham, England. From the Rebel collection, Garrison Green, strikes just the right balance between smart and casual to enhance your signature style.

The Rebel is complete with a tapered lacquer barrel and PVD JoWo nib, offering a smooth lay down of ink on the page. Each nib is protected by a satisfying push close cap, complete with an attractive band featuring the Tom Hessin logo. Adorning the cap is a gunmetal band, and a gunmetal clip that features the five diamond detail and is emblematic of the five generations that span the Tom Hessin legacy.

Each Rebel pen is presented in a stylish Tom Hessin box, complete with pen card leaflet, ink cartridge and converter. Backed by a two-year mechanical warranty, the Tom Hessin Rebel collection is the place to elevate your writing style. Fine writing has never looked so good! 

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Tom Hessin Rebel Fountain Pen - Jewellers Rouge
description:
Be a Rebel with Tom Hessin’s Rebel Fountain Pen in Jewellers Rouge.

The Rebel Jewellers Rouge is a striking blend of history and modern style and is inspired by beginnings in the Jewelry Quarter, Birmingham. Jewellers Rouge reveals its color and namesake from the jewelry compound used to polish precious metals. From the Rebel Collection, this pen is a statement writing instrument, promising to take your writing (and style!) to the next level

The Rebel is complete with a tapered lacquer barrel and PVD JoWo nib, offering a smooth lay down of ink on the page. Each nib is protected by a satisfying push close cap, complete with an attractive band featuring the Tom Hessin logo. Adorning the cap is a gunmetal band, and a gunmetal clip that features the five diamond detail and is emblematic of the five generations that span the Tom Hessin legacy.

Each Rebel pen is presented in a stylish Tom Hessin box, complete with pen card leaflet, ink cartridge and converter. Backed by a two-year mechanical warranty, the Tom Hessin Rebel collection is the place to elevate your writing style. Fine writing has never looked so good!

title: Tom Hessin Revolution Fountain Pen - Charcoal
description:
Join the Revolution with Tom Hessin’s Revolution Fountain Pen in Charcoal. Forged in history, Revolution is inspired by Tom Hessin’s industrial past amid the smoke and steel of 18th and 19th century Birmingham, England. Inspired by an iconic legacy, Revolution pays homage to this industrial period with a metal and wood design that juxtaposes with understated sophistication and embodies ‘Modern Heritage.’ 

An intentional contrast, the Revolution offers a contemporary wood and metal design with a real legacy story. Revolution Charcoal is made with precision manufacturing techniques, using raw materials symbolic of Tom Hessin’s legacy. The ebony wood provides a smooth barrel and offers up a subtle wood grain detail. The wooden barrel is intentionally interrupted by two decorative bands. 

Featuring a reliably smooth PVD JoWo nib x Tom Hessin, Revolution provides a smooth writing experience. Adorning the push close cap (which can be posted) is a gunmetal clip that features an engraved five diamond design detail, emblematic of the five generations that span the Tom Hessin legacy. The understated style continues with an attractive band featuring the Tom Hessin name.

Each Revolution fountain pen is presented in a stylish Tom Hessin box, complete with pen card leaflet, ink cartridge and converter. Backed by a two-year mechanical warranty.

Note: This pen comes with an ink cartridge stored in the body. If it doesn’t fall right out, you can get it loose by giving the body a few solid taps on a hard surface.

title: Traveler's Company Fountain Pen - Brass
description:
A pen that's truly built for adventure! The Traveler's Company brass fountain pen is a perfect companion for on-the-go writing. It's durable and solid construction paired with a super-portable size make it a perfect choice for the pocket. This pen accepts standard international short cartridges only - a great choice for quick and effortless ink refueling. 

At the top of the snap cap, you'll also find a sturdy ring that further adds to the pen's versatility. Unscrewing the ring allows you the option of removing the steel clip if you'd prefer a more streamlined profile.

Matching the clip is a stainless steel fine nib that will provide you with a reliable writing experience wherever your day takes you.

Brass will become tarnished when in use and develop an individual patina over time.

We've also found that the Kaweco Foldable Mini Converter fits, so you can add that on if you'd prefer to use bottled ink!

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: TWSBI Diamond 580 Fountain Pen - Clear
description:
The TWSBI Diamond 580 comes with a benchmark piston ink-filling mechanism and has all detachable parts. The clear demonstrator barrel allows you to see your ink color and remaining ink level. It has a clear grip section and screw-cap. It comes with a stainless steel nib and is presented in a modern clear display case.

The idea behind the TWSBI Diamond 580 was to go back to basics and capture the simplicity and elegance of traditional writing instruments. In recent years, the development and modernization of writing instruments has resulted in traditional writing instruments, such as fountain pens, falling into obscurity. It was TWSBI's goal to bring the past back to life by creating a traditional fountain pen that even modern day society can appreciate.

The TWSBI Diamond 580 is a classic fountain pen with a piston ink-filling system. By fusing the traditional mechanisms of the fountain pen with a modern industrial design, TWSBI has created an eye-catching fountain pen that is simultaneously appreciative of the past and relevant in the present.

TWSBI's belief is that it is important to allow the user to disassemble and reassemble the pen and completely experience the traditional aspects of owning and using a fountain pen. These pens also come packaged with a wrench and silicone grease. Neither of these accessories are intended to be used immediately, as they are for long-term care and maintenance. Additionally, please use extra care if you choose to disassemble the nib and feed, as the feed is very fragile.

You may notice a white substance on your 580AL or 580ALR pistons. This is white ball bearing grease, and must not be removed during cleanings, or replaced by silicone grease

title: TWSBI ECO Fountain Pen - Amazonite
description:
The TWSBI ECO fountain pen boasts an incredible value with its piston filling system and affordable price. Like many other TWSBI fountain pens, it features a crystal clear acrylic barrel so you can see your ink level, and a marbled seagreen cap and finial. The pen cap has an inner cap to ensure a perfect seal when stored away. It is completed with silver trim and a silver stainless steel nib.

The Amazonite color features a new coloring technique in the injection molding process to create unique patterns and colors. Every single pen will be unique.

TWSBI's belief is that it is important to allow the user to disassemble and reassemble the pen and completely experience the traditional aspects of owning and using a fountain pen. These pens also come packaged with a wrench and silicone grease. Neither of these accessories are intended to be used immediately, as they are for long-term care and maintenance. Additionally, please use extra care if you choose to disassemble the nib and feed, as the feed is very fragile.

Like many other TWSBI fountain pens, it features a crystal clear acrylic barrel so you can see your ink level, and a solid cerulean blue cap and piston knob. The pen cap has an inner cap to ensure a perfect seal when stored away. It is completed with silver trim and a silver stainless steel nib.

TWSBI's belief is that it is important to allow the user to disassemble and reassemble the pen and completely experience the traditional aspects of owning and using a fountain pen. These pens also come packaged with a wrench and silicone grease. Neither of these accessories are intended to be used immediately, as they are for long-term care and maintenance. Additionally, please use extra care if you choose to disassemble the nib and feed, as the feed is very fragile.

title: TWSBI GO Fountain Pen - Clear
description:
The TWSBI GO is the most affordable TWSBI fountain pen yet! A unique feature of this model is the spring loaded piston. This resin pen has a clear body and clear grip section, so you can see your ink and the spring piston mechanism at work, and has a clipless push/snap cap. It is completed with a silver stainless steel nib.

It is incredibly easy to fill this pen from bottled ink - simply unscrew the barrel to access the plunger, submerge the pen’s nib down into the ink, press down on the piston to compress the spring, and it will fill the barrel with ink! Screw the barrel back on and you’re ready to write.

title: TWSBI GO Fountain Pen - Sapphire
description: The TWSBI GO is the most affordable TWSBI fountain pen yet! A unique feature of this model is the spring loaded piston. This pen has a translucent blue body and clear grip section, so you can see your ink and the spring piston mechanism at work, and has a clipless push/snap cap. It is incredibly easy to fill this pen from bottled ink - simply unscrew the barrel to access the plunger, submerge the pen’s nib down into the ink, press down on the piston to compress the spring, and it will fill the barrel with ink! Screw the barrel back on and you’re ready to write. It is completed with a silver stainless steel nib.

title: TWSBI Kai Fountain Pen (Limited Edition)
description:
This TWSBI Kai fountain pen is made of a dark blue flecked acrylic resin, complemented by rose gold-plated trim, and is equipped with a rose gold-plated stainless steel nib, of comparable size to the TWSBI 580 nib. Like all TWSBIs, it comes with a benchmark piston ink-filling mechanism and has all detachable parts. An ink window allows you to see your remaining ink level.

While the pen cap will physically fit onto the back of the pen body in a way that would be considered ‘posting’, TWSBI recommends not doing so to avoid potentially scratching the barrel. 

The TWSBI Kai is a limited edition and will not be produced ongoing.

TWSBI's belief is that it is important to allow the user to disassemble and reassemble the pen and completely experience the traditional aspects of owning and using a fountain pen. These pens also come packaged with a wrench and silicone grease. Neither of these accessories are intended to be used immediately, as they are for long-term care and maintenance. Additionally, please use extra care if you choose to disassemble the nib and feed, as the feed is very fragile.

title: TWSBI Mini AL Fountain Pen - Silver
description:
The TWSBI Mini AL comes with a benchmark piston ink-filling mechanism and has all detachable parts. Like many other TWSBI fountain pens, it features a crystal clear acrylic barrel so you can see your ink level, and a clear cap. It is enhanced with a silver aluminum grip section and piston mechanism. It is completed with silver trim and a silver stainless steel nib.

TWSBI's belief is that it is important to allow the user to disassemble and reassemble the pen and completely experience the traditional aspects of owning and using a fountain pen. These pens also come packaged with a wrench and silicone grease. Neither of these accessories are intended to be used immediately, as they are for long-term care and maintenance. Additionally, please use extra care if you choose to disassemble the nib and feed, as the feed is very fragile.

You may notice a white substance on your 580AL or 580ALR pistons. This is bearing grease, and must not be removed during cleanings, or replaced by silicone grease.

title: TWSBI SWIPE Fountain Pen - Ice Blue
description:
The SWIPE is the newest model from TWSBI. It comes with three different filling mechanisms: a spring loaded piston converter, a traditional twist piston converter, and TWSBI proprietary ink cartridges. One of each is included! You can also fill the entire barrel with ink with an eyedropper.

This pen has a translucent turquoise blue body and cap, a clear grip section so you can see your ink flowing, and has a push/snap cap. It is completed with a silver stainless steel nib.

The SWIPE uses the same #4 size nib as the TWSBI ECO and the TWSBI GO. It can also accept standard international ink cartridges.

The SWIPE is the newest model from TWSBI. It comes with three different filling mechanisms: a spring loaded piston converter, a traditional twist piston converter, and TWSBI proprietary ink cartridges. One of each is included! You can also fill the entire barrel with ink with an eyedropper.

This pen has an opaque light green body and cap, a clear grip section so you can see your ink flowing, and has a push/snap cap. It is completed with a silver stainless steel nib.

The SWIPE uses the same #4 size nib as the TWSBI ECO and the TWSBI GO. It can also accept standard international ink cartridges.

title: TWSBI Vac Mini Fountain Pen - Clear
description:
The TWSBI Vac Mini is a slightly shorter version of the Vac700R. This clear demonstrator fountain pen fills via a vacuum filler mechanism and has a stainless steel nib.

TWSBI's belief is that it is important to allow the user to disassemble and reassemble the pen and completely experience the traditional aspects of owning and using a fountain pen. These pens also come packaged with a wrench and silicone grease. Neither of these accessories are intended to be used immediately, as they are for long-term care and maintenance. Additionally, please use extra care if you choose to disassemble the nib and feed, as the feed is very fragile.

title: TWSBI Vac700R Fountain Pen - Clear
description:

TWSBI's belief is that it is important to allow the user to disassemble and reassemble the pen and completely experience the traditional aspects of owning and using a fountain pen. These pens also come packaged with a wrench and silicone grease. Neither of these accessories are intended to be used immediately, as they are for long-term care and maintenance. If you're taking apart this pen, note that the mechanism on the Vac700R removes out of the pen in a counter-clockwise direction. This is the opposite direction from other TWSBI pens like the 580.

title: Visconti Comedia Fountain Pen - Caronte (Limited Edition)
description:
Visconti is pleased to announce the "Comedia" collection inspired by Dante Alighieri's Divine Comedy. Dante Alighieri was born in 1265 in Florence and is considered to be the greatest Italian poet who has ever lived. He is also known as the father of the Italian language as we know it. 

The first two protagonists in this ongoing series, Virgilio and Caronte, pay homage to the guiding wisdom and the unrelenting force of fate that shape the journey of the afterlife. 

The Caronte fountain pen embodies this energy through a striking dark gray-blue coloration, evoking the turbulent waters of the infernal river. Dark ruthenium finishes enhance its shadowy aura. Also in this case, Caronte's name is engraved and enameled on the central ring, just as the cap's finial is also finely engraved and enameled. 

This pen is limited to 999 pieces. Each pen is individually numbered on the back of the clip.

A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short and long cartridges. It also features Visconti's steel nib (the same as on the Visconti Mythos) that is plated to match the trim.

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Visconti Comedia Fountain Pen - Inferno
description:
Visconti is pleased to announce the "Comedia" collection inspired by Dante Alighieri's Divine Comedy. Dante Alighieri was born in 1265 in Florence and is considered to be the greatest Italian poet who has ever lived. He is also known as the father of the Italian language as we know it. His most important work "Comedia" later known as the Divine Comedy, (Divina Comedia), is a masterpiece of world literature that explores the afterlife through three realms: Hell, Purgatory and Heaven. Each realm is depicted with vivid imagery and symbolism, reflecting Dante's moral and spiritual vision of life. Inspired by this epic poem, Visconti has created a new collection that captures the essence of each realm in its design and craftsmanship.

Each pen features special trims and colored resins designed specifically to express the imagery particular to each of Dante's realms. The Inferno (Hell) is made of solid black resin with flaming-red accents and dark ruthenium trims, evoking the fire and darkness of the Inferno.

These three different versions of the Comedia are united by the unique design of the central ring, crafted specifically for this collection, featuring two bands covered in a hammered texture - a detail also found in the pens' distinctive metal section. Each individual ring is then individually engraved by our craftsmen with the inscription "Comedia" followed by the name of the specific model - Inferno, Purgatorio or Paradiso.

A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short and long cartridges. It also features Visconti's steel nib (the same as on the Visconti Mythos) that is plated to match the trim.

Click to shop all compatible short or long standard international ink cartridges.

title: Visconti Comedia Fountain Pen - Virgilio (Limited Edition)
description:
Visconti is pleased to announce the "Comedia" collection inspired by Dante Alighieri's Divine Comedy. Dante Alighieri was born in 1265 in Florence and is considered to be the greatest Italian poet who has ever lived. He is also known as the father of the Italian language as we know it. 

The first two protagonists in this ongoing series, Virgilio and Caronte, pay homage to the guiding wisdom and the unrelenting force of fate that shape the journey of the afterlife. 

Virgilio, the venerable poet and Dante's unwavering guide through Inferno and Purgatorio, embodies reason, wisdom, and the pursuit of knowledge. Always depicted in a flowing white tunic and crowned with laurel, Virgilio is now immortalized in a writing instrument that reflects his timeless elegance.

The Virgilio fountain pen features a refined acrylic resin body in shades of ivory, transitioning into hints of laurel green and touches of fire red, symbolizing wisdom and the passion for enlightenment. Adorned with bright yellow gold trims, this pen is a tribute to the poet's noble spirit. The central ring is engraved and enameled with Virgilio's name, a signature of his eternal legacy. 

This pen is limited to 999 pieces. Each pen is individually numbered on the back of the clip.

A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short and long cartridges. It also features Visconti's steel nib (the same as on the Visconti Mythos) that is plated to match the trim.

title: Visconti Divina Fountain Pen - Matte Black
description:
The Visconti Divina fountain pen features a classic spiral shape evoking the nautilus, a symbol of divine proportion

For this new Matte collection, Visconti started with the iconic design of the Divina and placed it in a contemporary context, freeing it from the classic silver elements. The only protagonist of this collection is the color black which, in the matte version, gives the pen a mysterious, rebellious, and sensual character. This timeless color is featured in all the metal elements of the pen, made of silver and finished in ruthenium.

The Visconti Divina Matte Black fountain pen fills with the Visconti pull and turn piston mechanism. It is completed with a ruthenium-plated 14k gold nib and Visconti's patented 'Hook Safe Lock' capping system. This pen is set in a gift box with a manual and is covered by Visconti’s 2-year warranty.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Crystal Dream Fountain Pen
description:
The Homo Sapiens Crystal Dream is an exceptional fountain pen, showcasing all of the unique benefits of the original, award-winning Homo Sapiens with several upgrades and modifications:

Crystal Ink Chamber: The most discernible modification to the body of the pen is the addition of a large transparent window made from crystal acrylic resin. A large section of lava has been cut out of the pens body and replaced with a piece of clear crystal acrylic tube, transforming the pen into a demonstrator with a unique appearance and identity. This 'oversize' window offers the user a view of stored ink inside the pen and the pens 'double reservoir' power filling system

Double Reservoir: The original Homo Sapiens featured Visconti's 'single reservoir' power filling system. The Crystal Dream is upgraded to Visconti's patented 'double reservoir' power filler, a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel.

Crystal Ring: The final change is the small ring around the pens grip section. Metal has been replaced with crystal acrylic resin, offering a view of stored ink in the pens second smaller ink reservoir.

As with the original Homo Sapiens, the Crystal Dream is made from volcanic lava rock making the pen virtually unbreakable, naturally hygroscopic and very comfortable to write with. All trims are made from natural bronze and the cap closes with Visconti's patented 'hook safe lock'. The Homo Sapiens Crystal Dream is a must-have for every Visconti pen enthusiast.

The Homo Sapiens is handmade from hardened basaltic lava sourced from the Mount Etna volcano in Italy, with a trim made of solid bronze. Visconti lava is virtually unbreakable, comfortable and warm to the touch - and slightly hygroscopic, absorbing moisture from your hand. The basaltic lava is mixed with resin to create this pen.

The pen caps using the Visconti 'Hook Safe Lock', a revolutionary capping system so you can cap a pen without worrying about the cap accidentally unscrewing in your pocket and leaking. The fountain pen's double reservoir vacuum power filler is made of titanium to resist ink corrosion, and it features a rose gold-plated oversized 18k gold nib to match the trim color.

description:

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Earth Origins Fountain Pen - Aether (Limited Edition)
description:
Through the Homo Sapiens Earth Origins collection, Visconti has paid homage to the primordial forces of the universe, capturing their essence in precious writing instruments. Now, with the final chapter of this exceptional journey, we present the most precious element: Aether. Limited to 388 pieces worldwide.

The Homo Sapiens Earth Origins Aether pen is crafted from a mesmerizing bluish-purple resin made by Jonathon Brooks, a shade long associated with nobility, wisdom and the infinite sky. The celestial hue, shifting between deep violet and radiant indigo, captures the essence of the cosmic unknown.

The pen is embellished with rose gold trim, a warm and luminous contrast that enhances its aura of refinement and sophistication. The 18kt pure gold nib, designed to offer an exceptional writing experience, reflects the preciousness and mastery that distinguish Visconti.

The Homo Sapiens features a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel. This revolutionary closing system is very satisfying to operate and was created to lock the pen body into the cap to prevent the possibility of the pen accidentally unscrewing and leaking inside a pocket or bag.

It comes with Visconti's 18kt gold in-house nib hand-crafted and manufactured in Florence, Italy. Available in EF, F, M, and B.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

Please note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Earth Origins Fountain Pen - Air (Limited Edition)
description:
Visconti is thrilled to announce the next launch of their latest Homo Sapiens collection featuring Jonathon Brooks' industry famous hand-mixed resin: the Homo Sapiens Earth Origins. Two pens inspired by the elements that make up our planet, fire and air, each limited to 388 pieces worldwide.

The four elements come together in this collection to remind us of the origins of our planet. Earth, wind, fire, and water interacting to form the materials of our existence. Inspired by the mythical and primordial forces that shaped our planet and ignited the very spark of human existence, this collection embodies the essence of timeless energy and boundless inspiration.

Windy grey hues and dark blue tones interweave with a vibrant iridescent teal bringing life to the "Air" edition. These natural resins are mixed and swirled creating images of a hazy, stormy sky. Each pen is accented by silver trim to compliment the cool resin tones. The clip is filled with a bright, iridescent teal - an element that ties back to the Earth and Water editions of the Earth Origins collection.

The Homo Sapiens features a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel. This revolutionary closing system is very satisfying to operate and was created to lock the pen body into the cap to prevent the possibility of the pen accidentally unscrewing and leaking inside a pocket or bag.

It comes with Visconti's 18kt gold in-house nib hand-crafted and manufactured in Florence, Italy. Available in EF, F, M, and B.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Bronze Age
description:
The Homo Sapiens is handmade from hardened basaltic lava sourced from the Mount Etna volcano in Italy, with a trim made of solid bronze. Visconti lava is virtually unbreakable, comfortable and warm to the touch - and slightly hygroscopic, absorbing moisture from your hand. The basaltic lava is mixed with resin to create this pen.

The pen caps using the Visconti 'Hook Safe Lock', a revolutionary capping system so you can cap a pen without worrying about the cap accidentally unscrewing in your pocket and leaking. The fountain pen's vacuum power filler is made of titanium to resist ink corrosion, and it features a rose gold-plated oversized 18k gold nib to match the trim color (note: our images may still show the old 23kt palladium nib).

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Bronze Age (Custom Nib Grind)
description:
Special Goulet exclusive! These fountain pens feature a custom nib grind by nibmeister Mark Bacas, in options Fine Cursive Smooth Italic or Medium Cursive Smooth Italic.

Mark describes his Cursive Smooth Italic (CSI) as a smoother version of a Cursive Italic grind. The CSI nib grind still provides nice line variation while providing a smoother writing experience in a larger variety of writing positions/angles. An italic nib writes more broadly on the downstrokes, and narrow on the sidestrokes.

The Visconti Homo Sapiens is handmade from hardened basaltic lava sourced from the Mount Etna volcano in Italy, with a trim made of solid bronze. Visconti lava is virtually unbreakable, comfortable and warm to the touch - and slightly hygroscopic, absorbing moisture from your hand. The basaltic lava is mixed with resin to create this pen.

The pen caps using the Visconti 'Hook Safe Lock', a revolutionary capping system so you can cap a pen without worrying about the cap accidentally unscrewing in your pocket and leaking. The fountain pen's vacuum power filler is made of titanium to resist ink corrosion, and it features an oversized 18k rose gold nib to match the trim color (note: our images may still show the old 23kt palladium nib).

Visconti has recently updated their branding and font used on their clips. During this transition, you may receive a pen with a slightly different font than what is shown here.

As these nibs have been modified, please contact us directly for any warranty issues.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Carbon Abyssus (Limited Edition)
description:
The Homo Sapiens Carbon Abyssus represents the second chapter of a collection born from the desire to unite aesthetics and innovation through the use of cutting-edge materials.

While the first edition celebrated golden reflections immersed in forged carbon, this new creation pushes the boundaries of research even further, transforming matter into a perfect expression of strength and lightness without neglecting elegance.

To achieve extreme lightness, every metal component has been reimagined: the titanium of the first Carbon Moiré gives way to Ergal, a special aluminum-based alloy used in aerospace engineering, renowned for its exceptional mechanical strength. The result is a perfect balance between solidity and writing comfort.

The carbon itself has also evolved: thanks to even more sophisticated manufacturing techniques, the fibers are denser, creating a stronger and more uniform surface. But it is the introduction of anodized blue aluminum alloy foil that radically transforms the model’s aesthetics. Among the carbon veins, iridescent reflections emerge, evoking the depth of a nocturnal ocean.

In harmony with these chromatic vibrations, all Ergal metal parts undergo a deep-blue anodization process. This finish not only enhances resistance to corrosion and scratches but also gives the product a unique stylistic identity. On the clip, the Visconti logo is highlighted with a delicate laser engraving, revealing the natural color of the underlying metal and creating an elegant contrast.

The double reservoir power filler is a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel. It also features a magnetic snap cap. 

Finally, the fountain pen is completed with an in-house made ruthenium plated 18k gold nib. This Limited Edition is individually numbered and limited to 288 pens worldwide. Each pen is presented in a beautifully crafted limited-edition box.

Note: Each of these pens has a different pattern. We do our best to photograph a pen that’s indicative of the average overall aesthetics, but expect some variance when you receive yours. It’ll be one-of-a-kind, just like your unique writing style!

Please also note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Dark Age
description:
The Homo Sapiens is handmade from hardened basaltic lava sourced from the Mount Etna volcano in Italy, with an all-black trim. Visconti lava is virtually unbreakable, comfortable and warm to the touch - and slightly hygroscopic, absorbing moisture from your hand. The basaltic lava is mixed with resin to create this pen.

The pen caps using the Visconti 'Hook Safe Lock', a revolutionary capping system so you can cap a pen without worrying about the cap accidentally unscrewing in your pocket and leaking. The fountain pen's vacuum power filler is made of titanium to resist ink corrosion, and it features an oversized black 18k gold nib to match the trim color.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Dark Age (Custom Nib Grind)
description:
Special Goulet exclusive! These fountain pens feature a custom Architect nib grind by nibmeister Mark Bacas.

For the Architect nib, Mark starts with a factory nib and grinds away the sides of it, polishing it smooth until it’s like the shape of a blade. This grind enables you to write with a thick cross stroke and thin down stroke, think of it as an inverted stub nib. Architect nibs are particularly dramatic in their line variation when writing print letters, though you can write whatever your personal style and see the variation in the line width pretty easily. They are sometimes also referred to as Hebrew grinds.

The Homo Sapiens is handmade from hardened basaltic lava sourced from the Mount Etna volcano in Italy, with an all-black trim. Visconti lava is virtually unbreakable, comfortable and warm to the touch - and slightly hygroscopic, absorbing moisture from your hand. The basaltic lava is mixed with resin to create this pen.

The pen caps using the Visconti 'Hook Safe Lock', a revolutionary capping system so you can cap a pen without worrying about the cap accidentally unscrewing in your pocket and leaking. The fountain pen's vacuum power filler is made of titanium to resist ink corrosion, and it features an oversized black 18k gold nib to match the trim color (note: our images may still show the old 23kt palladium nib).

Visconti has recently updated their branding and font used on their clips. During this transition, you may receive a pen with a slightly different font than what is shown here.

Note: While photos show Broad our Architect nibs are currently ground from Mediums.

As these nibs have been modified, please contact us directly for any warranty issues.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Dark Emerald (Limited Edition)
description:
With the new Homo Sapiens Dark Sapphire and Dark Emerald collection, Visconti explores the tension between darkness and light, between the depth of matter and the brilliance - at times hidden - of precious stones. 

The new Dark Sapphire and Dark Emerald are the result of meticulous aesthetic and material research, born from the harmonious fusion of resins and pigments that blend into soft, irregular veins, illuminated by a metallic finish that evokes the natural gleam of the rarest gemstones.

Every element has been designed to enhance the chromatic depth and purity of the design. The Homo Sapiens Dark Emerald, enriched with a yellow gold plating, radiates a warm, vital energy. Dark Emerald is the pen for those who write to be renewed, for those who feel writing is an instinctive, natural and essential act.

The enameled clip, matched in color, completes the visual harmony. Both models are fitted with Visconti's precious 18kt gold nib, a symbol of Italian craftsmanship excellence and a guarantee of a fluid, precise, and harmonious writing experience.

The double reservoir power filler is a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel.

The Hook Safe Lock revolutionary cap closing system is very satisfying to operate and was created to lock the pen body into the cap to prevent the possibility of the pen accidentally unscrewing and leaking inside a pocket or bag.

The Dark Emerald Limited Edition is individually numbered and limited to 388 pens worldwide. Each pen is presented in a beautifully crafted limited edition box.

Note: Each of these pens has a different pattern and consistency of swirls. We do our best to photograph a pen that’s indicative of the average overall aesthetics, but expect some variance when you receive yours. It’ll be one-of-a-kind, just like your unique writing style!

Please also note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Dark Sapphire (Limited Edition)
description:
With the new Homo Sapiens Dark Sapphire and Dark Emerald collection, Visconti explores the tension between darkness and light, between the depth of matter and the brilliance - at times hidden - of precious stones. 

The new Dark Sapphire and Dark Emerald are the result of meticulous aesthetic and material research, born from the harmonious fusion of resins and pigments that blend into soft, irregular veins, illuminated by a metallic finish that evokes the natural gleam of the rarest gemstones. The deep blue of the resin, traced by veins of profound black, evokes the enigmatic allure of sapphire, a gem symbolizing clarity of mind and inner wisdom.

Every element has been designed to enhance the chromatic depth and purity of the design.  The Dark Sapphire, plated in palladium, reflects the refined coolness of lunar metal. Dark Sapphire is the pen for those who write to find themselves again, for those who see reflection as the highest form of intelligence.

The enameled clip, matched in color, completes the visual harmony. Both models are fitted with Visconti's precious 18kt gold nib, a symbol of Italian craftsmanship excellence and a guarantee of a fluid, precise, and harmonious writing experience.

The double reservoir power filler is a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel.

The Hook Safe Lock revolutionary cap closing system is very satisfying to operate and was created to lock the pen body into the cap to prevent the possibility of the pen accidentally unscrewing and leaking inside a pocket or bag.

The Dark Sapphire Limited Edition is individually numbered and limited to 388 pens worldwide. Each pen is presented in a beautifully crafted limited edition box.

Note: Each of these pens has a different pattern and consistency of swirls. We do our best to photograph a pen that’s indicative of the average overall aesthetics, but expect some variance when you receive yours. It’ll be one-of-a-kind, just like your unique writing style!

Please also note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Full Demo (Limited Edition)
description:
With the Homo Sapiens Full Demo, Visconti reinvents its most iconic model, transforming it into a tribute to technical mastery. This is more than a writing instrument - it is a statement of craftsmanship, revealing the hidden beauty of its inner workings.

Born from the union of the distinctive Homo Sapiens design and the allure of demonstrator pens, this edition lays bare the heart of the pen: every internal component has been reimagined to become part of the visual experience. The seals, internal fittings, and even the spring of the bayonet closure are tinged in deep blue, contrasting elegantly with gold-plated metal parts, polished to a mirror finish and engraved with exquisite precision. Completing the design, the external bronze rings recall the legacy of the legendary Lava Bronze.

Crowning this masterpiece is the debut of a new skeletonized nib in 14kt gold, inspired by the art of filigree. Its openwork structure reveals glimpses of the blue feed beneath and offers a uniquely flexible writing experience, capable of adapting line width to the pressure of the hand. Thanks to a re-engineered bayonet system, the nib remains visible even when the pen is closed - its presence, unmistakable. In a world that often favors surface over substance, Visconti chooses to reveal what truly matters: quality, ingenuity, and authentic beauty.

But true innovation lies in the way each detail has been executed. Traditional threads have been replaced by micro-screws, ensuring perfect transparency and an immaculate finish even within the pen's most concealed sections. Every component has been treated as if it were on display - because here it is.

The Homo Sapiens Full Demo is more than a pen - it is a declaration of style and truth. It is limited to 1,088 pieces worldwide and is numbered out of 1,088 on the finial. The words "Full Demo" are on the cap, opposite of the clip. 

The Homo Sapiens features a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel. 

Please note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Iris Garden (Limited Edition)
description:
Visconti is proud to announce the launch of the new Homo Sapiens Iris Garden inspired by the Iris Garden in Florence, Italy. This collection is a tribute to the beauty and elegance of the irises that bloom between the end of April and the end of May in the historic Florentine garden, located near the Piazzale Michelangelo and offers a stunning view of the city.

The history of the so-called "lily" of Florence is controversial. It seems that it originated from a white iris, the Iris Florentina, which grew abundantly in the Arno Valley during the Florentine Republic which the people called "ghiacciolo" or "icicle" for its white, slightly bluish color.

The iris is not only a symbol of Florence, but also of its rich history and culture. The lily was adapted as the emblem of the city in the 11th century, when it was used to decorate the banners and shields of the Florentine soldiers. The lily also represents wisdom, courage and faith, qualities that have characterized Florence throughout the centuries.

Like previous limited collections in the Homo Sapiens series, Iris Garden is made from special, semi-transparent demo resins carefully selected by Visconti's designers. The highlight of the collection, however, is the rose gold trims that perfectly match the coloring of the resin and add a touch of light and exquisite detail to the design.

The double reservoir power filler is a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel.

The Hook Safe Lock revolutionary cap closing system is very satisfying to operate and was created to lock the pen body into the cap to prevent the possibility of the pen accidentally unscrewing and leaking inside a pocket or bag.

Finally, the fountain pen is completed with an in-house made rose gold plated 18k gold nib.

The Iris Garden Limited Edition is individually numbered and limited to 388 pens worldwide. Each pen is presented in a beautifully crafted limited edition box.

Note: Each of these pens has a different pattern and consistency of swirls. We do our best to photograph a pen that’s indicative of the average overall aesthetics, but expect some variance when you receive yours. It’ll be one-of-a-kind, just like your unique writing style!

Please also note we are unable to accept a return of this pen for any reason once it has been used with ink. Please thoroughly inspect and dry test the pen before use.

title: Visconti Homo Sapiens Fountain Pen - Lotus Garden (Limited Edition)
description:
This newest addition to Visconti’s Homo Sapiens demonstrator series features a semi-transparent body containing shades of green and purple swirls.

Visconti is once again inspired by the inexhaustible resources of nature: the Homo Sapiens Lotus Garden collection evokes the magic and mystery of the lotus flower, in a beautiful limited edition of 888 pieces.

The lotus flower is recognized by many cultures as a symbol of strength, purity and rebirth. Its spiritual meaning comes to mind as we envisage this beautiful flower, submerged every night in river water, miraculously re-blooming the next morning sparklingly clean. The power of creation is in its DNA, just as it is in ours: Homo Sapiens, the Wise Human.

For the return of the iconic Homo Sapiens, Visconti has imagined the colors of the lotus garden, the fascinating environment which is home to the delicate flowers of the aquatic plant Nelumbo. Swirls of lilac, green and white resin combine throughout the pen, accentuated by black trim, which recalls the flower’s reflection in dark pond water, adding to its mystery. Each element harmonizes perfectly, creating an elegant and modern collection that invites you to get close to nature and enjoy its incredible power.

The double reservoir power filler is a vacuum filling system that is easy to use and has considerable benefits. Patented in 1998, this is arguably the most advanced filling system ever developed in fountain pen history. The user is able to fill the pen with the equivalent of 10 cartridges of ink, and thanks to the two reservoirs, prevents ink from leaking during air travel.

The Hook Safe Lock revolutionary cap closing system is very satisfying to operate and was created to lock the pen body into the cap to prevent the possibility of the pen accidentally unscrewing and leaking inside a pocket or bag.

Finally, the fountain pen is completed with an in-house made ruthenium plated 18k gold nib.

The Lotus Garden Limited Edition is individually numbered and limited to 888 pens worldwide. Each pen is presented in a beautifully crafted limited edition box.

Note: Each of these pens has a different pattern and consistency of swirls. We do our best to photograph a pen that’s indicative of the average overall aesthetics, but expect some variance when you receive yours. It’ll be one-of-a-kind, just like your unique writing style!

title: Visconti Kaleido Fountain Pen - Fire Opal
description:
Visconti is delighted to announce the new 'Kaleido' collection, a colorful collaboration with USA resin manufacturer, Jonathon Brooks, of the 'Carolina Pen Company'.

Two spectacular but uniquely different resins were selected for their irresistible display of vibrant, shimmering colors: Unicorn Galaxy and Fire Opal. Both resins were selected for their color saturation and mystifying swirling. The Fire Opal is dusted with gold flecks to add to the luminescence of the orange resin and give a kaleidoscope effect. It is complemented by gold vermeil trim and a 14k gold nib.

The resin for each pen was made by Jonathon in the USA, and then sent to Italy where it was hand turned at Visconti’s Florentine factory into their iconic 'Kaleido' pen model. A classic Visconti pen that is impeccably designed and weighted offering the perfect everyday writing experience.

Visconti goes further adding patented innovations that pen enthusiasts have to come to admire and appreciate from Visconti: the iconic 'Ponte Vecchio' bridge clip, Hook Safe Lock closure system, and Visconti’s high power vacuum filling system. Finally Visconti adds a newly detailed ring with a swirled ‘V’ logo design to accentuate the collection.

Each pen is individually numbered on the bottom of the barrel.

title: Visconti Medici Fountain Pen - Briarwood / Yellow Gold
description:
Visconti is thrilled to announce the launch of the new Medici Briarwood collection. The Medici collection has been redesigned and draws on the best of Visconti's historical heritage and DNA, enriching it with valuable new features such as a new demonstrator central ring, made with the skeletonization technique, which features the official emblem of Florence, the lily. This symbol, found on the city's coat of arms, represents beauty, nobility and pride. As a fundamental element of Florentine culture and tradition since the Middle Ages, it has been represented in paintings by numerous Florentine artists such as Sandro Botticelli, Leonardo da Vinci and Michelangelo Buonarroti as a link between Florence and artistic beauty.

Inspired by the geometry of the Florence Baptistry, the pen's shape was designed following the principles of the golden ratio. The central ring is just one example of the enhancements made to this historical collection, which is a part of Visconti's heritage. The loading system now features a capacious power-filler double reservoir and the clip, which was previously laser-engraved, has been replaced with a new enameled version.

The pen is made of Acrosilk, an innovative material first introduced by Visconti, which consists of a compound of acrylic resin and silk fibers. For a more contemporary look, this special acrylic blend has been sandblasted to achieve a fine satin finish giving the look of finished wood grain.

This pen features briarwood-colored resin and gold-plated trim. It also has Visconti's 18kt gold in-house gold nib, available in EF, F, M, and B. It's completed with Double Reservoir Power Filler and a Hook Safe Lock.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same.

title: Visconti Medici Fountain Pen - Riccardi (Limited Edition)
description:
Visconti is thrilled to announce their latest US exclusive, a stunning collection inspired by the legendary Medici family of Florence.

This limited edition Visconti Palazzo collection seamlessly blends Renaissance elegance with Visconti's modern craftsmanship, celebrating the family's renowned estates in Florence, the Palazzo's Pitti, Riccardi and Vecchio. These grand estates symbolized the family's shift from humble merchants to political giants.

The Medici family's estates in Florence each symbolize a stage in their rise to power. These incredible structures signified Medici dominance over both Florence and their competitors. The palaces were filled with art from the greatest Renaissance masters, showcasing the family's wealth.

Featuring a stunning Jonathan Brooks resin with the classic Visconti Medici body design, this collection comes exclusively as a fountain pen and is equipped with Visconti's iconic Power Filler Double Reservoir system.

Inspired by the geometry of the Florence Baptistry, the pen's shape was designed following the principles of the golden ratio. The Medici Palazzo is accented by the beautiful demonstrator central ring, made with the skeletonization technique, featuring the official emblem of Florence, the lily. This symbol, found on the city's coat of arms, represents beauty, nobility and pride.

The cap is equipped with Visconti's famous hook safe lock system, ensuring an even more secure and solid seal. Each pen features a beautiful 18kt gold nib with a finish that matches the color of the pen's trim, and a matching enameled clip.

This elegant new collection is offered in three colorways and is limited to 70 pieces in each color, available exclusively to US retailers only.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same.

title: Visconti Michelangelo Fountain Pen - Black
description:
Visconti is pleased to pay tribute to the genius of the Renaissance with the Michelangelo collection, honoring one of the greatest masters in the history of art: Michelangelo Buonarroti. A symbolic figure of the Italian Renaissance, he was able to blend painting, sculpture, architecture, and poetry into a unique, absolute, and universal language.

Inspired by his genius, Michelangelo is a writing instrument that celebrates the creative force of light, color, and form.

All metal details are palladium plated, in harmony with the timeless elegance of the silhouette. The central ring bears in high relief the original signature "Michelagnolo" just as he used to sign his works. On the opposite side of the band, a subtle detail awaits discovery: the hands of God and Adam, taken from the iconic fresco 'The Creation of Adam' in the Sistine Chapel. A discreet homage, almost a secret, inviting the observer to pause and recognize the echo of art in a small yet deeply meaningful element.

The pen's black body is crafted from translucent resin, sculpted with longitudinal facets that enhance its brilliance and create a rich visual effect full of depth and movement. A surface that feels alive, dynamic, and ever-changing - just like the Master's painting.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure. The pen is completed with a large #6 steel nib with a silver finish, made by Schmidt in Germany. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

Click to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Visconti Mirage Mythos Fountain Pen - Aphrodite
description:
Apollo, Zeus and Aphrodite are the protagonists of the brand new Visconti 'Mirage Mythos' fountain pen collection. Greek mythology teaches that the Olympian gods are immortal beings, governing the life and death of human beings. These three personalities that Visconti selected represent three different supernatural forces that inspired this new Mythos Collection.

This mauve/purple resin fountain pen with bronze shading is named after Aphrodite, the goddess of love and beauty. Daughter of Zeus, her most recognizable symbols are the dove and the sparrow.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure, and is accented by gold-plated trim. The center ring is engraved with the inscription, MYTHOS, and a V to emulate a stylized Mount Olympus. The brass grip section has a soft brushed satin finish.

The pen is completed with a large #6 steel nib with a yellow gold vermeil finish, made by Schmidt in Germany. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same. We cannot honor special requests.

title: Visconti Mirage Mythos Fountain Pen - Athena
description:
Visconti is pleased to present the latest addition to the Mythos collection: Athena.

Greek mythology teaches that the Olympian gods are immortal beings, governing the life and death of human beings. This year we celebrate the goddess Athena, who in ancient Greece was associated with wisdom, warfare and handicraft, but who later, since the Italian Renaissance, became an international symbol of wisdom, the arts and classical learning. 

The Oxford Companion to Classical Literature tells us that In Homer's epic works Athena's most common epithet is "Glaukopis" that is "bright-eyed" or "with gleaming eyes", which has also been interpreted to mean blue-eyed or grayish blue-eyed, the colors of the sea and wise and alert like an owl. 

This pen is a perfect inspiration for artists and writers who can channel this muse as they enjoy expressing themselves with this beautiful sea blue Mythos, a color which itself symbolizes serenity, inspiration and wisdom. 

This new color joins the others in the collection Zeus, Apollo, and Aphrodite.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure, and is accented by gold-plated trim. The center ring is engraved with the inscription, MYTHOS, and a V to emulate a stylized Mount Olympus. The brass grip section has a soft brushed satin finish.

The pen is completed with a large #6 steel nib with a yellow gold vermeil finish, made by Schmidt in Germany. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

title: Visconti Mirage Mythos Fountain Pen - Demeter
description:
Visconti is pleased to present the latest addition to the Mythos collection: Demeter.

Demeter, the benevolent goddess of the earth's fertility and the nourishing force behind every harvest, is honored with a design that radiates vitality and abundance. Crafted in a glossy, sunlit orange resin, her pen evokes ripened fields, golden grain, and the warmth of life-giving soil. The rich color is animated by subtle golden hues, symbolizing the sun's embrace over fertile land. This vibrant palette is paired with yellow gold trims, enhancing the luxurious aura of this edition and echoing the divine splendor of the Olympian goddess.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure, and is accented by gold and a sandblasted finish trim. The center ring is engraved with the inscription, MYTHOS, and a V to emulate a stylized Mount Olympus.

The pen is completed with a large #6 steel nib with gold finish, made by Schmidt in Germany. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

title: Visconti Mirage Mythos Fountain Pen - Hades
description:
Visconti is pleased to present the latest addition to the Mythos collection: Hades.

The Mirage Mythos Hades draws inspiration from the Underworld itself. It is a writing instrument for leaders, visionaries, and keepers of legacy for those who rule without needing to be seen.

Hades transforms darkness into pure sophistication. Emerging from this depth, the gold trim and nib introduce a regal, restrained brilliance like precious light surfacing on hidden treasure. An intense black resin, shot through with fiery red streaks, evokes the rivers of fire and shadowed depths of the Underworld.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure, and is accented by gold trim. The center ring is engraved with the inscription, MYTHOS, and a V to emulate a stylized Mount Olympus.

The pen is completed with a large #6 steel nib with gold finish, made by Schmidt in Germany. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

title: Visconti Mirage Mythos Fountain Pen - Persephone
description:
Visconti is pleased to present the latest addition to the Mythos collection: Persephone.

Persephone, the enigmatic daughter of Demeter and queen of the underworld, represents duality and transformation - the eternal cycle of light and shadow. Her pen captures this mystique with a deep violet matte resin, interwoven with midnight blue undertones, invoking the quiet majesty of dusk and the silent promise of spring's return. The design conveys strength, poise, and the sovereignty of a goddess who reigns over the threshold between worlds.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure, and is accented by ruthenium and a sandblasted finish trim. The center ring is engraved with the inscription, MYTHOS, and a V to emulate a stylized Mount Olympus.

The pen is completed with a large #6 steel nib with ruthenium finish, made by Schmidt in Germany. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

title: Visconti Mirage Mythos Fountain Pen - Poseidon
description:
Visconti is pleased to present the latest addition to the Mythos collection: Poseidon.

Greek mythology teaches that the Olympian gods are immortal beings, governing the life and death of human beings. Meet the latest Visconti Mythos, Poseidon, the protector of seafarers and the guardian of many Hellenic cities and colonies.

The Poseidon pen is a stunning example of Visconti's design philosophy. The dark sea blue resin captures the essence of the deep sea, where Poseidon was believed to dwell and rule over the waves and storms. In coordination with the dark color of the resin, for the first time in the collection, features a ruthenium nib and trims. Both the pen's body and trims are sandblasted to create an elegant contemporary feel to the design.

This pen is a perfect inspiration for artists and writers who can channel this muse as they enjoy expressing themselves with this beautiful deep blue Mythos.

The Poseidon pen is a perfect choice for anyone who loves the sea, mythology or simply appreciates a fine writing instrument.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure, and is accented by brass with Ruthenium in a sandblasted finish trim. The center ring is engraved with the inscription, MYTHOS, and a V to emulate a stylized Mount Olympus.

The pen is completed with a large #6 steel nib with ruthenium finish, made by Schmidt in Germany. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

title: Visconti Mirage Mythos Fountain Pen - Zeus
description:
Apollo, Zeus and Aphrodite are the protagonists of the brand new Visconti 'Mirage Mythos' fountain pen collection. Greek mythology teaches that the Olympian gods are immortal beings, governing the life and death of human beings. These three personalities that Visconti selected represent three different supernatural forces that inspired this new Mythos Collection.

This blue resin fountain pen with bronze shading is named after Zeus, the king of the gods and ruler of Mount Olympus, god of the sky, lightning and atmospheric phenomena. The thunderbolt is his symbol for excellence.

The cap elegantly closes with a magnetic twist closure, and is accented by gold-plated trim. The center ring is engraved with the inscription, MYTHOS, and a V to emulate a stylized Mount Olympus. The brass grip section has a soft brushed satin finish.

title: Visconti Opera Gold Fountain Pen - Blue
description:
The iconic design of the Opera collection has been reimagined, drawing inspiration from the history of lyric opera. A tribute to opera masters such as Verdi, Puccini, Mozart and Rossini, whose works of storytelling and musical genius still resonate today with audiences around the world thanks to their flair, brilliance and imagination. The Opera Gold collection is an invitation to remember that greatness always begins with someone somewhere.

The Opera Gold is a unique and exciting offering from Visconti, a fountain pen that features many of Visconti’s iconic innovations enjoyed and desired by fountain pen enthusiasts, but at a new accessible price point.

Each fountain pen features details reminiscent of early Visconti designs. The classic ‘squaring the circle’ shape, a luxurious matte gold finish with detailed engravings and an abundance of innovation.

The name of the collection, 'Opera' is shown on the front of the ring to enhance the link between Visconti and the city of Florence. The design elements on the remaining sides of the ring include a typical Florentine decoration with four loops inspired by the bronze tiles by Brunelleschi and Ghiberti on the north door of the Baptistery of Santa Maria del Fiore, with the addition of the Visconti “V” from the logo.

As always, Visconti excels at creating uniquely swirled resins, this time in 3 classic colors. The Opera Gold collection is available in blue, red and black infused with gold marbling. Matte finish gold plated trim completes the elegant design of this classic Visconti pen design featuring a large yellow gold plated stainless steel nib.

The fountain pen fills using Visconti's patented double reservoir power filler and features a second ink window around the ring of the pen behind the nib. The fountain pen and rollerball versions also feature Visconti's patented hook-safe lock closure and the fountain pen features a newly designed piston rod.

The fountain pen features Visconti's new, popular large steel nib plated in yellow gold. The nib features Visconti's iconic engraved details.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material there will be some variation in the pattern seen here. This adds an element of uniqueness to the pen, with no two patterns being exactly the same.

title: Visconti Van Gogh Fountain Pen - Café Terrace at Night
description:
Made from natural resin uniquely mixed to represent palettes of oil paint, this Visconti Van Gogh series is inspired by the artist's color and technique. Each pen represents a specific Van Gogh painting. The pen utilizes Visconti's eighteen-faceted design, with the many edges enhancing its vivid colors. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

One of Van Gogh's most treasured and iconic paintings is the Café Terrace at Night. The painting depicts the terrace of the café on the Place du Forum in Arles, France and is the first painting in which Van Gogh used starry backgrounds; he went on to paint star-filled skies in ‘Starry Night Over the Rhône’ and the ‘The Starry Night’ a year later. This pen is brought to life by blue, orange, yellow and green hues to recreate Van Gogh’s technique, emotion and mood portrayed in this remarkable painting.

Now available as a gift set with a matching bottle of ink and a special edition bookmark.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, expect some variation in the pattern from what you see here.

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges.

title: Visconti Van Gogh Fountain Pen - Flowering Plum Orchard
description:
"Flowering Plum Orchard" is the second oil painting selected by Visconti from Van Gogh's Japanese series. The artist made this painting in 1887 from a Japanese print by Hiroshige, called Plum Garden in Kameido. Visconti's latest launch draws inspiration from this most treasured and iconic paintings. 

The collection has yellow gold plated metal fittings which add light to the red, green, and brown acrylic resin. The fountain pen comes with a new red ink called "Flowering Plum Orchard" and is available in fine and medium widths. A converter is included with each fountain pen. It is also accompanied by a bookmark showing a detail of the painting.

The ancient plum tree that was the subject of the original print had the poetic nickname of "the sleeping dragon plum tree". Van Gogh accurately reproduced the composition with more intense colors replacing the black and grey of Hiroshige's tree trunk with red and blue tones. He also added the two orange borders with Japanese characters for a decorative and exotic effect.

title: Visconti Van Gogh Fountain Pen - Potato Eaters
description:
Made from natural resin uniquely mixed to represent palettes of oil paint, this Visconti Van Gogh series is inspired by the artist's color and technique. Each pen represents a specific Van Gogh painting. The pen utilizes Visconti's eighteen-faceted design, with the many edges enhancing its vivid colors.

Regarded by Van Gogh himself as his most significant painting, The Potato Eaters captures the raw beauty of humble life. This essence is masterfully reflected in the pen's design, featuring a dark palette enriched with earthy tones of green and ochre. Each pen is an ode to the painting's depth, texture, and spirit. This fountain pen features a stainless steel nib. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges. It comes packaged in a gift box with a reproduction of the painting, and a 30ml bottle of black ink.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, expect some variation in the pattern from what you see here.

title: Visconti Van Gogh Fountain Pen - Sunflowers
description:
Visconti's latest launch draws inspiration from one of Van Gogh's most treasured and iconic paintings, 'Sunflowers'. Van Gogh painted with three shades of yellow ‘and nothing else’. In doing so, he demonstrated that it was possible to create an image with numerous variations of a single color without any loss of eloquence.

The Visconti ‘Sunflowers’ fountain pen is made from natural resin, brought to life by vibrant yellow hues expressing a special significance for Van Gogh: ‘gratitude’. The meticulous selection of resins and their color mix is one of the major innovations introduced by Visconti and makes each and every Visconti Van Gogh pen unique. The colors are further enhanced by the unique 18 faceted design of the Van Gogh Collection.

Just like other painters working at the time, Van Gogh created floral themed still-life paintings, but he did things a little differently, experimented with color. After practicing with different flowers, he chose a specific variety: the sunflower. Thinking that these flowers were somewhat coarse and unrefined, Van Gogh gave sunflowers the lead role in several paintings.

Van Gogh knew that his sunflower paintings were special, as did other people. After he died, friends brought sunflowers with them to his funeral. Sunflowers became synonymous with Van Gogh, just as he had hoped.

Each fountain pen nib is made from steel and engraved with Van Gogh's signature. A converter is included with each pen, and the fountain pen is presented in a gift box with a bookmark and a bottle of Visconti 'sunny yellow' ink to match the pen. It also accepts standard international short cartridges.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, expect some variation in the pattern from what you see here.

title: Visconti Van Gogh Fountain Pen - Wheatfield with Crows
description:
Made from natural resin uniquely mixed to represent palettes of oil paint, this Visconti Van Gogh series is inspired by the artist's color and technique. Each pen represents a specific Van Gogh painting. The pen utilizes Visconti's eighteen-faceted design, with the many edges enhancing its vivid colors. This Wheatfield with Crows inspired blue fountain pen features a gold-plated stainless steel nib. A converter is included, and it also accepts standard international short cartridges.

It comes in a special gift box that includes a matching bottle of a new Visconti cobalt blue ink. This special edition is dated and numbered (3500 pieces in total), and the nib is unobtrusively and elegantly engraved with the artist's name.

Wheatfield with Crows is one of Van Gogh's most famous paintings and can be admired at the Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam.

Blue and yellow, a touch of black. These are not only the main colors of the painting, but also the feelings that we perceive. Looking at the artist's works, impressions become colored, chromatic combinations stir up emotions that find no other name except the name of the color itself. Blue and yellow come to life; they are no longer complements but become the true, compelling subject of the work. This combination of pigments arouses beautiful feelings, which is what Visconti has in mind as they design pens that pay tribute to this great painter of the 1900's.

We do our best to photograph the pens to show how they will appear in person, but due to the nature of the material, expect some variation in the pattern from what you see here.

title: Waldmann Grandeur Fountain Pen - Ocean Blue
description:
A magnificent and sophisticated writing instrument full of dignity and grandeur. Impressive and monumental in appearance and at the same time delicate & ornamental in detail and workmanship.

Each Waldmann Grandeur fountain pen is made from 925 sterling silver. The multi-layered transparent ocean blue lacquer on the barrel allows for the engraved wave pattern to shine through, made with the Guilloché technique. The cap features a pinstripe pattern also made by Guilloché technique. All trim parts are plated with platinum.

The cap screws on/off and posts securely onto the back of the barrel when writing. The fountain pen has a two-tone 18k gold nib, and fills via standard international cartridge/converter (both are included). 

Click here to shop all compatible short standard international ink cartridges or here for long standard international cartridges. 

Waldmann pens are made in Germany and come with a 10 year warranty.

title: Waldmann Tango Imagination Fountain Pen - Aquamarine
description:
This Waldmann Tango Imagination fountain pen features a highly polished, multi-layered, brilliant aquamarine lacquer over a solid sterling silver 925 barrel and cap. The sterling silver body is first finely engraved, then the colored lacquer is applied over top.

The cap screws on/off and posts securely onto the back of the barrel when writing. The fountain pen fills via standard international cartridge/converter (both are included). The trim is plated in platinum, and the pen is completed with a stainless steel nib.

Waldmann pens are made in Germany and come with a 10 year warranty.
